div.p: pṛthivyā lābhe pālane ca yāvantyarthaśāstrāṇi pūrvācāryaiḥ prasthāpitāni prāyaśastāni saṃhṛtyaikamidamarthaśāstraṃ kṛtam
vidyāsamuddeśaḥ vṛddhasamuddeśaḥ indriyajayaḥ amātyotpattiḥ mantripurohitotpattiḥ upadhābhiḥ śaucāśaucajñānamamātyānām
mantrādhikāraḥ dūtapraṇidhiḥ rājaputrarakṣaṇamaparuddhavṛttamaparuddhe vṛttiḥ rājapraṇidhiḥ niśāntapraṇidhiḥ ātmarakṣitakamiti vinayādhikārikaṃ prathamamadhikaraṇam
janapadaniveśaḥ bhūmicchidrāpidhānam durgavidhānam durganiveśaḥ samnidhātṛnicayakarma samāhartṛsamudayaprasthāpanamakṣapaṭale gāṇanikyādhikāraḥ
samudayasya yuktāpahṛtasya pratyānayanamupayuktaparīkṣā śāsanādhikāraḥ kośapraveśyaratnaparīkṣā ākarakarmāntapravartanamakṣaśālāyāṃ suvarṇādhyakṣaḥ
viśikhāyāṃ sauvarṇikapracāraḥ koṣṭhāgārādhyakṣaḥ paṇyādhyakṣaḥ kupyādhyakṣaḥ āyudhādhyakṣaḥ tulāmānapautavam
deśakālamānaṃ śulkādhyakṣaḥ sūtrādhyakṣaḥ sītādhyakṣaḥ surādhyakṣaḥ sūnādhyakṣaḥ gaṇikādhyakṣaḥ
nāvadhyakṣaḥ go'dhyakṣaḥ aśvādhyakṣaḥ hastyadhyakṣaḥ rathādhyakṣaḥ pattyadhyakṣaḥ senāpatipracāraḥ mudrādhyakṣaḥ vivītādhyakṣaḥ samāhartṛpracāraḥ
vyavahārasthāpanā vivādapadanibandhaḥ vivāhasamyuktam dāyavibhāgaḥ vāstukaṃ samayasya anapākarma ṛṇādānamaupanidhikam dāsakarmakarakalpaḥ
sambhūya samutthānam vikrītakrītānuśayaḥ dattasya anapākarma asvāmivikrayaḥ svasvāmisambandhaḥ sāhasam vākpāruṣyam daṇḍapāruṣyam dyūtasamāhvayam prakīrṇakaṃ iti dharmasthīyaṃ tṛtīyamadhikaraṇam
kārukarakṣaṇam vaidehakarakṣaṇamupanipātapratīkāraḥ gūḍhājīvināṃ rakṣā siddhavyañjanairmāṇavaprakāśanaṃ śaṅkārūpakarmābhigrahaḥ
ekāṅgavadhaniṣkrayaḥ śuddhaścitraśca daṇḍa kalpaḥ kanyāprakarma aticāradaṇḍāḥ iti kaṇṭakaśodhanaṃ caturthamadhikaraṇam
dāṇḍakarmikaṃ kośābhisaṃharaṇam bhṛtyabharaṇīyamanujīvivṛttaṃ samayācārikam rājyapratisaṃdhānamekāiśvaryaṃ iti yogavṛttaṃ pañcamamadhikaraṇam
ṣāḍguṇyasamuddeśaḥ kṣayasthānavṛddhiniścayaḥ saṃśrayavṛttiḥ samahīnajyāyasāṃ guṇābhiniveśaḥ hīnasaṃdhayaḥ vigṛhya āsanaṃ saṃdhāya āsanam vigṛhya yānaṃ saṃdhāya yānam
sambhūya prayāṇam yātavyāmitrayorabhigrahacintā kṣayalobhavirāgahetavaḥ prakṛtīnāṃ sāmavāyikaviparimarśaḥ
saṃhita prayāṇikam paripaṇitāparipaṇitāpasṛtāḥ saṃdhayaḥ dvaidhībhāvikāḥ saṃdhivikramāḥ yātavyavṛttiḥ anugrāhyamitraviśeṣāḥ
mitrahiraṇyabhūmikarmasaṃdhayaḥ pārṣṇigrāhacintā hīnaśaktipūraṇam balavatā vigṛhya uparodhahetavaḥ daṇḍopanatavṛttam
daṇḍopanāyivṛttaṃ saṃdhikarma samādhimokṣaḥ madhyamacaritamudāsīnacaritaṃ maṇḍalacaritaṃ iti ṣāḍguṇyaṃ saptamamadhikaraṇam
prakṛtivyasanavargaḥ rājarājyayorvyasanacintā puruṣavyasanavargaḥ pīḍanavargaḥ stambhavargaḥ kośasaṅgavargaḥ mitravyasanavargaḥ iti vyasanādhikārikamaṣṭamamadhikaraṇam
śaktideśakālabalābalajñānam yātrākālāḥ balopādānakālāḥ samnāhaguṇāḥ pratibalakarma paścātkopacintā bāhyābhyantaraprakṛtikopapratīkārāḥ
kṣayavyayalābhaviparimarśaḥ bāhyābhyantarāścāpadaḥ duṣyaśatrusamyuktāḥ arthānarthasaṃśayayuktāḥ tāsāmupāyavikalpajāḥ siddhayaḥ ityabhiyāsyatkarma navamamadhikaraṇam

skandhāvāraniveśaḥ skandhāvāraprayāṇam balavyasanāvaskandakālarakṣaṇaṃ kūṭayuddhavikalpāḥ svasainyotsāhanaṃ svabalānyabalavyāyogaḥ yuddhabhūmayaḥ pattyaśvarathahastikarmāṇi pakṣakakṣorasyānāṃ balāgrato vyūhavibhāgaḥ sāraphalgubalavibhāgaḥ pattyaśvarathahastiyuddhāni daṇḍabhogamaṇḍalāsaṃhatavyūhavyūhanam tasya prativyūhasthāpanaṃ iti sāṃgrāmikaṃ daśamamadhikaraṇam
dūtakarma mantrayuddhaṃ senāmukhyavadhaḥ maṇḍalaprotsāhanaṃ śastrāgnirasapraṇidhayaḥ vīvadhāsāraprasāravadhaḥ yogātisaṃdhānam daṇḍātisaṃdhānamekavijayaḥ ityābalīyasaṃ dvādaśamadhikaraṇam
upajāpaḥ yogavāmanamapasarpapraṇidhiḥ paryupāsanakarma avamardaḥ labdhapraśamanaṃ iti durgalambhopāyastrayodaśamadhikaraṇam

dharmādharmau trayyāmarthānarthau vārttāyāṃ nayānayau daṇḍanītyāṃ balābale ca etāsāṃ hetubhiranvīkṣamāṇā lokasya upakaroti vyasane'bhyudaye ca buddhimavasthāpayati prajñāvākyakriyāvaiśāradyaṃ ca karoti
śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chandovicitirjyotiṣamiti cāṅgāni
svadharmo brāhmaṇasya adhyayanamadhyāpanaṃ yajanaṃ yājanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaśca
kṣatriyasyādhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ dānaṃ śastrājīvo bhūtarakṣaṇaṃ ca
vaiśyasyādhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ dānaṃ kṛṣipāśupālye vaṇijyā ca
gṛhasthasya svadharmājīvastulyairasamānarṣibhirvaivāhyamṛtugāmitvaṃ devapitratithipūjā bhṛtyeṣu tyāgaḥ śeṣabhojanaṃ ca
brahmacāriṇaḥ svādhyāyo agnikāryābhiṣekau bhaikṣavratitvamācārye prāṇāntikī vṛttistadabhāve guruputre sabrahmacāriṇi vā
vānaprasthasya brahmacaryaṃ bhūmau śayyā jaṭājinadhāraṇamagnihotrābhiṣekau devatāpitratithipūjā vanyaścāhāraḥ
parivrājakasya jitendriyatvamanārambho niṣkiṃcanatvaṃ saṅgatyāgo bhaikṣavratamanekatrāraṇye ca vāso bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca śaucam
sarveṣāmahiṃsā satyaṃ śaucamanasūya ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā ca

lg.l: svadharmaṃ saṃdadhāno hi pretya ceha ca nandati

div.p: tayā svapakṣaṃ parapakṣaṃ ca vaśīkaroti kośadaṇḍābhyām
ānvīkṣikī trayī vārttānāṃ yogakṣemasādhano daṇḍaḥ tasya nītirdaṇḍa nītiḥ alabdhalābhārthā labdhaparirakṣaṇī rakṣitavivardhanī vṛddhasya tīrthe pratipādanī ca
na hyevaṃvidhaṃ vaśopanayanamasti bhūtānāṃ yathā daṇḍaḥ | ityācāryāḥ
duṣpraṇītaḥ kāmakrodhābhyāmavajñānādvā vānaprasthaparivrājakānapi kopayati kiṃ aṅga punargṛhasthān
vṛttopanayanastrayīmānvīkṣikīṃ ca śiṣṭebhyo vārttāmadhyakṣebhyo daṇḍanītiṃ vaktṛprayoktṛbhyaḥ
śeṣamahorātrabhāgamapūrvagrahaṇaṃ gṛhītaparicayaṃ ca kuryāt agṛhītānāmābhīkṣṇyaśravaṇaṃ ca
śrutādd hi prajñopajāyate prajñāyā yogo yogādātmavatteti vidyānāṃ sāmarthyam

lg.l: vidyāvinīto rājā hi prajānāṃ vinaye rataḥ

div.p: yathā dāṇḍakyo nāma bhojaḥ kāmādbrāhmaṇakanyāmabhimanyamānaḥ sabandhurāṣṭro vinanāśa karālaśca vaidehaḥ
evaṃ vaśyendriyaḥ parastrīdravyahiṃsāśca varjayetsvapnaṃ laulyamanṛtamuddhataveṣatvamanarthyasamyogamadharmasamyuktamanarthasamyuktaṃ ca vyavahāram
dharmārthāvirodhena kāmaṃ seveta na nihsukhaḥ syāt
maryādāṃ sthāpayedācāryānamātyānvā yainamapāya sthānebhyo vārayeyuḥ chāyānālikāpratodena vā rahasi pramādyantamabhitudeyuḥ
sahādhyāyino amātyān kurvīta dṛṣṭaśaucasāmarthyatvāt iti bhāradvājaḥ

lg.l: avaśaḥ karmaṇā tena vaśyo bhavati tāvatām

div.p: saṃkhyātārtheṣu karmasu niyuktā ye yathādiṣṭamarthaṃ saviśeṣaṃ vā kuryustānamātyān kurvīta dṛṣṭaguṇatvāt iti
navāstu yamasthāne daṇḍadharaṃ manyamānā nāparādhyanti iti

lg.l: sāmarthyaśca vibhajyāmātyavibhavaṃ deśakālau ca karma ca
amātyāḥ sarva evaite kāryāḥ syurna tu mantriṇaḥ

div.p: teṣāṃ janapadabhijanamavagrahaṃ cāptataḥ parīkṣeta samānavidyebhyaḥ śilpaṃ śāstracakṣuṣmattāṃ ca karmārambheṣu prajñāṃ dhārayiṣṇutāṃ dākṣyaṃ ca kathāyogeṣu vāgmitvaṃ prāgalbhyaṃ pratibhānavattvaṃ ca saṃvāsibhyaḥ śīlabalārogyasattvayogamastambhamacāpalaṃ ca pratyakṣataḥ sampriyatvamavairatvaṃ ca
yaugapadyāttu karmaṇāmanekatvādanekasthatvācca deśakālātyayo mā bhūditi parokṣamamātyaiḥ kārayet | ityamātyakarma
purohitamuditoditakulaśīlaṃ sāṅge vede daive nimitte daṇḍanītyāṃ cābhivinītamāpadāṃ daivamānuṣīṇāmatharvabhirupāyaiśca pratikartāraṃ kurvīta
tamācāryaṃ śiṣyaḥ pitaraṃ putro bhṛtyaḥ svāminamiva cānuvarteta

sa sattribhiḥ śapathapūrvamekaikamamātyamupajāpayet adhārmiko ayaṃ rājā sādhu dhārmikamanyamasya tatkulīnamaparuddhaṃ kulyamekapragrahaṃ sāmantamāṭavikamaupapādikaṃ vā pratipādayāmaḥ sarveṣāmetad rocate kathaṃ vā tava iti
senāpatirasatpragraheṇāvakṣiptaḥ sattribhirekaikamamātyamupajāpayet lobhanīyenārthena rājavināśāya sarveṣāmetad rocate kathaṃ vā tava iti
parivrājikā labdhaviśvāsāntaḥpure kṛtasatkārā mahāmātramekaikamupajapet rājamahiṣī tvāṃ kāmayate kṛtasamāgamopāyā mahānarthaśca te bhaviṣyati iti
kāpaṭikaścātra pūrvāvaruddhasteṣāmarthamānāvakṣiptamekaikamamātyamupajapet asatpravṛtto ayaṃ rājā sādhvenaṃ hatvānyaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ sarveṣāmetad rocate kathaṃ vā tava iti

tatra dharmopadhāśuddhāndharmasthīyakaṇṭakaśodhaneṣu karmasu sthāpayet arthopadhāśuddhān samāhartṛsamnidhātṛnicayakarmasu kāmopadhā śuddhānbāhyābhyantaravihārarakṣāsu bhayopadhāśuddhānāsannakāryeṣu rājñaḥ

lg.l: na tveva kuryādātmānaṃ devīṃ vā lakṣyamīśvaraḥ

div.p: tamarthamānābhyāṃ protsāhya mantrī brūyāt rājānaṃ māṃ ca pramāṇaṃ kṛtvā yasya yadakuśalaṃ paśyasi tattadānīmeva pratyādiśa iti
sa vārttākarmapradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmau prabhūtahiraṇyāntevāsī karma kārayet
vṛttikāmāṃścopajapet etenaiva veṣeṇa rājārthaścaritavyo bhaktavetanakāle copasthātavyamiti
sa kṛṣikarmapradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmau iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa
sa vaṇikkarmapradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmau iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa
sa nagarābhyāśe prabhūtamuṇḍajaṭilāntevāsī śākaṃ yavamuṣṭiṃ vā māsadvimāsāntaraṃ prakāśamaśnīyāt gūḍhamiṣṭamāhāram

samedhāśāstibhiścābhigatānāmaṅgavidyayā śiṣyasaṃjñābhiśca karmāṇyabhijane avasitānyādiśet alpalābhamagnidāhaṃ corabhayaṃ dūṣyavadhaṃ tuṣṭidānaṃ videśapravṛttijñānamidamadya śvo vā bhaviṣyati idaṃ vā rājā kariṣyati iti
ye ca kāraṇādabhikruddhāstānarthamānābhyāṃ śamayet akāraṇakruddhāṃstūṣṇīṃ daṇḍena rājadviṣṭakāriṇaśca
ye janapade śūrāstyaktātmāno hastinaṃ vyālaṃ vā dravyahetoḥ pratiyodhayeyuste tīkṣṇāḥ
ye bandhuṣu nihsnehāḥ krūrā alasāśca te rasadāḥ
parivrājikā vṛttikāmā daridrā vidhavā pragalbhā brāhmaṇyantaḥpure kṛtasatkārā mahāmātrakulānyabhigacchet
etayā muṇḍā vṛṣalyo vyākhyātāḥ | iti saṃcārāḥ
bhikṣukīpratiṣedhe dvāhsthaparamparā mātāpitṛvyañjanāḥ śilpakārikāḥ kuśīlavā dāsyo vā gītapāṭhyavādyabhāṇḍagūḍhalekhyasaṃjñābhirvā cāraṃ nirhareyuḥ

lg.l: evaṃ śatrau ca mitre ca madhyame cāvapeccarān

div.p: sarvaguṇasampannaścāyaṃ rājā śrūyate na cāsya kaścidguṇo dṛśyate yaḥ paurajānapadāndaṇḍakarābhyāṃ pīḍayati iti
mātsyanyāyābhibhūtāḥ prajā manuṃ vaivasvataṃ rājānaṃ cakrire
dhānyaṣaḍbhāgaṃ paṇyadaśabhāgaṃ hiraṇyaṃ cāsya bhāgadheyaṃ prakalpayāmāsuḥ
tasmāduñchaṣaḍbhāgamāraṇyakāpi nirvapanti tasyaitadbhāgadheyaṃ yo'smān gopāyati iti
ye cāsya dhānyapaśuhiraṇyānyājīvanti tairupakurvanti vyasane'bhyudaye vā kupitaṃ bandhuṃ rāṣṭraṃ vā vyāvartayanti amitramāṭavikaṃ vā pratiṣedhayanti teṣāṃ muṇḍajaṭilavyañjanāstuṣṭātuṣṭatvaṃ vidyuḥ

saṃśrutyārthānvipralabdhaḥ tulyakāriṇoḥ śilpe vopakāre vā vimānitaḥ vallabhāvaruddhaḥ samāhūya parājitaḥ pravāsopataptaḥ kṛtvā vyayamalabdhakāryaḥ svadharmāddāyādyādvoparuddhaḥ mānādhikārābhyāṃ bhraṣṭaḥ kulyairantarhitaḥ prasabhābhimṛṣṭastrīkaḥ kārābhinyastaḥ paroktadaṇḍitaḥ mithyācāravāritaḥ sarvasvamāhāritaḥ bandhanaparikliṣṭaḥ pravāsitabandhuḥ iti kruddhavargaḥ

svayamupahataḥ viprakṛtaḥ pāpakarmābhikhyātaḥ tulyadoṣadaṇḍenodvignaḥ paryāttabhūmiḥ daṇḍenopanataḥ sarvādhikaraṇasthaḥ sahasopacitārthaḥ tatkulīnopāśaṃsuḥ pradviṣṭo rājñā rājadveṣī ca iti bhītavargaḥ
parikṣīṇaḥ anyāttasvaḥ kadaryaḥ vyasanī atyāhitavyavahāraśca iti lubdhavargaḥ
ātmasambhāvitaḥ mānakāmaḥ śatrupūjāmarṣitaḥ nīcairupahitaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ sāhasikaḥ bhogenāsaṃtuṣṭaḥ iti mānivargaḥ

yathā madāndho hastī mattenādhiṣṭhito yad yadāsādayati tatsarvaṃ pramṛdnāti evamayamaśāstracakṣurandho rājā paurajānapadavadhāyābhyutthitaḥ śakyamasya pratihastiprotsāhanenāpakartumamarṣaḥ kriyatāmiti kruddhavargamupajāpayet
yathā līnaḥ sarpo yasmādbhayaṃ paśyati tatra viṣamutsṛjati evamayaṃ rājā jātadoṣāśaṅkastvayi purā krodhaviṣamutsṛjati anyatra gamyatāmiti bhītavargaṃ upajāpayet

yathā śvagaṇināṃ dhenuḥ śvabhyo duhyate na brāhmaṇebhyaḥ evamayaṃ rājā sattvaprajñāvākyaśaktihīnebhyo duhyate nātmaguṇasampannebhyaḥ asau rājā puruṣaviśeṣajñaḥ tatra gamyatāmiti lubdhavargaṃ upajāpayet
yathā caṇḍālodapānaścaṇḍālānāmevopabhogyo nānyeṣāmevamayaṃ rājā nīco nīcānāmevopabhogyo na tvadvidhānāmāryāṇāmasau rājā puruṣaviśeṣajñaḥ tatra gamyatāmiti mānivargamupajāpayet
śrūyate hi śukasārikābhirmantro bhinnaḥ śvabhirapyanyaiśca tiryagyonibhiriti
teṣāṃ hi pramādamadasuptapralāpāḥ kāmādirutsekaḥ pracchanno'vamato vā mantraṃ bhinatti
anupalabdhasya jñānamupalabdhasya niścitabalādhānamarthadvaidhasya saṃśayacchedanamekadeśadṛṣṭasya śeṣopalabdhiriti mantrisādhyametat
yadasya kāryamabhipretaṃ tatpratirūpakaṃ mantriṇaḥ pṛcchetkāryamidamevamāsīt evaṃ vā yadi bhavettatkathaṃ kartavyamiti
mantriṇo hi vyavahitamarthaṃ vṛttamavṛttaṃ vā pṛṣṭā anādareṇa bruvanti prakāśayanti vā
tairmantrayamāṇo hi mantrasiddhiṃ guptiṃ ca labhate iti
dvābhyāṃ mantrayamāṇo dvābhyāṃ saṃhatābhyāmavagṛhyate vigṛhītābhyāṃ vināśyate
tataḥ pareṣu kṛcchreṇārthaniścayo gamyate mantro vā rakṣyate
deśakālakāryavaśena tvekena saha dvābhyāmeko vā yathāsāmarthyaṃ mantrayeta
karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ puruṣadravyasampaddeśakālavibhāgo vinipātapratīkāraḥ kāryasiddhiriti pañcāṅgo mantraḥ
na dīrghakālaṃ mantrayeta na teṣāṃ pakṣīyairyeṣāmapakuryāt
te hyasya svapakṣaṃ parapakṣaṃ ca cintayeyuḥ
ātyayike kārye mantriṇo mantripariṣadaṃ cāhūya brūyāt
tatra yadbhūyiṣṭhā brūyuḥ kāryasiddhikaraṃ vā tatkuryāt

lg.l: nāsya guhyaṃ pare vidyuśchidraṃ vidyātparasya ca
yathā hyaśrotriyaḥ śrāddhaṃ na satāṃ bhoktumarhati

div.p: śāsanamevaṃ vācyaḥ paraḥ sa vakṣyatyevam tasyedaṃ prativākyamevamatisaṃdhātavyamityadhīyāno gacchet
parasya vāci vaktre dṛṣṭyāṃ ca prasādaṃ vākyapūjanamiṣṭaparipraśnaṃ guṇakathāsaṅgamāsannamāsanaṃ satkāramiṣṭeṣu smaraṇaṃ viśvāsagamanaṃ ca lakṣayettuṣṭasya viparītamatuṣṭasya
taṃ brūyātdūtamukhā hi rājānaḥ tvaṃ cānye ca
kṛtyapakṣopajāpamakṛtyapakṣe gūḍhapraṇidhānaṃ rāgāparāgau bhartari randhraṃ ca prakṛtīnāṃ tāpasavaidehakavyañjanābhyāmupalabheta tayorantevāsibhiścikitsakapāṣaṇḍavyañjanobhayavetanairvā
pareṇa coktaḥ svāsāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ pramāṇaṃ nācakṣīta

kāryasyāsiddhāv uparudhyamānastarkayetkiṃ bharturme vyasanamāsannaṃ paśyan svaṃ vā vyasanaṃ pratikartukāmaḥ pārṣṇigrāhamāsāramantaḥkopamāṭavikaṃ vā samutthāpayitukāmaḥ mitramākrandaṃ vā vyāghātayitukāmaḥ svaṃ vā parato vigrahamantaḥkopamāṭavikaṃ vā pratikartukāmaḥ saṃsiddhaṃ vā me bharturyātrākālamabhihantukāmaḥ sasyapaṇyakupyasaṃgrahaṃ durgakarma balasamuddānaṃ vā kartukāmaḥ svasainyānāṃ vā vyāyāmasya deśakālāvākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ paribhavapramādābhyāṃ vā saṃsargānubandhārthī vā māmuparuṇaddhi iti
rakṣito rājā rājyaṃ rakṣatyāsannebhyaḥ parebhyaśca pūrvaṃ dārebhyaḥ putrebhyaśca
kumāro hi vikramabhayānmāṃ pitāvaruṇaddhi iti jñātvā tamevāṅke kuryāt
vatseneva hi dhenuṃ pitaramasya sāmanto duhyāt
sukhoparuddhā hi putrāḥ pitaraṃ nābhidruhyanti iti
āpannasattvāyāḥ kaumārabhṛtyo garbhabharmaṇi prasave ca viyateta
sattriṇāmekaścainaṃ mṛgayādyūtamadyastrībhiḥ pralobhayetpitari vikramya rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa iti
navaṃ hi dravyaṃ yena yenārthajātenopadihyate tattadācūṣati
sattriṇastvenaṃ tava smaḥ iti vadantaḥ pālayeyuḥ
yauvanotsekātparastrīṣu manaḥ kurvāṇamāryāvyañjanābhiḥ strībhiramedhyābhiḥ śūnyāgāreṣu rātrāv udvejayeyuḥ
pitari vikramabuddhiṃ tathā ityanupraviśya bhedayeyuḥ aprārthanīyo rājā vipanne ghātaḥ sampanne narakapātaḥ saṃkrośaḥ prajābhirekaloṣṭavadhaśca iti
bahuputraḥ pratyantamanyaviṣayaṃ vā preṣayed yatra garbhaḥ paṇyaṃ ḍimbo vā na bhavet
śiṣyamāṇo dharmārthāv upalabhate cānutiṣṭhati ca buddhimān
vṛddhastu vyādhito vā rājā mātṛbandhukulyaguṇavatsāmantānāmanyatamena kṣetre bījamutpādayet

lg.l: kulasya vā bhaved rājyaṃ kulasaṃgho hi durjayaḥ

div.p: vinīto rājaputraḥ kṛcchravṛttirasadṛśe karmaṇi niyuktaḥ pitaramanuvarteta anyatra prāṇābādhakaprakṛtikopakapātakebhyaḥ
abhirūpaṃ ca karmaphalamaupāyanikaṃ ca lābhaṃ piturupanāyayet
bandhavadhabhayādvā yaḥ sāmanto nyāyavṛttirdhārmikaḥ satyavāgavisaṃvādakaḥ pratigrahītā mānayitā cābhipannānāṃ tamāśrayeta
pāṣaṇḍasaṃghadravyamaśrotriyopabhogyaṃ vā devadravyamāḍhyavidhavādravyaṃ vā gūḍhamanupraviśya sārthayānapātrāṇi ca madanarasayogenātisaṃdhāyāpaharet

kāruśilpikuśīlavacikitsakavāgjīvanapāṣaṇḍacchadmabhirvā naṣṭarūpastadvyañjanasakhaśchidreṣu praviśya rājñaḥ śastrarasābhyāṃ prahṛtya brūyāt ahamasau kumāraḥ sahabhogyamidaṃ rājyameko nārhati bhoktum ye kāmayante māṃ bhartuṃ tānahaṃ dviguṇena bhaktavetanenopasthāsyāmi iti | ityaparuddhavṛttam
aparuddhaṃ tu mukhyaputrāpasarpāḥ pratipādyānayeyuḥ mātā vā pratigṛhītā
atyaktaṃ tulyaśīlābhiḥ strībhiḥ pānena mṛgayayā vā prasañjayitvā rātrāv upagṛhyānayeyuḥ
nālikābhiraharaṣṭadhā rātriṃ ca vibhajet chāyāpramāṇena vā
tripauruṣī pauruṣī caturaṅgulā naṣṭacchāyo madhyāhneti catvāraḥ pūrve divasasyāṣṭabhāgāḥ
tatra pūrve divasasyāṣṭabhāge rakṣāvidhānamāyavyayau ca śṛṇuyāt
tṛtīye snānabhojanaṃ seveta svādhyāyaṃ ca kurvīta
pañcame mantripariṣadā pattrasampreṣaṇena mantrayeta cāraguhyabodhanīyāni ca budhyeta
ṣaṣṭhe tūryaghoṣeṇa pratibuddhaḥ śāstramitikartavyatāṃ ca cintayet
savastāṃ dhenuṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca pradakṣiṇīkṛtyopasthānaṃ gacchet
tasmāddevatāśramapāṣaṇḍaśrotriyapaśupuṇyasthānānāṃ bālavṛddhavyādhitavyasanyanāthānāṃ strīṇāṃ ca krameṇa kāryāṇi paśyetkāryagauravādātyayikavaśena vā

lg.l: tapasvināṃ tu kāryāṇi traividyaiḥ saha kārayet
prajāsukhe sukhaṃ rājñaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite hitam
nātmapriyaṃ hitaṃ rājñaḥ prajānāṃ tu priyaṃ hitam

div.p: mānuṣeṇāgninā trirapasavyaṃ parigatamantaḥpuramagniranyo na dahati na cātrānyo'gnirjvalati vaidyutena bhasmanā mṛtsamyuktena karakavāriṇāvaliptaṃ ca
jīvantīśvetāmuṣkakapuṣpavandākābhirakṣīve jātasyāśvatthasya pratānena guptaṃ sarpā viṣāṇi vā na prabhavanti
śukaḥ sārikā bhṛṅgarājo vā sarpaviṣaśaṅkāyāṃ krośati
krauñco viṣābhyāśe mādyati glāyati jīvaṃ jīvakaḥ mriyate mattakokilaḥ cakorasyākṣiṇī virajyete
pṛṣṭhataḥ kakṣyāvibhāge strīniveśo garbhavyādhisaṃsthā vṛkṣodakasthānaṃ ca
devīgṛhe līno hi bhrātā bhadrasenaṃ jaghāna mātuḥ śayyāntargataśca putraḥ kārūṣam
lājānmadhuneti viṣeṇa paryasya devī kāśirājam viṣadigdhena nūpreṇa vairantyaṃ mekhalāmaṇinā sauvīraṃ jālūthamādarśena veṇyāṃ gūḍhaṃ śastraṃ kṛtvā devī vidūrathaṃ jaghāna
na caināḥ kulyāḥ paśyeyuḥ anyatra garbhavyādhisaṃsthābhyaḥ
aśītikāḥ puruṣāḥ pañcāśatkāḥ striyo vā mātāpitṛvyañjanāḥ sthaviravarṣadharābhyāgārikāścāvarodhānāṃ śaucāśaucaṃ vidyuḥ sthāpayeyuśca svāmihite

lg.l: svabhūmau ca vasetsarvaḥ parabhūmau na saṃcaret
na ca bāhyena saṃsargaṃ kaścidābhyantaro vrajet

div.p: pitṛpaitāmahaṃ sambandhānubaddhaṃ śikṣitamanuraktaṃ kṛtakarmāṇaṃ ca janamāsannaṃ kurvīta nānyatodeśīyamakṛtārthamānaṃ svadeśīyaṃ vāpyapakṛtyopagṛhītam
gupte deśe māhānasikaḥ sarvamāsvādabāhulyena karma kārayet
tad rajā tathaiva pratibhuñjīta pūrvamagnaye vayobhyaśca baliṃ kṛtvā
agnerjvālādhūmanīlatā śabdasphoṭanaṃ ca viṣayuktasya vayasāṃ vipattiśca
annasya ūṣmā mayūragrīvābhaḥ śaityamāśu kliṣṭasyeva vaivarṇyaṃ sodakatvamaklinnatvaṃ ca
rasasya madhye nīlā rājī payasastāmrā madyatoyayoḥ kālī dadhnaḥ śyāmā madhunaḥ śvetā dravyāṇāmārdrāṇāmāśu pramlānatvamutpakvabhāvaḥ kvāthanīlaśyāvatā ca
kaṭhinānāṃ mṛdutvaṃ mṛdūnāṃ ca kaṭhinatvam tadabhyāśe kṣudrasattvavadhaśca
viṣapradasya tu śuṣkaśyāvavaktratā vāksaṅgaḥ svedo vijṛmbhaṇaṃ cātimātraṃ vepathuḥ praskhalanaṃ vākyaviprekṣaṇamāvegaḥ karmaṇi svabhūmau cānavasthānamiti
bhiṣagbhaiṣajyāgārādāsvādaviśuddhamauṣadhaṃ gṛhītvā pācakapeṣakābhyāmātmanā ca pratisvādya rājñe prayacchet
snāpakasaṃvāhakāstarakarajakamālākārakarma dāsyaḥ prasiddhaśaucāḥ kuryuḥ tābhiradhiṣṭhitā vā śilpinaḥ
ātmacakṣuṣi niveśya vastramālyaṃ dadyuḥ snānānulepanapragharṣacūrṇavāsasnānīyāni ca svavakṣobāhuṣu ca
bhūtapūrvamabhūtapūrvaṃ vā janapadaṃ paradeśāpavāhanena svadeśābhiṣyandavamanena vā niveśayet
śūdrakarṣakaprāyaṃ kulaśatāvaraṃ pañcakulaśataparaṃ grāmaṃ krośadvikrośasīmānamanyonyārakṣaṃ niveśayet
aṣṭaśatagrāmyā madhye sthānīyaṃ catuhśatagrāmyā droṇamukham dviśatagrāmyāḥ kārvaṭikam daśagrāmīsaṃgraheṇa saṃgrahaṃ sthāpayet
anyeṣāṃ vā badhnatāṃ bhūmimārgavṛkṣopakaraṇānugrahaṃ kuryātpuṇyasthānārāmāṇāṃ ca
vyayakarmaṇi ca bhāgī syāt na cāṃśaṃ labheta
apatyadāraṃ mātāpitarau bhrātṛṛnaprāptavyavahārānbhaginīḥ kanyā vidhavāścābibhrataḥ śaktimato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ anyatra patitebhyaḥ anyatra mātuḥ
putradāramapratividhāya pravrajataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ striyaṃ ca pravrājayataḥ
vānaprasthādanyaḥ pravrajitabhāvaḥ sajātādanyaḥ saṃghaḥ sāmutthāyikādanyaḥ samayānubandho vā nāsya janapadamupaniviśeta
na ca tatrārāmā vihārārthā vā śālāḥ syuḥ
pradiṣṭābhayasthāvarajaṅgamāni ca brahmasomāraṇyāni tapasvibhyo gorutaparāṇi prayacchet
tāvanmātramekadvāraṃ khātaguptaṃ svāduphalagulmagucchamakaṇṭakidrumamuttānatoyāśayaṃ dāntamṛgacatuṣpadaṃ bhagnanakhadaṃṣṭravyālaṃ mārgayukahastihastinīkalabhaṃ mṛgavanaṃ vihārārthaṃ rājñaḥ kārayet
sarvātithimṛgaṃ pratyante cānyanmṛgavanaṃ bhūmivaśena vā niveśayet
kupyapradiṣṭānāṃ ca dravyāṇāmekaikaśo vanāni niveśayetdravyavanakarmāntānaṭavīśca dravyavanāpāśrayāḥ
nāgavanādhyakṣaḥ pārvataṃ nādeyaṃ sārasamānūpaṃ ca nāgavanaṃ viditaparyantapraveśaniṣkāsaṃ nāgavanapālaiḥ pālayet

nāgavanapālā hastipakapādapāśikasaimikavanacarakapārikarmikasakhā hastimūtrapurīṣacchannagandhā bhallātakīśākhāpracchannāḥ pañcabhiḥ saptabhirvā hastibandhakībhiḥ saha carantaḥ śayyāsthānapadyāleṇḍakūlaghātoddeśena hastikulaparyagraṃ vidyuḥ
yūthacaramekacaraṃ niryūthaṃ yūthapatiṃ hastinaṃ vyālaṃ mattaṃ potaṃ bandhamuktaṃ ca nibandhena vidyuḥ
nirudakastambamiriṇaṃ vā dhānvanaṃ khañjanodakaṃ stambagahanaṃ vā vanadurgam

janapadamadhye samudayasthānaṃ sthānīyaṃ niveśayet vāstukapraśaste deśe nadīsaṅgame hradasyāviśoṣasyāṅke sarasastaṭākasya vā vṛttaṃ dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vā vāstuvaśena vā pradakṣiṇodakaṃ paṇyapuṭabhedanamaṃsapathavāripathābhyāmupetam

tasya parikhāstisro daṇḍāntarāḥ kārayet caturdaśa dvādaśa daśeti daṇḍānvistīrṇāḥ vistārādavagāḍhāḥ pādonamardhaṃ vā tribhāgamūlāḥ mūlacaturaśrā vā pāṣāṇopahitāḥ pāṣāṇeṣṭakābaddhapārśvā vā toyāntikīrāgantutoyapūrṇā vā saparivāhāḥ padmagrāhavatīśca

caturdaṇḍāpakṛṣṭaṃ parikhāyāḥ ṣaḍdaṇḍocchritamavaruddhaṃ taddviguṇaviṣkambhaṃ khātādvapraṃ kārayedūrdhvacayaṃ mañcapṛṣṭhaṃ kumbhakukṣikaṃ vā hastibhirgobhiśca kṣuṇṇaṃ kaṇṭakigulmaviṣavallīpratānavantam
vaprasyopari prākāraṃ viṣkambhadviguṇotsedhamaiṣṭakaṃ dvādaśahastādūrdhvamojaṃ yugmaṃ vā ā caturviṃśatihastāditi kārayet
pṛthuśilāsaṃhataṃ vā śailaṃ kārayet na tveva kāṣṭamayam
antareṣu dvihastaviṣkambhaṃ pārśve caturguṇāyāmaṃ devapathaṃ kārayet
daṇḍāntarā dvidaṇḍāntarā vā caryāḥ kārayet agrāhye deśe pradhāvanikāṃ niṣkiradvāraṃ ca
prākāramubhayato meṇḍhakamadhyardhadaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā pratolīṣaṭtulāntaraṃ dvāraṃ niveśayetpañcadaṇḍādekottaramāṣṭadaṇḍāditi caturaśraṃ ṣaḍbhāgamāyāmādadhikamaṣṭabhāgaṃ vā
stambhasya parikṣepaḥ ṣaḍāyāmo dviguṇo nikhātaḥ cūlikāyāścaturbhāgaḥ
āditalasya pañcabhāgāḥ śālā vāpī sīmāgṛhaṃ ca
ardhavāstukamuttamāgāram tribhāgāntaraṃ vā iṣṭakāvabaddhapārśvam vāmataḥ pradakṣiṇasopānaṃ gūḍhabhittisopānamitarataḥ
mukhasamaḥ saṃkramaḥ saṃhāryo bhūmimayo vā nirudake
prākāramadhye vāpīṃ kṛtvā puṣkariṇīdvāraṃ catuḥśālamadhyardhāntaraṃ sāṇikaṃ kumārīpuraṃ muṇḍaharmyadvitalaṃ muṇḍakadvāram bhūmidravyavaśena vā niveśayet
trayaḥ prācīnā rājamārgāstraya udīcīnā iti vāstuvibhāgaḥ
caturdaṇḍaḥ setuvanapathaḥ dvidaṇḍo hastikṣetrapathaḥ pañcāratnayo rathapathaḥ catvāraḥ paśupathaḥ dvau kṣudrapaśumanuṣyapathaḥ
vāstuhṛdayāduttare navabhāge yathoktavidhānamantaḥpuraṃ prānmukhamudanmukhaṃ vā kārayet
tasya pūrvottaraṃ bhāgamācāryapurohitejyātoyasthānaṃ mantriṇaścāvaseyuḥ pūrvadakṣiṇaṃ bhāgṃ mahānasaṃ hastiśālā koṣṭhāgāraṃ ca
tataḥ paraṃ gandhamālyarasapaṇyāḥ prasādhanakāravaḥ kṣatriyāśca pūrvāṃ diśamadhivaseyuḥ
dakṣiṇapūrvaṃ bhāgaṃ bhāṇḍāgāramakṣapaṭalaṃ karmaniṣadyāśca dakṣiṇapaścimaṃ bhāgaṃ kupyagṛhamāyudhāgāraṃ ca
tataḥ paraṃ nagaradhānyavyāvahārikakārmāntikabalādhyakṣāḥ pakvānnasurāmāṃsapaṇyā rūpājīvāstālāvacarā vaiśyāśca dakṣiṇāṃ diśamadhivaseyuḥ
paścimadakṣiṇaṃ bhāgaṃ kharoṣṭraguptisthānaṃ karmagṛhaṃ ca paścimottaraṃ bhāgaṃ yānarathaśālāḥ
uttarapaścimaṃ bhāgaṃ paṇyabhaiṣajyagṛhamuttarapūrvaṃ bhāgaṃ kośo gavāśvaṃ ca
bahiḥ parikhāyā dhanuḥśatāpakṛṣṭāścaityapuṇyasthānavanasetubandhāḥ kāryāḥ yathādiśaṃ ca digdevatāḥ
uttaraḥ pūrvo vā śmaśānabhāgo varṇottamānām dakṣiṇena śmaśānaṃ varṇāvarāṇām
samnidhātā kośagṛhaṃ paṇyagṛhaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kupyagṛhamāyudhāgāraṃ bandhanāgāraṃ ca kārayet

caturaśrāṃ vāpīmannudakopasnehāṃ khānayitvā pṛthuśilābhirubhayataḥ pārśvaṃ mūlaṃ ca pracitya sāradārupañjaraṃ bhūmisamaṃ tritalamanekavidhānaṃ kuṭṭimadeśasthānatalamekadvāraṃ yantrayuktasopānaṃ bhūmigṛhaṃ kārayet
tasyoparyubhayatoniṣedhaṃ sapragrīvamaiṣṭakaṃ bhāṇḍavāhinīparikṣiptaṃ kośagṛhaṃ kārayetprāsādaṃ vā
pakveṣṭakāstambhaṃ catuḥśālamekadvāramanekasthānatalaṃ vivṛtastambhāpasāramubhayataḥ paṇyagṛhaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ ca
pṛthagdharmasthīyaṃ mahāmātrīyaṃ vibhaktastrīpuruṣasthānamapasārataḥ suguptakakṣyaṃ bandhanāgāraṃ kārayet
tajjātakaraṇādhiṣṭhitaḥ purāṇaṃ navaṃ ca ratnaṃ sāraṃ phalgu kupyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇīyāt
tatra ratnopadhāv uttamo daṇḍaḥ kartuḥ kārayituśca sāropadhau madhyamaḥ phalgukupyopadhau tacca tāvacca daṇḍaḥ
yathā pṛṣṭo na sajjeta vyaye śeṣe ca saṃcaye
samāhartā durgaṃ rāṣṭraṃ khaniṃ setuṃ vanaṃ vrajaṃ vaṇikpathaṃ cāvekṣeta

śulkaṃ daṇḍaḥ pautavaṃ nāgariko lakṣaṇādhyakṣo mudrādhyakṣaḥ surā sūnā sūtraṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣāraḥ sauvarṇikaḥ paṇyasaṃsthā veśyā dyūtaṃ vāstukaṃ kāruśilpigaṇo devatādhyakṣo dvārabahirikādeyaṃ ca durgam
sītā bhāgo baliḥ karo vaṇik nadīpālastaro nāvaḥ pattanaṃ vivicitaṃ vartanī rajjuścorarajjuśca rāṣṭram
mūlyaṃ bhāgo vyājī parighaḥ kḷptam (klṛptam) rūpikamatyayaścāyamukham

devapitṛpūjādānārthaṃ svastivācanamantaḥpuraṃ mahānasam dūtaprāvartimaṃ koṣṭhāgāramāyudhāgāram paṇyagṛhaṃ kupyagṛhaṃ karmānto viṣṭiḥ pattyaśvarathadvipaparigraho gomaṇḍalam paśumṛgapakṣivyālavāṭāḥ kāṣṭhatṛṇavāṭāśceti vyayaśarīram
rājavarṣaṃ māsaḥ pakṣo divasaśca vyuṣṭam varṣāhemantagrīṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīyasaptamā divasonāḥ pakṣāḥ śeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pṛthagadhimāsakaḥ iti kālaḥ
saṃsthānaṃ pracāraḥ śarīrāvasthāpanamādānaṃ sarvasamudayapiṇḍaḥ saṃjātaṃ etatkaraṇīyam
kośārpitaṃ rājahāraḥ puravyayaśca praviṣṭaṃ paramasaṃvatsarānuvṛttaṃ śāsanamuktaṃ mukhājñaptaṃ cāpātanīyaṃ etatsiddham
siddhikarmayogaḥ daṇḍaśeṣamāharaṇīyaṃ balātkṛtapratiṣṭabdhamavamṛṣṭaṃ ca praśodhyaṃ etaccheṣamasāramalpasāraṃ ca
vikriye paṇyānāmarghavṛddhirupajā mānonmānaviśeṣo vyājī krayasaṃgharṣe vārdhavṛddhiḥ ityāyaḥ
nityo nityotpādiko lābho lābhotpādika iti vyayaḥ

lg.l: hrāsaṃ vyayasya ca prājñaḥ sādhayecca viparyayam

div.p: akṣapaṭalamadhyakṣaḥ prānmukhamudanmukhaṃ vā vibhaktopasthānaṃ nibandhapustakasthānaṃ kārayet

tatrādhikaraṇānāṃ saṃkhyāpracārasaṃjātāgraṃ karmāntānāṃ dravyaprayogavṛddhikṣayavyayaprayāmavyājīyogasthānavetanaviṣṭipramāṇam ratnasāraphalgukupyānāmarghaprativarṇakamānapratimānonmānāvamānabhāṇḍam deśagrāmajātikulasaṃghānāṃ dharmavyavahāracaritrasaṃsthānam rājopajīvināṃ pragrahapradeśabhogaparihārabhaktavetanalābham rājñaśca patnīputrāṇāṃ ratnabhūmilābhaṃ nirdeśotpātikapratīkāralābhaṃ mitrāmitrāṇāṃ ca saṃdhivigrahapradānādānaṃ nibandhapustakasthaṃ kārayet
tataḥ sarvādhikaraṇānāṃ karaṇīyaṃ siddhaṃ śeṣamāyavyayau nīvīmupasthānaṃ pracāraṃ caritraṃ saṃsthānaṃ ca nibandhena prayacchet
uttamamadhyamāvareṣu ca karmasu tajjātikamadhyakṣaṃ kuryātsāmudayikeṣvavaklṛptikam (avakḷptikam) yamupahatya rājā nānutapyeta
sahagrāhiṇaḥ pratibhuvaḥ karmopajīvinaḥ putrā bhrātaro bhāryā duhitaro bhṛtyāścāsya karmacchedaṃ vaheyuḥ

pracāracaritrasaṃsthānānyanupalabhamāno hi prakṛtaḥ samudayamajñānena parihāpayati utthānakleśāsahatvādālasyena śabdādiṣvindriyārtheṣu prasaktaḥ pramādena saṃkrośādharmānarthabhīrubhāyena kāryārthiṣvanugrahabuddhiḥ kāmena hiṃsābuddhiḥ kopena vidyādravyavallabhāpāśrayāddarpeṇa tulāmānatarkagaṇitāntaropadhānāllobhena
yaccāgrādāyasyāntaraparṇe nīvyāṃ vardheta vyayasya vā yatparihāpayettadaṣṭaguṇamadhyakṣaṃ dāpayet
rājārthe kāraṇikasyāpratibadhnataḥ pratiṣedhayato vājñāṃ nibandhādāyavyayamanyathā nīvīmavalikhato dviguṇaḥ
kramāvahīnamutkramamavijñātaṃ punaruktaṃ vā vastukamavalikhato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
pratibandhaḥ prayogo vyavahāro'vastāraḥ parihāpaṇamupabhogaḥ parivartanamapahāraśceti kośakṣayaḥ
klṛptam (kḷptam) āyaṃ parihāpayati vyayaṃ vā vivardhayatīti parihāpaṇam
tatra ratnopabhoge ghātaḥ sāropabhoge madhyamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ phalgukupyopabhoge tacca tāvacca daṇḍaḥ
siddhamāyaṃ na praveśayati nibaddhaṃ vyayaṃ na prayacchati prāptāṃ nīvīṃ vipratijānīta ityapahāraḥ

pūrvaṃ siddhaṃ paścādavatāritam paścātsiddhaṃ pūrvamavatāritaṃ sādhyaṃ na siddhamasādhyaṃ siddhaṃ siddhamasiddhaṃ kṛtamasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtamalpasiddhaṃ bahu kṛtam bahusiddhamalpaṃ kṛtamanyatsiddhamanyatkṛtamanyataḥ siddhamanyataḥ kṛtaṃ
deyaṃ na dattamadeyaṃ dattaṃ kāle na dattamakāle dattamalpaṃ dattaṃ bahu kṛtam bahu dattamalpaṃ kṛtamanyaddattamanyatkṛtamanyato dattamanyataḥ kṛtaṃ
praviṣṭamapraviṣṭaṃ kṛtamapraviṣṭaṃ praviṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ kupyamadattamūlyaṃ praviṣṭam dattamūlyaṃ na praviṣṭaṃ
saṃkṣepo vikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ vikṣepaḥ saṃkṣepo vā mahārghamalpārgheṇa parivartitamalpārghaṃ mahārgheṇa vā
samāropito'rghaḥ pratyavaropito vā saṃvatsaro māsaviṣamaḥ kṛtaḥ māso divasaviṣamo vā samāgamaviṣamaḥ mukhaviṣamaḥ kārmikaviṣamaḥ
nirvartanaviṣamaḥ piṇḍaviṣamaḥ varṇaviṣamaḥ arghaviṣamaḥ mānaviṣamaḥ māpanaviṣamaḥ bhājanaviṣamaḥ iti haraṇopāyāḥ
pracāre cāvaghoṣayet amunā prakṛtenopahatāḥ prajñāpayantu iti
anekeṣu cābhiyogeṣvapavyayamānaḥ sakṛdeva paroktaḥ sarvaṃ bhajeta
kṛtapratighātāvasthaḥ sūcako niṣpannārthaḥ ṣaṣṭhamaṃśaṃ labheta dvādaśamaṃśaṃ bhṛtakaḥ
aniṣpanne śārīraṃ hairaṇyaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ labheta na cānugrāhyaḥ
karmasu caiṣāṃ nityaṃ parīkṣāṃ kārayet cittānityatvānmanuṣyānām
aśvasadharmāṇo hi manuṣyā niyuktāḥ karmasu vikurvate
tasmātkartāraṃ karaṇaṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ kāryaṃ prakṣepamudayaṃ caiṣu vidyāt
na cānivedya bhartuḥ kaṃcidārambhaṃ kuryuḥ anyatrāpatpratīkārebhyaḥ
yaścaiṣāṃ yathādiṣṭamarthaṃ saviśeṣaṃ vā karoti sa sthānamānau labheta
yaḥ samudayaṃ parihāpayati sa rājārthaṃ bhakṣayati
sa cedajñānādibhiḥ parihāpayati tadenaṃ yathāguṇaṃ dāpayet
yaḥ samudayaṃ dviguṇamudbhāvayati sa janapadaṃ bhakṣayati
sa ced rājārthamupanayatyalpāparādhe vārayitavyaḥ mahati yathāparādhaṃ daṇḍayitavyaḥ
yaḥ samudayaṃ vyayamupanayati sa puruṣakarmāṇi bhakṣayati
tasmādasya yo yasminnadhikaraṇe śāsanasthaḥ sa tasya karmaṇo yāthātathyamāyavyayau ca vyāsasamāsābhyāmācakṣīta
yo yad yadutpadyate tattadbhakṣayati sa tādātvikaḥ

yo mahatyarthasamudaye sthitaḥ kadaryaḥ samnidhatte'vanidhatte'vasrāvayati vā samnidhatte svaveśmani avanidhatte paurajānapadeṣu avasrāvayati paraviṣaye tasya sattrī mantrimitrabhṛtyabandhupakṣamāgatiṃ gatiṃ ca dravyāṇāmupalabheta
yaścāsya paraviṣaye saṃcāraṃ kuryāttamanupraviśya mantraṃ vidyāt

lg.l: yathā hyanāsvādayituṃ na śakyaṃ jihvātalasthaṃ madhu vā viṣaṃ vā
arthastathā hyarthacareṇa rājñaḥ svalpo'pyanāsvādayituṃ na śakyaḥ
matsyā yathāntaḥ salile caranto jñātuṃ na śakyāḥ salilaṃ pibantaḥ
yuktāstathā kāryavidhau niyuktā jñātuṃ na śakyā dhanamādadānāḥ
api śakyā gatirjñātuṃ patatāṃ khe patatriṇām
na tu pracchannabhāvānāṃ yuktānāṃ caratāṃ gatiḥ
yathā na bhakṣayantyarthaṃ bhakṣitaṃ nirvamanti vā
na bhakṣayanti ye tvarthānnyāyato vardhayanti ca

div.p: so'vyagramanā rājñaḥ saṃdeśaṃ śrutvā niścitārthaṃ lekhaṃ vidadhyātdeśāiśvaryavaṃśanāmadheyopacāramīśvarasya deśanāmadheyopacāramanīśvarasya

lg.l: yaunānubandhaṃ ca samīkṣya kārye lekhaṃ vidadhyātpuruṣānurūpam

div.p: arthakramaḥ sambandhaḥ paripūrṇatā mādhuryamaudāryaṃ spaṣṭatvamiti lekhasampat
yo'haṃ sa bhavānyanmama dravyaṃ tadbhavataḥ ityupagrahaḥ sāntvam

lg.l: prāvṛttikaśca pratilekha eva sarvatragaśceti hi śāsanāni
anena vijñāpitamevamāha taddīyatāṃ ced yadi tattvamasti
jāterviśeṣeṣu pareṣu caiva grāmeṣu deśeṣu ca teṣu teṣu
anugraho yo nṛpternideśāttajjñaḥ parīhāra iti vyavasyet
dvividhāṃ tāṃ vyavasyanti pravṛttiṃ śāsanaṃ prati
dṛṣṭvā lekhaṃ yathātattvaṃ tataḥ pratyanubhāṣya ca
sarvatrago nāma bhavetsa mārge deśe ca sarvatra ca veditavyaḥ

div.p: yo'haṃ sa bhavānyanmama dravyaṃ tadbhavatā svakṛtyeṣu prayojyatāmityātmopanidhānam | iti
avarge vargakaraṇaṃ cāvargakriyā guṇaviparyāsaḥ samplavaḥ | iti
kośādhyakṣaḥ kośapraveśyaṃ ratnaṃ sāraṃ phalguṃ kupyaṃ vā tajjātakaraṇādhiṣṭhitaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt
tāmraparṇikaṃ pāṇḍyakavāṭakaṃ pāśikyaṃ kauleyaṃ caurṇeyaṃ māhendraṃ kārdamikaṃ srautasīyaṃ hrādīyaṃ haimavataṃ ca mauktikam
masūrakaṃ tripuṭakaṃ kūrmakamardhacandrakaṃ kañcukitaṃ yamakaṃ kartakaṃ kharakaṃ siktakaṃ kāmaṇḍalukaṃ śyāvaṃ nīlaṃ durviddhaṃ cāpraśastam
sthūlaṃ vṛttaṃ nistalaṃ bhrājiṣṇu śvetaṃ guru snigdhaṃ deśaviddhaṃ ca praśastam
vaiḍūryamutpalavarṇaḥ śirīṣapuṣpaka udakavarṇo vaṃśarāgaḥ śukapattravarṇaḥ puṣyarāgo gomūtrako gomedakaḥ
indranīlo nīlāvalīyaḥ kalāyapuṣpako mahānīlo jambvābho jīmūtaprabho nandakaḥ sravanmadhyaḥ
śuddhasphaṭiko mūlāṭavarṇaḥ śītavṛṣṭiḥ sūryakāntaśca | iti maṇayaḥ
ṣaḍaśraścaturaśro vṛtto vā tīvrarāgaḥ saṃsthānavānachaḥ snigdho gururarciṣmānantargataprabhaḥ prabhānulepī ceti maṇiguṇāḥ
mandarāgaprabhaḥ saśarkaraḥ puṣpacchidraḥ khaṇḍo durviddho lekhākīrṇa iti doṣāḥ

vimalakaḥ sasyako'ñjanamūlakaḥ pittakaḥ sulabhako lohitākṣo mṛgāśmako jyotīrasako māleyako'hicchatrakaḥ kūrpaḥ pratikūrpaḥ sugandhikūrpaḥ kṣīravakaḥ śśukticūrṇakaḥ śilāpravālakaḥ pulakaḥ śuklapulaka ityantarajātayaḥ
sabhārāṣṭrakaṃ tajjamārāṣṭrakaṃ kāstīrarāṣṭrakaṃ śrīkaṭanakaṃ maṇimantakamindravānakaṃ ca vajram
mārjārākṣakaṃ śirīṣapuṣpakaṃ gomūtrakaṃ gomedakaṃ śuddhasphaṭikaṃ mūlāṭīvarṇaṃ maṇivarṇānāmanyatamavarṇamiti vajravarṇāḥ
sthūlaṃ guru prahārasahaṃ samakoṭikaṃ bhājanalekhi tarkubhrāmi bhrājiṣṇu ca praśastam
pravālakamālakandakaṃ vaivarṇikaṃ ca raktaṃ padmarāgaṃ ca karaṭagarbhiṇikāvarjamiti
joṅgakaṃ raktaṃ raktakālaṃ vā snigdham taurūpaṃ ca
laghu snigdhamaśyānaṃ sarpiḥsnehalepi gandhasukhaṃ tvaganusāryanulbaṇamavirāgyuṣṇasahaṃ dāhagrāhi sukhasparśanamiti candanaguṇāḥ
aguru joṅgakaṃ kālaṃ kālacitraṃ maṇḍalacitraṃ vā
śyāmikā kālikā kadalī candrottarā śākulā cārohajāḥ
kadalītribhāgā śākulā koṭhamaṇḍalacitrā kṛtakarṇikājinacitrā vā | iti
carmaṇāṃ mṛdu snigdhaṃ bahularoma ca śreṣṭham
śuddhaṃ śuddharaktaṃ pakṣaraktaṃ cāvikaṃ khacitaṃ vānacitraṃ khaṇḍasaṃghātyaṃ tantuvicchinnaṃ ca
kambalaḥ kaucapakaḥ kulamitikā saumitikā turagāstaraṇaṃ varṇakaṃ talicchakaṃ vāravāṇaḥ paristomaḥ samantabhadrakaṃ cāvikam
picchilamārdramiva ca sūkṣmaṃ mṛdu ca śreṣṭham
aṣṭaprotisaṃghātyā kṛṣṇā bhiṅgisī varṣavāraṇamapasāraka iti naipālakam
sampuṭikā caturaśrikā lambarā kaṭavānakaṃ prāvarakaḥ sattaliketi mṛgaroma
sauvarṇakuḍyakaṃ sūryavarṇaṃ maṇisnigdhodakavānaṃ caturaśravānaṃ vyāmiśravānaṃ ca
tena kāśikaṃ pauṇḍrakaṃ ca kṣaumaṃ vyākhyātam
mādhuramāparāntakaṃ kāliṅgaṃ kāśikaṃ vāṅgakaṃ vātsakaṃ māhiṣakaṃ ca kārpāsikaṃ śreṣṭham | iti
jātiṃ rūpaṃ ca jānīyānnidhānaṃ navakarma ca

parvatānāmabhijñātoddeśānāṃ bilaguhopatyakālayanagūḍhakhāteṣvantaḥ prasyandino jambūcūtatālaphalapakvaharidrābhedaguḍaharitālamanaḥśilākṣaudrahiṅgulukapuṇḍarīkaśukamayūrapattravarṇāḥ savarṇodakauṣadhiparyantāścikkaṇā viśadā bhārikāśca rasāḥ kāñcanikāḥ
apsu niṣṭhyūtāstailavadvisarpiṇaḥ ṣaṅkamalagrāhiṇaśca tāmrarūpyayoḥ śatādupari veddhāraḥ

pītakāstāmrakāstāmrapītakā vā bhūmiprastaradhātavo bhinnā nīlarājīvanto mudgamāṣakṛsaravarṇā vā dadhibindupiṇḍacitrā haridrāharītakīpadmapattraśaivalayakṛtplīhānavadyavarṇā bhinnāścuñcuvālukālekhābindusvastikavantaḥ sugulikā arciṣmantastāpyamānā na bhidyante bahuphenadhūmāśca suvarṇadhātavaḥ pratīvāpārthāstāmrarūpyavedhanāḥ

śaṅkhakarpūrasphaṭikanavanītakapotapārāvatavimalakamayūragrīvāvarṇāḥ sasyakagomedakaguḍamatsyaṇḍikāvarṇāḥ kovidārapadmapāṭalīkalāyakṣaumātasīpuṣpavarṇāḥ sasīsāḥ sāñjanā visrā bhinnāḥ śvetābhāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ kṛṣṇābhāḥ śvetāḥ sarve vā lekhābinducitrā mṛdavo dhmāyamānā na sphuṭanti bahuphenadhūmāśca rūpyadhātavaḥ
teṣāmaśuddhā mūḍhagarbhā vā tīkṣṇamūtrakṣarabhāvitā rājavṛkṣavaṭapīlugopittarocanāmahiṣakharakarabhamūtraleṇḍapiṇḍabaddhāstatpratīvāpāstadavalepā vā viśuddhāḥ sravanti

lg.l: yadapi śatasahasradhā vibhinnaṃ bhavati mṛdu tribhireva tanniṣekaiḥ

div.p: bhārikaḥ snigdho mṛduśca prastaradhāturbhūmibhāgo vā piṅgalo haritaḥ pāṭalo lohito vā tāmradhātuḥ
kākamocakaḥ kapotarocanāvarṇaḥ śvetarājinaddho vā visraḥ sīsadhātuḥ
acchaḥ snigdhaḥ saprabho ghoṣavān śītastīvrastanurāgaśca maṇidhātuḥ
stenamanisṛṣṭopajīvinaṃ ca baddhaṃ karma kārayetdaṇḍopakāriṇaṃ ca
vyayakriyābhārikamāakaraṃ bhāgena prakrayeṇa vā dadyāt lāghavikamātmanā kārayet
lakṣaṇādhyakṣaścaturbhāgatāmraṃ rūpyarūpaṃ tīkṣṇatrapusīsāñjanānāmanyatamamāṣabījayuktaṃ kārayetpaṇamardhapaṇaṃ pādamaṣṭabhāgamiti pādājīvaṃ tāmrarūpaṃ māṣakamardhamāṣakaṃ kākaṇīmardhakākaṇīmiti
rūpadarśakaḥ paṇayātrāṃ vyāvahārikīṃ kośapraveśyāṃ ca sthāpayet
rūpikamaṣṭakaṃ śatam pañcakaṃ śataṃ vyājīm pārīkṣikamaṣṭabhāgikaṃ śatam pañcaviṃśatipaṇamatyayaṃ ca anyatrakartṛkretṛvikretṛparīkṣitṛbhyaḥ
lavaṇādhyakṣaḥ pākamuktaṃ lavaṇabhāgaṃ prakrayaṃ ca yathākālaṃ saṃgṛhṇīyādvikrayācca mūlyaṃ rūpaṃ vyājīṃ ca
dattabhāgavibhāgasya vikrayaḥ pañcakaṃ śataṃ vyājīṃ rūpaṃ rūpikaṃ ca
kretā śulkaṃ rājapaṇyacchedānurūpaṃ ca vaidharaṇaṃ dadyāt anyatra kretā ṣaṭchatamatyayaṃ ca

lg.l: evaṃ mūlyaṃ ca bhāgaṃ ca vyājīṃ parighamatyayam
śulkaṃ vaidharaṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ rūpaṃ rūpikameva ca
khanibhyo dvādaśavidhaṃ dhātuṃ paṇyaṃ ca saṃharet

div.p: viśikhāmadhye sauvarṇikaṃ śilpavantamabhijātaṃ prātyayikaṃ ca sthāpayet
jāmbūnadaṃ śātakumbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ śṛṅgaśuktijaṃ jātarūpaṃ rasaviddhamākarodgataṃ ca suvarṇam
kiñjalkavarṇaṃ mṛdu snigdhamanādi bhrājiṣṇu ca śreṣṭham raktapītakaṃ madhyamam raktamavaram
ākarodgataṃ sīsānvayena bhidyamānaṃ pākapattrāṇi kṛtvā gaṇḍikāsu kuṭṭayetkadalīvajrakandakalke vā niṣecayet
tutthodgataṃ gauḍikaṃ kāmbukaṃ cākravālikaṃ ca rūpyam
samarāgalekhamanimnonnate deśe nikaṣitam parimṛditaṃ parilīḍhaṃ nakhāntarādvā gairikeṇāvacūrṇitamupadhiṃ vidyāt
jātihiṅgulukena puṣpakāsīsena vā gomūtrabhāvitena digdhenāgrahastena saṃspṛṣṭaṃ suvarṇaṃ śvetībhavati
tāpo bahirantaśca samaḥ kiñjalkavarṇaḥ kuraṇḍakapuṣpavarṇo vā śreṣṭhaḥ
gṛhītaṃ suvarṇaṃ dhṛtaṃ ca prayogaṃ karaṇamadhye dadyāt
tāmrapādayuktaṃ rūpyaṃ rūpyapādayuktaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ saṃskṛtakam tasmād rakṣet
pṛṣatakācakarmaṇaḥ trayo hi bhāgāḥ paribhāṇḍaṃ dvau vāstukaṃ catvāro vā vāstukaṃ trayaḥ paribhāṇḍam
caturbhāgasuvarṇaṃ vā vālukāhiṅgulukasya rasena cūrṇena vā vāsayet
tapanīyaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ suvarṇaṃ surāgaṃ samasīsātikrāntaṃ pākapattrapakvaṃ saindhavikayojjvālitaṃ nīlapītaśvetaharitaśukapattravarṇānāṃ prakṛtirbhavati
tīkṣṇaṃ cāsya mayūragrīvābhaṃ śvetabhaṅgaṃ cimicimāyitaṃ pītacūrṇitaṃ kākaṇikaḥ suvarṇarāgaḥ
tāramupaśuddhaṃ vā asthitutthe catuḥ samasīse catuḥ śuṣkatutthe catuḥ kapāle trirgomaye dvirevaṃ saptadaśatutthātikrāntaṃ saindhavikayojjvālitam
etasmātkākaṇyuttaramādvimāṣāditi suvarṇe deyam paścād rāgayogaḥ śvetatāraṃ bhavati
pratilepinā rasena dviguṇābhyaktaṃ tapanīyaṃ śukapattravarṇaṃ bhavati
nirdiṣṭakālakāryaṃ ca karma kuryuḥ anirdiṣṭakālaṃ kāryāpadeśam
kālāntarādapi ca tathāvidhameva pratigṛhṇīyuḥ anyatra kṣīṇapariśīrṇābhyām
tīkṣṇakākaṇī rūpyadviguṇaḥ rāgaprakṣepaḥ tasya ṣaḍbhāgaḥ kṣayaḥ
varṇahīne māṣāvare pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ pramāṇahīne madhyamaḥ tulāpratimānopadhāv uttamaḥ kṛtabhāṇḍopadhau ca
sauvarṇikenādṛṣṭamanyatra vā prayogaṃ kārayato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
ghanaṃ suṣiraṃ samyūhyamavalepyaṃ saṃghātyaṃ vāsitakaṃ ca kārukarma
samnāminyutkīrṇikā bhinnamastakopakaṇṭhī kuśikyā sakaṭukakṣyā parivelyāyas kāntā ca duṣṭatulāḥ
śulbena śulbāpasāritam vellakena vellakāpasāritaṃ śulbārdhasāreṇa hemnā hemāpasāritam
mūkamūṣā pūtikiṭṭaḥ karaṭukamukhaṃ nālī saṃdaṃśo joṅganī suvarcikālavaṇaṃ tadeva suvarṇamityapasāraṇamārgāḥ
paścādbandhane ācitakapattraparīkṣāyāṃ vā rūpyarūpeṇa parivartanaṃ visrāvaṇam piṇḍavālukānāṃ lohapiṇḍavālukābhirvā
śulbaṃ tāraṃ vā garbhaḥ pattrāṇāṃ saṃghātyeṣu kriyate
śulbarūpaṃ suvarṇapattrasaṃhataṃ pramṛṣṭaṃ supārśvam tadeva yamakapattrasaṃhataṃ pramṛṣṭaṃ tāmratārarupaṃ cottaravarṇakaḥ
abhyuddhāryaṃ badarāmle lavaṇodake vā sādayanti | iti peṭakaḥ
ghane suṣire vā rūpe suvarṇamṛnmālukāhiṅgulukakalpo vā tapto'vatiṣṭhate
dṛḍhavāstuke vā rūpe vālukāmiśraṃ jatu gāndhārapaṅko vā tapto'vatiṣṭhate
saparibhāṇḍe vā rūpe lavaṇamulkayā kaṭuśarkarayā taptamavatiṣṭhate
tasyāpihitakācakasyodake nimajjata ekadeśaḥ sīdati paṭalāntareṣu vā sūcyā bhidyate
maṇayo rūpyaṃ suvarṇaṃ vā ghanasuṣirāṇāṃ piṅkaḥ
tasya tāpanamavadhvaṃsanaṃ vā śuddhiḥ | iti piṅkaḥ
kṛtabhāṇḍaparīkṣāyāṃ purāṇabhāṇḍapratisaṃskāre vā catvāro haraṇopāyāḥ parikuṭṭanamavacchedanamullekhanaṃ parimardanaṃ vā
peṭakāpadeśena pṛṣataṃ guṇaṃ piṭakāṃ vā yatpariśātayanti tatparikuṭṭanam
yaddviguṇavāstukānāṃ vā rūpe sīsarūpaṃ prakṣipyābhyantaramavacchindanti tadavacchedanam
haritālamanaḥśilāhiṅgulukacūrṇānāmanyatamena kuruvindacūrṇena vā vastraṃ samyūhya yatparimṛdnanti tatparimardanam
tena sauvarṇarājatāni bhāṇḍāni kṣīyante na caiṣāṃ kiṃcidavarugṇaṃ bhavati
virūpāṇāṃ vā tāpanamudakapeṣaṇaṃ ca bahuśaḥ kuryāt
avakṣepaḥ pratimānamagnirgaṇḍikā bhaṇḍikādhikaraṇī piñchaḥ sūtraṃ cellaṃ bollanaṃ śira utsaṅgo makṣikā svakāyekṣā dṛtirudakaśarāvamagniṣṭhamiti kācaṃ vidyāt
rājatānāṃ visraṃ malagrāhi paruṣaṃ prastīnaṃ vivarṇaṃ vā duṣṭamiti vidyāt

lg.l: evaṃ navaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca virūpaṃ cāpi bhāṇḍakam

div.p: piṇḍakaraḥ ṣaḍbhāgaḥ senābhaktaṃ baliḥ kara utsaṅgaḥ pārśvaṃ pārihīṇikamaupāyanikaṃ kauṣṭheyakaṃ ca rāṣṭram
kuṭṭakarocakasaktuśuktapiṣṭakarma tajjīvaneṣu tailapīḍanamaudracākrikeṣvikṣūṇāṃ ca kṣārakarma saṃhanikā
tulāmānāntaraṃ hastapūraṇamutkaro vyājī paryuṣitaṃ prārjitaṃ copasthānam | iti
ikṣurasaguḍamadhuphāṇitajāmbavapanasānāmanyatamo meṣaśṛṅgīpippalīkvāthābhiṣuto māsikaḥ ṣāṇmāsikaḥ sāṃvatsariko vā cidbhiṭorvārukekṣukāṇḍāmraphalāmalakāvasutaḥ śuddho vā śuktavargaḥ
udārakastulyaḥ yavā godhūmāśca kṣuṇṇāḥ tilā yavā mudgamāṣāśca ghṛṣṭāḥ
dviguṇo yāvakaḥ pulākaḥ piṣṭaṃ ca siddham
kodravavarakodārakapriyaṅgūṇāṃ triguṇamannaṃ caturguṇaṃ vrīhīṇām pañcaguṇaṃ śālīnām

pañcadroṇe śālīnāṃ dvādaśāḍhakaṃ taṇḍulānāṃ kalabhabhojanamekādaśakaṃ vyālānām daśakamaupavāhyānāṃ navakaṃ sāmnāhyānāmaṣṭakaṃ pattīnāṃ saptakaṃ mukhyānāṃ ṣaṭkaṃ devīkumārāṇām pañcakaṃ rājñāmakhaṇḍapariśuddhānāṃ vā tuaṇḍulānāṃ prasthaḥ
taṇḍulānāṃ prasthaḥ caturbhāgaḥ sūpaḥ sūpaṣoḍaśo lavaṇasyāṃśaḥ caturbhāgaḥ sarpiṣastailasya vaikamāryabhaktaṃ puṃsaḥ
māṃsapalaviṃśatyā snehārdhakuḍubaḥ paliko lavaṇasyāṃśaḥ kṣārapalayogo dvidharaṇikaḥ kaṭukayogo dadhnuścārdhaprasthaḥ
śākānāmadhyardhaguṇaḥ śuṣkāṇāṃ dviguṇaḥ sa caiva yogaḥ
balīvardānāṃ māṣadroṇaṃ yavānāṃ vā pulākaḥ śeṣamaśvavidhānam
bahumukhaṃ vā rājapaṇyaṃ vaidehakāḥ kṛtārghaṃ vikrīṇīran
ahnaścāṣṭame bhāge paṇyādhyakṣasyārpayeyuḥ idaṃ vikrītamidaṃ śeṣamiti
paraviṣaye tu paṇyapratipaṇyayorarghaṃ mūlyaṃ cāgamayya śulkavartanyātivāhikagulmataradeyabhaktabhāgavyayaśuddhamudayaṃ paśyet
asatyudaye bhāṇḍanirvahaṇena paṇyapratipaṇyānayanena vā lābhaṃ paśyet
ātmano vā bhūmiṃ prāptaḥ sarvadeyaviśuddhaṃ vyavahareta
kālakūṭavatsanābhahālāhalameṣaśṛṅgamustākuṣṭhamahāviṣavellitakagaurārdrabālakamārkaṭahaimavatakāliṅgakadāradakāṅkolasārakoṣṭrakādīni viṣāṇi sarpāḥ kīṭāśca ta eva kumbhagatāḥ viṣavargaḥ
dhānyamāṣā daśa suvarṇamāṣakaḥ pañca vā guñjāḥ
te ṣoḍaśa dharaṇaṃ śaumbyāni vā viṃśatiḥ
ardhamāṣakaḥ māṣakaḥ dvau catvāraḥ aṣṭau māṣakāḥ suvarṇo dvau catvāraḥ aṣṭau suvarṇāḥ daśa viṃśatiḥ triṃśat catvāriṃśat śatamiti
pratimānānyayomayāni māgadhamekalaśailamayāni yāni vā nodakapradehābhyāṃ vṛddhiṃ gaccheyuruṣṇena vā hrāsam
ṣaḍaṅgulādūrdhvamaṣṭāṅgulottarā daśa tulāḥ kārayet lohapalādūrdhvamekapalottarāḥ yantramubhayataḥśikyaṃ vā
tasyāḥ pañcapalikaṃ maṇḍalaṃ baddhvā samakaraṇaṃ kārayet
tataḥ karṣottaraṃ palaṃ palottaraṃ daśapalaṃ dvādaśa pañcadaśa viṃśatiriti padāni kārayet
tasyāḥ śatapadādūrdhvaṃ viṃśatiḥ pañcāśat śatamiti padāni kārayet
atha dhānyamāṣadvipalaśataṃ droṇamāyamānaṃ saptāśītipalaśatamardhapalaṃ ca vyāvahārikam pañcasaptatipalaśataṃ bhājanīyam dviṣaṣṭipalaśatamardhapalaṃ cāntaḥpurabhājanīyam
śuṣkasāradārumayaṃ samaṃ caturbhāgaśikhaṃ mānaṃ kārayet antaḥśikhaṃ vā
rasasya tu surāyāḥ puṣpaphalayostuṣāṅgārāṇāṃ sudhāyāśca śikhāmānaṃ dviguṇottarā vṛddhiḥ
sapādapaṇo droṇamūlyamāḍhakasya pādonaḥ ṣaṇmāṣakāḥ prasthasya māṣakaḥ kuḍubasya
madhyamasya puruṣasya madhyamāyā anugulyā madhyaprakarṣo vāṅgulam
caturdaśāṅgulaṃ śamaḥ śalaḥ parīrayaḥ padaṃ ca
tuṭo lavo nimeṣaḥ kāṣṭhā kallā nālikā muhūrtaḥ pūrvāparabhāgau divaso rātriḥ pakṣo māsa ṛturayanaṃ saṃvatsaro yugamiti kālāḥ
pañcadaśamuhūrto divaso rātriśca caitre cāśvayuje ca māsi bhavataḥ
tataḥ paraṃ tribhirmuhūrtairanyataraḥ ṣaṇmāsaṃ vardhate hrasate ceti

chāyāyāmaṣṭapauruṣyāmaṣṭādaśabhāgaśchedaḥ ṣaṭpauruṣyāṃ caturdaśabhāgaḥ tripauruṣyāmaṣṭabhāgaḥ dvipauruṣyāṃ ṣaḍbhāgaḥ pauruṣyāṃ caturbhāgaḥ aṣṭāṅgulāyāṃ trayo daśabhāgāḥ caturaṅgulāyāṃ trayo'ṣṭabhāgāḥ acchāyo madhyāhna iti
ataḥ paraṃ śrāvaṇādīnāṃ ṣaṇmāsānāṃ dvyaṅgulottarā māghādīnāṃ dvyaṅgulāvarā chāyā iti

lg.l: grīṣme janayataḥ pūrvaṃ pañcābdānte ca paścimam

div.p: śulkādhyakṣaḥ śulkaśālāṃ dhvajaṃ ca prānmukhamudanmukhaṃ vā mahādvārābhyāśe niveśayet
śulkādāyinaścatvāraḥ pañca vā sārthopayātānvaṇijo likheyuḥ ke kutastyāḥ kiyatpaṇyāḥ kva cābhijñānaṃ mudrā vā kṛtā iti
rājamudrāparivartane nāmakṛte vā sapādapaṇikaṃ vahanaṃ dāpayet
dhvajamūlopasthitasya pramāṇamarghaṃ ca vaidehikāḥ paṇyasya brūyuḥ etatpramāṇenārgheṇa paṇyamidaṃ kaḥ kretā iti
śulkabhayātpaṇyapramāṇa mūlyaṃ vā hīnaṃ bruvatastadatiriktaṃ rājā haret
tadeva niviṣṭapaṇyasya bhāṇḍasya hīnaprativarṇakenārghāpakarṣaṇe sārabhāṇḍasya phalgubhāṇḍena praticchādane ca kuryāt
pratikretṛbhayādvā paṇyamūlyādupari mūlyaṃ vardhayato mūlyavṛddhiṃ rājā haretdviguṇaṃ vā śulkaṃ kuryāt
tasmādvikrayaḥ paṇyānāṃ dhṛto mito gaṇito vā kāryaḥ tarkaḥ phalgubhāṇḍānāmānugrāhikāṇāṃ ca
vaivāhikamanvāyanamaupāyikaṃ yajñakṛtyaprasavanaimittikaṃ devejyācaulopanayanagodānavratadīkṣādiṣu kriyāviśeṣeṣu bhāṇḍamucchulkaṃ gacchet
kṛtaśulkenākṛtaśulkaṃ nirvāhayato dvitīyamekamudrayā bhittvā paṇyapuṭamapaharato vaidehakasya tacca tāvacca daṇḍaḥ
antapālaḥ sapādapaṇikāṃ vartanīṃ gṛhṇīyātpaṇyavahanasya paṇikāmekakhurasya paśūnāmardhapaṇikāṃ kṣudrapaśūnāṃ pādikāmaṃsabhārasya māṣikām
vaideśyaṃ sārthaṃ kṛtasāraphalgubhāṇḍavicayanamabhijñānaṃ mudrāṃ ca dattvā preṣayedadhyakṣasya
tataḥ sārthamadhyakṣo'bhigamya brūyāt idamamuṣyāmuṣya ca sārabhāṇḍaṃ phalgubhāṇḍaṃ ca na nihūhitavyameṣa rājñaḥ prabhāvaḥ iti
nihūhataḥ phalgubhāṇḍaṃ śulkāṣṭaguṇo daṇḍaḥ sārabhāṇḍaṃ sarvāpahāraḥ
dvārādeyaṃ śulkaṃ pañcabhāgaḥ ānugrāhikaṃ vā yathādeśopakāraṃ sthāpaytet
ślakṣṇasthūlamadhyatāṃ ca sūtrasya viditvā vetanaṃ kalpayetbahvalpatāṃ ca
yāścāniṣkāsinyaḥ proṣitā vidhavā nyaṅgāḥ kanyakā vātmānaṃ bibhṛyuḥ tāḥ svadāsībhiranusārya sopagrahaṃ karma kārayitavyāḥ
svayamāgacchantīnāṃ vā sūtraśālāṃ pratyuṣasi bhāṇḍavetanavinimayaṃ kārayet
striyā mukhasaṃdarśane'nyakāryasambhāṣāyāṃ vā pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ vetanakālātipātane madhyamaḥ akṛtakarmavetanapradāne ca
gṛhītvā vetanaṃ karmākurvatyā aṅguṣṭhasaṃdaṃśaṃ dāpayetbhakṣitāpahṛtāvaskanditānāṃ ca
ṣoḍaśadroṇaṃ jāṅgalānāṃ varṣapramāṇamadhyardhamānūpānāṃ deśavāpānāmardhatrayodaśāśmakānām trayoviṃśatiravantīnāmamitamaparāntānāṃ haimanyānāṃ ca kulyāvāpānāṃ ca kālataḥ
varṣatribhāgaḥ pūrvapaścimamāsayoḥ dvau tribhāgau madhyamayoḥ suṣamārūpam
sūryādbījasiddhiḥ bṛhaspateḥ sasyānāṃ stambakāritā śukrādvṛṣṭiḥ | iti
svasetubhyo hastaprāvartimamudakabhāgaṃ pañcamaṃ dadyuḥ skandhaprāvartimaṃ caturthaṃ srotoyantraprāvartimaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ nadīsarastaṭākakūpoddhāṭam
karmodakapramāṇena kaidāraṃ haimanaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vā sasyaṃ sthāpayet
śālyādi jyeṣṭhaṃ ṣaṇḍo madhyamaḥ ikṣuḥ pratyavaraḥ
phenāghāto vallīphalānām parīvāhāntāḥ pippalīmṛdvīkekṣūṇāṃ kūpaparyantāḥ śākamūlānām haraṇīparyantā haritakānām pālyo lavānāṃ gandhabhaiṣajyośīrahrīberapiṇḍālukādīnām

tuṣārapāyanamuṣṇaśoṣaṇaṃ cāsaptarātrāditi dhānyabījānām trirātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ vā kośīdhānyānāṃ madhughṛtasūkaravasābhiḥ śakṛdyuktābhiḥ kāṇḍabījānāṃ chedalepo madhughṛtena kandānāmasthibījānāṃ śakṛdālepaḥ śākhināṃ gartadāho go'sthiśakṛdbhiḥ kāle dauhrdaṃ ca

lg.l: na sarpāstatra tiṣṭhanti dhūmo yatraiṣa tiṣṭhati

div.p: sarvajījānāṃ tu prathamavāpe suvarṇodakasamplutāṃ pūrvamuṣṭiṃ vāpayedamuṃ ca mantraṃ brūyātprajāpataye kāśyapāya devāya ca namaḥ sadā | sītā me ṛdhyatāṃ devī bījeṣu ca dhaneṣu ca
ṣaṇḍavāṭagopālakadāsakarmakarebhyo yathāpuruṣaparivāpaṃ bhaktaṃ kuryātsapādapaṇikaṃ ca māsaṃ dadyāt
praśīrṇaṃ ca puṣpaphalaṃ devakāryārthaṃ vrīhiyavamāgrayaṇārthaṃ śrotriyāstapasvinaścāhareyuḥ rāśimūlamuñchavṛttayaḥ

lg.l: yathākālaṃ ca sasyādi jātaṃ jātaṃ praveśayet
na saṃhatāni kurvīta na tucchāni śirāṃsi ca

div.p: grāmādanirṇayaṇamasampātaṃ ca surāyāḥ pramādabhayātkarmasu ñjirdiṣṭānāṃ maryādātikramabhayādāryāṇāmutsāhabhayācca tīṣkṇānām
lakṣitamalpaṃ vā caturbhāgamardhakuḍubaṃ kuḍubamardhaprasthaṃ prasthaṃ veti jñātaśaucā nirhareyuḥ
nikṣepopanidhiprayogāpahṛtānāmaniṣṭopagatānāṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ jñānārthamasvāmikaṃ kupyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ copalabhya niṣkeptāramanyatra vyapadeśena grāhayedativyayakartāramanāyativyayaṃ ca
na cānargheṇa kālikāṃ vā surāṃ dadyādanyatra duṣṭasurāyāḥ
pānāgārāṇyanekakakṣyāṇi vibhaktaśayanāsanavanti pānoddeśāni gandhamālyodakavanti ṛtusukhāni kārayet
tatrasthāḥ prakṛtyautpattikau vyayau gūḍhā vidyuḥ āgantūṃśca
vaṇijaśstu saṃvṛteṣu kakṣyāvibhāgeṣu svadāsībhiḥ peśalarūpābhirāgantūnāṃ vāstavyānāṃ cāryarūpāṇāṃ mattasuptānāṃ bhāvaṃ vidyuḥ
udakadroṇaṃ taṇḍulānāmardhāḍhakaṃ trayaḥ prasthāḥ kiṇvasyeti medakayogaḥ
dvādaśāḍhakaṃ piṣṭasya pañca prasthāḥ kiṇvasya kramukatvakphalayukto vā jātisambhāraḥ prasannāyogaḥ
kapitthatulā phāṇitaṃ pañcataulikaṃ prastho madhuna ityāsavayogaḥ
māṣakalanīdroṇamāmaṃ siddhaṃ vā tribhāgādhikataṇḍulaṃ moraṭādīnāṃ kārṣikabhāgayuktaṃ kiṇvabandhaḥ
sahakārasurā rasottarā bījottarā vā mahāsurā sambhārikī vā

tāsāṃ moraṭāpalāśapattūrameṣaśṛṅgīkarañjakṣīravṛkṣakaṣāyabhāvitaṃ dagdhakaṭaśarkarācūrṇaṃ loghracitrakavilaṅgapāṭhāmustākaliṅgayavadāruharidrendīvaraśatapuṣpāpāmārgasaptaparṇanimbāsphotakalkārdhayuktamantarnakho muṣṭiḥ kumbhīṃ rājapeyāṃ prasādayati
kuṭumbinaḥ kṛtyeṣu śvetasurāmauṣadhārthaṃ vāriṣṭamanyadvā kartuṃ labheran
arājapaṇyāḥ pañcakaṃ śataṃ śulkaṃ dadyuḥ surakāmedakāriṣṭamadhuphalāmlāmlaśīdhūnāṃ ca
apravṛttavadhānāṃ matsyapakṣiṇāṃ bandhavadhahiṃsāyāṃ pādonasaptaviṃśatipaṇamatyayaṃ kuryātmṛgapaśūnāṃ dviguṇam
pravṛttahiṃsānāmaparigṛhītānāṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyātmatsyapakṣiṇāṃ daśabhāgaṃ vādhikaṃ mṛgapaśūnāṃ śulkaṃ vādhikam

sāmudrahastyaśvapuruṣavṛṣagardabhākṛtayo matsyāḥ sārasā nādeyāstaṭākakulyodbhavā vā krauñcotkrośakadātyūhahaṃsacakravākajīvañjīvakabhṛṅgarājacakoramattakokilamayūraśukamadanaśārikā vihārapakṣiṇo maṅgalyāścānye'pi prāṇinaḥ pakṣimṛgā hiṃsābādhebhyo rakṣyāḥ
pariśūnamaśiraḥpādāsthi vigandhaṃ svayaṃ mṛtaṃ ca na vikrīṇīran
gaṇikādhyakṣo gaṇikānvayāmagaṇikānvayāṃ vā rūpayauvanaśilpasampannāṃ sahasreṇa gaṇikāṃ kārayetkuṭumbārdhena pratigaṇikām
niṣpatitāpretayorduhitā bhaginī vā kuṭumbaṃ bhareta mātā vā pratigaṇikāṃ sthāpayet
saubhāgyālaṃkāravṛddhyā sahasreṇa vāraṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ madhyamamuttamaṃ vāropayet chatrabhṛṅgāravyajanaśibikāpīṭhikāratheṣu ca viśeṣārtham
gaṇikādāsī bhagnabhogā koṣṭhāgāre mahānase vā karma kuryāt
bhogaṃ dāyamāyaṃ vyayamāyatiṃ ca gaṇikāyā nibandhayet ativyayakarma ca vārayet
svāpateyaṃ vikrayamādhānaṃ vā nayantyāḥ sapādapañcāśatpaṇaḥ paṇo'rdhapaṇacchedane
akāmāyāḥ kumāryā vā sāhase uttamo daṇḍaḥ sakāmāyāḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ
gaṇikāmakāmāṃ rundhato niṣpātayato vā vraṇavidāraṇena vā rūpaṃ upaghnataḥ sahasraṃ daṇḍaḥ
sarvatra prathame'parādhe prathamaḥ dvitīye dviguṇaḥ tṛtīye triguṇaḥ caturthe yathākāmī syāt
rājājñayā puruṣamanabhigacchantī gaṇikā śiphāsahasraṃ labheeta pañcasahasraṃ vā daṇḍaḥ
gītavādyapāṭhyanṛtyanāṭyākṣaracitravīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgaparacittajñānagandhamālyasamyūhanasaṃvādanasaṃvāhanavaiśikakalājñānāni gaṇikā dāsī raṅgopajīvinīśca grāhayato rājamaṇḍalādājīvaṃ kuryāt
gaṇikāputrān raṅgopajīvināṃ ca mukhyānniṣpādayeyuḥ sarvatālāvacarāṇāṃ ca
pattanānuvṛttaṃ śulkabhāgaṃ vaṇijo dadyuḥ yātrāvetanaṃ rājanaubhiḥ sampatantaḥ
śāsakaniryāmakadātra raśmigrāhakotsecakādhiṣṭhitāśca mahānāvo hemantagrīṣmatāryāsu mahānadīṣu prayojayetkṣudrikāḥ kṣudrikāsu varṣāsrāviṇīṣu
kaivartakāṣṭatṛṇabhārapuṣpaphalavāṭaṣaṇḍagopālakānāmanatyayaḥ sambhāvyadūtānupātināṃ ca senābhāṇḍaprayogāṇāṃ ca svataraṇaistaratām bījabhaktadravyopaskarāṃścānūpagrāmāṇāṃ tārayatām

parasya bhāryāṃ kanyāṃ vittaṃ vāpaharantaṃ śavittaṃ vāpaharantaṃ śaṅkitamāvignamudbhāṇḍīkṛtaṃ mahābhāṇḍena mūrdhni bhāreṇāvacchādayantaṃ sadyogṛhītaliṅginamaliṅginaṃ vā pravrajitamalakṣyavyādhitaṃ bhayavikāriṇaṃ gūḍhasārabhāṇḍaśāsanaśastrāgniyogaṃ viṣahastaṃ dīrghapathikamamudraṃ copagrāhayet
kṣudrapaśurmanuṣyaśca sabhāro māṣakaṃ dadyāt śirobhāraḥ kāyabhāro gavāśvaṃ ca dvau uṣṭramahiṣaṃ caturaḥ pañca labhuyānaṃ ṣaḍgoliṅgaṃ sapta śakaṭam panyabhāraḥ pādam
pratyanteṣu tarāḥ śulkamātivāhikaṃ vartanīṃ ca gṛhṇīyuḥ nirgacchataścāmudradravyasya bhāṇḍaṃ hareyuḥ atibhāreṇāvelāyāmatirthe tarataśca
puruṣopakaraṇahīnāyāmasaṃskṛtāyāṃ vā nāvi vipannāyāṃ nāvadhhyakṣo naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vābhyāvahet
gopālakapiṇḍārakadohakamanthakalubdhakāḥ śataṃ śataṃ dhenūnāṃ hiraṇyabhṛtāḥ pālayeyuḥ
ghṛtasyāṣṭau vārakānpaṇikaṃ pucchamaṅkacarma ca vārṣikaṃ dadyāt | iti karapratikaraḥ
vyādhitānyaṅgānanyadohīdurdohāputraghnīnāṃ ca samavibhāgaṃ rūpaśataṃ pālayantastajjātikaṃ bhāgaṃ dadyuḥ | iti bhagnotṣṛṣṭakam
paracakrāṭavībhayādanupraviṣṭānāṃ paśūnāṃ pālanadharmeṇa daśabhagaṃ dadyuḥ | iti bhāgānupraviṣṭakam

vatsā vatsatarā damyā vahino vṛṣā ukṣāṇaśca puṃgavāḥ yugavāhanaśakaṭavahā vṛṣabhāḥ sūnāmahiṣāḥ pṛṣṭaskandhavāhinaśca mahiṣāḥ vatsikā vatsatarī paṣṭahuhī garbhiṇī dhenuścāprajātā vandhyāśca gāvo mahiṣyaśca māsadvimāsajātāstāsāmupajā vatsā vatsikāśca
aṅkaṃ cihnaṃ varṇaṃ śṛṅgāntaraṃ ca lakṣaṇamevamupajā nibandhayet | iti vrajaparyagram
svayaṃ hantā ghātayitā hartā hārayitā ca vadhyaḥ
parapaśūnāṃ rājāṅkena parivartayitā rūpasya pūrvaṃ sāhasadaṇḍaṃ dadyāt
svadeśīyānāṃ corahṛtaṃ pratyānīya paṇitaṃ rūpaṃ haret
sarpavyālatrāsanārthaṃ gocarānupātajñānārthaṃ ca trasnūnāṃ ghaṇṭātūryaṃ ca badhnīyuḥ
stenavyālasarpagrāhagṛhītaṃ vyādhijarāvasannaṃ cāvedayeyuḥ anyathā rūpamūlyaṃ bhajeran
kāraṇamṛtasyāṅkacarma gomahiṣasya karṇalakṣaṇamajāvikānām pucchamaṅkacarma cāśvakharoṣṭrāṇām bālacarmabastipittasnāyudantakhuraśṛṅgāsthīni cāhareyuḥ
kṣīradroṇe gavāṃ ghṛtaprasthaḥ pañcabhāgādhiko mahiṣīṇām dvibhāgādhiko'jāvīnām
yūthavṛṣaṃ vṛṣeṇāvapātayataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ ghātayata uttamaḥ

balīvardānāṃ nasyāśvabhadragativāhināṃ yavasasyārdhabhārastṛṇasya dviguṇam tulā ghāṇapiṇyākasya daśāḍhakaṃ kaṇakuṇḍakasya pañcapalikaṃ mukhalavanAm tailakuḍubo nasyaṃ prasthaḥ pānaṃ māṃsatulā dadhnaścāḍhakam yavadroṇaṃ māṣāṇāṃ vā pulākaḥ kṣīradroṇamardhāḍhakaṃ vā surāyāḥ snehaprasthaḥ kṣāradaśapalaṃ śṛṅgiberapalaṃ ca pratipānam
karmakarabalīvardānāṃ pāyanārthānāṃ ca dhenūnāṃ karmakālataḥ phalataśca vidhādānam
aśvavibhavenāyatāmaśvāyāmadviguṇavistārāṃ caturdvāropāvartanamadhyāṃ sapragrīvāṃ pradvārāsanaphalakayuktānāṃ vānaramayūrapṛṣatanakulacakoraśukasārikākīrṇāṃ śālāṃ niveśayet
aśvāyāmacaturaśraślakṣṇaphalakāstāraṃ sakhādanakoṣṭhakaṃ samūtrapurīṣotsargamekaikaśaḥ prānmukhamudanmukhaṃ vā sthānaṃ niveśayet
daśarātrādūrdhvaṃ kiśorasya ghṛtacaturbhāgaḥ saktukuḍubaḥ kṣīraprasthaścāhāra āṣaṇmāsāt
ata ūrdhvaṃ caturvarṣaḥ pañcavarṣo vā karmaṇyaḥ pūrṇapramāṇaḥ
dvātriṃśadaṅgulaṃ mukhamuttamāśvasya pañcamukhānyāyāmo viṃśatyaṅgulā jaṅghā caturjaṅgha utsedhaḥ

uttamāśvasya dvidroṇaṃ śālivrīhiyavapriyaṅgūṇāmardhaśuṣkamardhasiddhaṃ vā mudgamāṣāṇāṃ vā pulākaḥ snehaprasthaśca pañcapalaṃ lavaṇasya māṃsaṃ pañcāśatpalikaṃ rasasyāḍhakaṃ dviguṇaṃ vā dadhnaḥ piṇḍakledanārthaṃ kṣārapañcapalikaḥ surāyāḥ prasthaḥ payaso vā dviguṇaḥ pratipānam
dīrghapathabhāraklāntānāṃ ca khādanārthaṃ snehaprastho'nuvāsanaṃ kuḍubo nasyakarmaṇaḥ yavasasyārdhabhārastṛṇasya dviguṇaḥ ṣaḍaratniparikṣepaḥ puñjīlagraho vā
prayogyānāmuttamāḥ kāmbojasaindhavāraṭṭavanāyujāḥ madhyamā bāhlīkapāpeyakasauvīrakataitalāḥ śeṣāḥ pratyavarāḥ
teṣāṃ tīṣkṇabhadramandavaśena sāmnāhyamaupavāhyakaṃ vā karma prayojayet
tatrāupaveṇuko vardhamānako yamaka ālīḍhaplutaḥ pṛthugastrikacālī ca valganaḥ
sa eva śiraḥkarṇaviśuddho nīcairgataḥ ṣoḍaśamārgo vā

prakīrṇakaḥ prakīrṇottaro niṣaṇṇaḥ pārśvānuvṛtta ūrmimārgaḥ śarabhakrīḍitaḥ śarabhaplutastritālo bāhyānuvṛttaḥ pañcapāṇiḥ siṃhāyataḥ svādhūtaḥ kliṣṭaḥ śliṅgito bṛṃhitaḥ puṣpābhikīrṇaśceti nīcairgatamārgaḥ
kapipluto bhekapludeṇaplutaikapādaplutaḥ kokilasaṃcāryurasyo bakacārī ca laṅghanaḥ
kāṅko vārikāṅko māyūro'rdhamāyūro nākulordhanākulo vārāho'rdhavārāhaśceti dhoraṇaḥ
ṣaṇṇava dvādaśeti yojanāny dhvā rathyānām pañca yojanānyardhāṣṭamāni daśeti pṛṣṭhavāhināmaśvānāmadhvā
teṣāṃ bandhanopakaraṇaṃ yogyācāryāḥ pratidiśeyuḥ sāṃgrāmikaṃ rathāśvālaṃkāraṃ ca sūtāḥ

lg.l: yātrādāvavasāne vā vyādhau vā śāntike rataḥ

div.p: hastyāyāmadviguṇotsedhaviṣkambhāyāmāṃ hastinīsthānādhikāṃ sapragrīvāṃ kumārīsaṃgrahāṃ prānmukhīmudanmukhīṃ vā śālāṃ niveśayet
vikko moḍho makkaṇo vyāthito garbhiṇī dhenukā hastinī cāgrāhyāḥ
saptāratni utsedho navāyāmo daśa pariṇāhaḥ pramāṇataścatvāriṃśadvarṣo bhavatyuttamaḥ triṃśadvarṣo madhyamaḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo'varaḥ

aratnau taṇuladroṇaḥ ardhāḍhakaṃ tailasya sarpiṣastrayaḥ prasthāḥ daśapalaṃ lavaṇasya māṃsaṃ pañcāśatpalikam rasasyāḍhakaṃ dviguṇaṃ vā dadhnaḥ piṇḍakledanārthaṃ kṣāradaśapalikaṃ madyasyāḍhakaṃ dviguṇaṃ vā payasaḥ pratipānaṃ gātrāvasekastailaprasthaḥ śiraso'ṣṭabhāgaḥ prādīpikaśca yavasasya dvau bhārau sapādau śaṣpasya śuṣkasyārdhatṛtīyo bhāraḥ kaḍaṅkarasyāniyamaḥ
saṃjātalohitā praticchannā samliptapakṣā samakakṣyā vyatikīrṇamāṃsā samatalpatalā jātadroṇiketi śobhāḥ

lg.l: śobhāvaśena vyāyāmaṃ bhadrma mandaṃ ca kārayet
mṛgaṃ saṃkīrṇaliṅgaṃ ca karmasv ṛtuvaśena vā

div.p: tatra damyaḥ pañcavidhaḥ skandhagataḥ stambhagato vārigato'vapātagato yūthagataśceti
sāmnāhyaḥ saptakriyāpatha upasthānaṃ saṃvartanaṃ samyānaṃ vadhāvadho hastiyuddhaṃ nāgarāyaṇaṃ sāṃgrāmikaṃ ca
aupavāhyo'ṣṭavidha ācaraṇaḥ kuñjarāupavāhyo dhoraṇa ādhānagatiko yaṣṭyupavāhyastotropavāhyaḥ śuddhopavāhyo mārgayukaśceti
vyālaikakriyāpathaḥ śaṅkito'varuddho viṣamaḥ prabhinnaḥ prabhinnaviniścayo madahetuviniścayaśca
kriyāvipanno vyālaḥ śuddhaḥ suvrato viṣamaḥ sarvadoṣapraduṣṭaśca
cikitsakakuṭīrakṣavidhāpācakāḥ prasthaudanaṃ snehaprasṛtiṃ kṣāralavaṇayośca dvipalikaṃ hareyuḥ daśapalaṃ māṃsasya anyatra cikitsakebhyaḥ
sthānasyāśuddhiryavasasyāgrahaṇaṃ sthale śāyanamabhāge ghātaḥ parārohaṇamakāle yānamabhūmāvatīrthe'vatāraṇaṃ taruṣaṇḍa ityatyayasthānāni
iṣvastrapraharaṇāvaraṇopakaraṇakalpanāḥ sārathirathikarathyānāṃ ca karmasvāyogaṃ vidyāt ākarmabhyaśca bhaktavetanaṃ bhṛtānāmabhṛtānāṃ ca yogyārakṣānuṣṭhānamarthamānakarma ca
sa maulabhṛtaśreṇimitrāmitrāṭavībalānāṃ sāraphalgutāṃ vidyāt nimnasthalaprakāśakūṭakhanakākāśadivārātriyuddhavyāyāmaṃ ca āyogamayogaṃ ca karmasu
tedeva senāpatiḥ sarvayuddhapraharaṇavidyāvinīto hastyaśvarathacaryāsaṃghuṣṭaścaturaṅgasya balasyānuṣṭhānādhiṣṭhānaṃ vidyāt
svabhūmiṃ yuddhakālaṃ pratyanīkamabhinnabhedanaṃ bhinnasaṃdhānaṃ saṃhatabhedanaṃ bhinnavadhaṃ durgavadhaṃ yātrākālaṃ ca paśyet

lg.l: sthāne yāne praharaṇe sainyānāṃ vinaye rataḥ

div.p: samudro janapadaṃ praveṣṭuṃ niṣkramituṃ vā labheta
taskarāmitrābhyāgame śaṅkhadundubhiśabdamagrāhyāḥ kuryuḥ śailavṛkṣādhirūḍhā vā śīghravāhanā vā

sīmāvarodhena grāmāgraṃ kṛṣṭākṛṣṭasthalakedārārāmaṣaṇḍavāṭavanavāstucaityadevagṛhasetubandhaśmaśānasattraprapāpuṇyasthānavivītapathisaṅkhyānena kṣetrāgram tena sīmnāṃ kṣetrāṇāṃ ca karadākaradasaṅkhyānena
teṣu caitāvaccāturvārṇyametāvantaḥ karṣakagorakṣakavaidehakakārukarmakaradāsāśca etāvacca dvipadacatuṣpadamidaṃ caiṣu hiraṇyalviṣṭiśulkadaṇḍaṃ samuttiṣṭhatīti
gopasthānikasthāneṣu pradeṣṭāraḥ kāryakaraṇaṃ balipragrahaṃ ca kuryuḥ
samāhartṛpradiṣṭāśca gṛhapatikavyañjanā yeṣu grāmeṣu praṇihitāsteṣāṃ grāmāṇāṃ kṣetragṛhakulāgraṃ vidyuḥ mānasaṃjātābhyāṃ kṣetrāṇi bhogaparihārābhyāṃ gṛhāṇi varṇakarmabhyāṃ kulāni ca
prasthitāgatānāṃ ca pravāsāvāsakāraṇamanarthyānāṃ ca strīpuruṣāṇāṃ cārapracāraṃ ca vidyuḥ
evaṃ vaidehakavyañjanāḥ svabhūmijānāṃ rājapaṇyānāṃ khanisetuvanakarmāntakṣetrajānāṃ pramāṇamarghaṃ ca vidyuḥ
parabhūmijātānāṃ vāristhalapathopayātānāṃ sāraphalgupuṇyānāṃ karmasu ca śulkavartanyātivāhikagulmataradeyabhāgabhaktapaṇyāgārapramāṇaṃ vidyuḥ
evaṃ samāhartṛpradiṣṭāstāpasavyañjanāḥ karṣakagorakṣakavaidehakānāmadhyakṣāṇāṃ ca śaucāśaucaṃ vidyuḥ
sa tasyāṃ strīpuruṣāṇāṃ jātigotranāmakarmabhiḥ jaṅghāgramāyavyayau ca vidyāt
dharmāvasathinaḥ pāṣaṇḍipathikānāvedya vāsayeyuḥ svapratyayāśca tapasvinaḥ śrotriyāṃśca
kāruśilpinaḥ svakarmasthāneṣu svajanaṃ vāsayeyuḥ vaidehakāścānyonyaṃ svakarmasthāneṣu
cikitsakaḥ pracchannavraṇapratīkārakārayitāramapathyakāriṇaṃ ca gṛhasvāmī ca nivedya gopasthānikayormucyeta anyathā tulyadoṣaḥ syāt
prasthitāgatau ca nivedayet anyathā rātridoṣaṃ bhajeta
pathikotpathikāśca bahirantaśca nagarasya devagṛhapuṇyasthānavanaśmaśāneṣu savraṇamaniṣṭopakaraṇamudbhāṇḍīkṛtamāvignamatisvapnamadhvaklāntamapūrvaṃ vā gṛhṇīyuḥ
rathyāsu kuṭavrajāḥ sahasraṃ tiṣṭheyuḥ catuṣpathadvārarājaparigraheṣu ca
mārjāraśvanakulasarpapretānāṃ nagarasyāntarutsarge tripaṇo daṇḍaḥ kharoṣṭrāśvatarāśvapretānāṃ ṣaṭpaṇaḥ manuṣyapretānāṃ pañcāśatpaṇaḥ
śmaśānādanyatra nyāse dahane ca dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
tūryaśabde rājño gṛhābhyāśe sapādapaṇaṃ akṣaṇatāḍanaṃ prathamapaścimayāmikaṃ madhyamayāmikaṃ dviguṇamantaścaturguṇam
śaṅkanīye deśe liṅge pūrvāpadāne ca gṛhītamanuyuñjīta
cārarātriṣu pracchannaviparītaveṣāḥ pravrajitā daṇḍaśastrahastāśca manuṣyā doṣato daṇḍyāḥ
rakṣiṇāmavāryaṃ vārayatāṃ vāryaṃ cāvārayatāṃ kṣaṇadviguṇo daṇḍaḥ
striyaṃ dāsīmadhimehayatāṃ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ adāsīṃ madhyamaḥ kṛtāvarodhāmuttamaḥ kulastriyaṃ vadhaḥ
cetanācetanikaṃ rātridoṣamaśaṃsato nāgarikasya doṣānurūpo daṇḍaḥ pramādasthāne ca

ato'nyathā na sidhyeyuḥ apāśrayavadbhiśca kṛtāḥ pitṛmatā putreṇa pitrā putravatā niṣkulena bhrātrā kaniṣṭhenāvibhaktāṃśena patimatyā putravatyā ca striyā dāsāhitakābhyāmaprāptātītavyavahārābhyāmabhiśastapravrajitanyaṅgavyasanibhiśca anyatra niṣṛṣṭavyavahārebhyaḥ
tatrāpi kruddhenārtena mattenonmattenāvagṛhītena vā kṛtā vyavahārā na sidhyeyuḥ
sve sve tu varge deśe kāle ca svakaraṇakṛtāḥ sampūrṇācārāḥ śuddhadeśā dṛṣṭarūpalakṣaṇapramāṇaguṇāḥ sarvavyavahārāḥ sidhyeyuḥ
paścimaṃ caiṣāṃ karaṇamādeśādhivarjaṃ śraddheyam | iti vyavahārasthāpanā
saṃvatsaramṛtuṃ māsaṃ pakṣaṃ divasaṃ karaṇamadhikaraṇamṛṇaṃ vedakāvedakayoḥ kṛtasamarthāvasthayordeśagrāmajātigotranāmakarmāṇi cābhilikhya vādiprativādipraśnānarthānupūrvyā niveśayet

nibaddhaṃ vādamutsṛjyānyaṃ vādaṃ saṃkrāmati pūrvoktaṃ paścimenārthena nābhisaṃdhatte paravākyamanabhigrāhyamabhigrāhyāvatiṣṭhate pratijñāya deśaṃ nirdiśetyukte na nirdiśati hīnadeśamadeśaṃ vā nirdiśati nirdiṣṭāddeśādanyaṃ deśamupasthāpayati upasthite deśe'rthavacanaṃ naivamityapavyayate sākṣibhiravadhṛtaṃ necchati asambhāṣye deśe sākṣibhirmithaḥ sambhāṣate iti paroktahetavaḥ
ata ūrdhvaṃ tripaṇāvarārdhyaṃ dvādaśapaṇaparaṃ daṇḍaṃ kuryāt
tripakṣādūrdhvamapratibruvataḥ paroktadaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā yānyasya dravyāṇi syustato'bhiyoktāraṃ pratipādayedanyatra vṛttyupakaraṇebhyaḥ

lg.l: tatra satye sthito dharmo vyavahārastu sākṣiṣu
caritraṃ saṃgrahe puṃsāṃ rājñāmājñā tu śāsanam
rājñaḥ svadharmaḥ svargāya prajā dharmeṇa rakṣituḥ
daṇḍo hi kevalo lokaṃ paraṃ cemaṃ ca rakṣati
rājñā putre ca śatrau ca yathādoṣaṃ samaṃ dhṛtaḥ
nyāyena ca caturthena caturantāṃ vā mahīṃ jayet
saṃsthā yā dharmaśāstreṇa śāstraṃ vā vyāvahārikam
nyāyastatra pramāṇaṃ syāttatra pāṭho hi naśyati

div.p: tau hi śulkaharau duhituḥ anyatarābhāve'nyataro vā
tadātmaputrasnuṣābharmaṇi pravāsāpratividhāne ca bhāryāyā bhoktumadoṣaḥ pratirodhakavyādhidurbhikṣabhayapratīkāre dharmakārye ca patyuḥ sambhūya vā dampatyormithunaṃ prajātayoḥ
gāndharvāsuropabhuktaṃ savṛddhikamubhayaṃ dāpyeta rākṣasapaiśācopabhuktaṃ steyaṃ dadyāt
mṛte bhartari dharmakāmā tadānīmeva sthāpyābharaṇaṃ śulkaśeṣaṃ ca labheta
jīvati bhartari mṛtāyāḥ putrā duhitaraśca strīdhanaṃ vibhajeranaputrāyā duhitaraḥ tadabhāve bhartā
śulkamanvādheyamanyadvā bandhubhirdattaṃ bāndhavā hareyuḥ | iti strīdhanakalpaḥ
varṣāṇyaṣṭāvaprajāyamānāmaputrāṃ vandhyāṃ cākāṅkṣeta daśa nindum dvādaśa kanyāprasavinīm
tasyātikrame śulkaṃ strīdhanamardhaṃ cādhivedanikaṃ dadyāt caturviṃśatipaṇaparaṃ ca daṇḍam
śulkaṃ strīdhanamaśulkastrīdhanāyāstatpramāṇamādhivedanikamanurūpāṃ ca vṛttiṃ dattvā bahvīrapi vindeta
tīrthasamavāye cāsāṃ yathāvivāhaṃ pūrvoḍhāṃ jīvatputrāṃ vā pūrvaṃ gacchet
putravatīṃ dharmakāmāṃ vandhyāṃ ninduṃ nīrajaskāṃ vā nākāmāmupeyāt
na cākāmaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṣṭhinīmunmattāṃ vā gacchet
dvādaśavarṣā strī prāptavyavahārā bhavati ṣoḍaśavarṣaḥ pumān
ata ūrdhvamaśuśrūṣāyāṃ dvādaśapaṇaḥ striyā daṇḍaḥ puṃso dviguṇaḥ | iti śuśrūṣā
bharmaṇyāyāmanirdiṣṭakālāyāṃ grāsācchādanaṃ vādhikaṃ yathāpuruṣaparivāpaṃ saviśeṣaṃ dadyāt
nirdiṣṭakālāyāṃ tadeva saṃkhyāya bandhaṃ ca dadyāt
śvaśurakulapraviṣṭāyāṃ vibhaktāyāṃ vā nābhiyojyaḥ patiḥ | iti bharma
naṣṭe vinaṣṭe nyaṅge apitṛke amātṛke ityanirdeśena vinayagrāhaṇam
īrṣyayā bāhyavihāreṣu dvāreṣvatyayo yathānirdiṣṭaḥ | iti pāruṣyam
bhartāraṃ dviṣatī strī saptārtavānyamaṇḍayamānā tadānīmeva sthāpyābharaṇaṃ nidhāya bhartāramanyayā saha śayānamanuśayīta
dṛṣṭaliṅge maithunāpahāre savarṇāpasarpopagame vā mithyāvādī dvādaśapaṇaṃ dadyāt
amokṣyā bharturakāmasya dviṣatī bhāryā bhāryāyāśca bhartā
pratiṣiddhā strī darpamadyakrīḍāyāṃ tripaṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt
divā strīprekṣāvihāragamane ṣaṭpaṇo daṇḍaḥ puruṣaprekṣāvihāragamane dvādaśapaṇaḥ
strīpuṃsayormaithunārthenāṅgaviceṣṭāyāṃ raho'ślīlasambhāṣāyāṃ vā caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ striyā daṇḍaḥ puṃso dviguṇaḥ
strīṇāṃ grāmamadhye caṇḍālaḥ pakṣāntare pañcaśiphā dadyāt
pratiṣiddhayoḥ strīpuṃsayoranyonyopakāre kṣudrakadravyāṇāṃ dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ sthūlakadravyāṇāṃ caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ hiraṇyasuvarṇayoścatuṣpañcāśatpaṇaḥ striyā daṇḍaḥ puṃsordviguṇaḥ
ta evāgamyayorardhadaṇḍāḥ tathā pratiṣiddhapuruṣavyavahāreṣu ca | iti pratiṣedhaḥ
patikulānniṣpatitāyāḥ striyāḥ ṣaṭpaṇo daṇḍaḥ anyatra viprakārāt
tatrāpi gūhamānā strīdhanaṃ jīyeta jñātayo vā chādayantaḥ śulkaśeṣam | iti niṣpatanam
gamyena vā puṃsā saha prasthāne caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ sarvadharmalopaśca anyatra bharmadānatīrthagamanābhyām
puṃsaḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ tulyaśreyasoḥ pāpīyaso madhyamaḥ
pathi vyantare gūḍhadeśābhigamane maithunārthena śaṅkitapratiṣiddhāyāṃ vā pathyanusaraṇe saṃgrahaṇaṃ vidyāt
pratiṣiddhe vā nayataḥ puṃsaḥ striyo vā gacchantyāsta evārdhadaṇḍāḥ | iti pathyanusaraṇam
hrasvapravāsināṃ śūdravaiśyakṣatriyabrāhmaṇānāṃ bhāryāḥ saṃvatsarottaraṃ kālamākāṅkṣeranaprajātāḥ saṃvatsarādhikaṃ prajātāḥ
aprativihitāḥ sukhāvasthā bibhṛyuḥ paraṃ catvāri varṣāṇyaṣṭau vā jñātayaḥ
kuṭumbarddhilope vā sukhāvasthairvimuktā yatheṣṭaṃ vindeta jīvitārthamāpadgatā vā
dharmavivāhātkumārī parigrahītāramanākhyāya proṣitamaśrūyamāṇaṃ sapta tīrthānyākāṅkṣeta saṃvatsaraṃ śrūyamāṇam
ākhyāya proṣitamaśrūyamāṇaṃ pañca tīrthānyākāṅkṣeta daśa śrūyamāṇam
ekadeśadattaśulkaṃ trīṇi tīrthānyaśrūyamāṇaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ sapta tīrthānyākāṅkṣeta
tīrthoparodho hi dharmavadha iti kauṭilyaḥ | iti hrasvapravāsaḥ
dīrghapravāsinaḥ pravrajitasya pretasya vā bhāryā sapta tīrthānyākāṅkṣeta saṃvatsaraṃ prajātā
bahuṣu pratyāsannaṃ dhārmikaṃ bharmasamarthaṃ kaniṣṭhamabhāryaṃ vā
apitṛdravyā vibhaktapitṛdravyā vā saha jīvantaḥ punarvibhajeran
dravyamaputrasya sodaryā bhrātaraḥ sahajīvino vā hareyuḥ kanyāśca
rikthaṃ putravataḥ putrā duhitaro vā dharmiṣṭheṣu vivāheṣu jātāḥ
apitṛkā bahavo'pi ca bhrātaro bhrātṛputrāśca piturekamaṃśaṃ hareyuḥ
pitṛbhrātṛputrāṇāṃ pūrve vidyamāne nāparamavalambante jyeṣṭhe ca kaniṣṭhamarthagrāhiṇam
aprāptavyavahārāṇāṃ deyaviśuddhaṃ mātṛbandhuṣu grāmavṛddheṣu vā sthāpayeyuḥ āvyavahāraprāpaṇātproṣitasya vā
etāvānarthaḥ sāmānyastasyaitāvānpratyaṃśa ityanubhāṣya bruvan sākṣiṣu vibhāgaṃ kārayet

lg.l: teṣāṃ ca kṛtadārāṇāṃ lupte prajanane sati

div.p: ekastrīputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭhāṃśaḥ brāhmaṇānāmajāḥ kṣatriyāṇāmaśvāḥ vaiśyānāṃ gāvaḥ śūdrāṇāmavayaḥ
catuṣpadābhāve ratnavarjānāṃ daśānāṃ bhāgaṃ dravyāṇāmekaṃ jyeṣṭho haret
pituḥ parivāpād yānamābharaṇaṃ ca jyeṣṭhāṃśaḥ śayanāsanaṃ bhuktakāṃsyaṃ ca madhyamāṃśaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ dhānyāyasaṃ gṛhaparivāpo gośakaṭaṃ ca kaniṣṭhāṃśaḥ
mānuṣahīno jyeṣṭhastṛtīyamaṃśaṃ jyeṣṭhāṃśāl labheta caturthamanyāyavṛttiḥ nivṛttadharmakāryo vā
nānāstrīputrāṇāṃ tu saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayoḥ kanyākṛtakṣatayorabhāve ca ekasyāḥ putrayoryamayorvā pūrvajanmanā jyeṣṭhabhāvaḥ
cāturvarṇyaputrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇīputraścaturo'ṃśān haretkṣatriyāputrastrīnaṃśānvaiśyāputro dvāvaṃśau ekaṃ śūdrāputraḥ
brāhmaṇānāṃ tu pāraśavastṛtīyamaṃśaṃ labheta dvāvaṃśau sapiṇḍaḥ kulyo vāsannaḥ svadhādānahetoḥ

lg.l: kṣetre vā janayedasya niyuktaḥ kṣetrajaṃ sutam

div.p: sagotreṇānyagotreṇa vā niyuktena kṣetrajātaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ
janayiturasatyanyasminputre sa eva dvipitṛko dvigotro vā dvayorapi svadhārikthabhāgbhavati
brāhmaṇasya vaiśyāyāmambaṣṭhaḥ śūdrāyāṃ niṣādaḥ pāraśavo vā
ta ete pratilomāḥ svadharmātikramād rājñaḥ sambhavanti
teṣāṃ svayonau vivāhaḥ pūrvāparagāmitvaṃ vṛttānuvṛttaṃ ca

lg.l: deśasya jātyāḥ saṃghasya dharmo grāmasya vāpi yaḥ

div.p: abhūtaṃ vā parakuḍyādapakramya dvāvaratnī tripadīṃ vā deśabandhaṃ kārayet
avaskaraṃ bhramamudapānaṃ vā na gṛhocitādanyatra anyatra sūtikākūpādānirdaśāhāditi
tripadīpratikrāntamadhyardhamaratniṃ vā gāḍhaprasṛtamudakamārgaṃ prasravaṇaprapātaṃ vā kārayet
ekapadīpratikrāntamaratniṃ vā cakricatuṣpadasthānamagniṣṭhamudañjarasthānaṃ rocanīṃ kuṭṭanīṃ vā kārayet
sarvavāstukayoḥ prākṣiptakayorvā śālayoḥ kiṣkurantarikā tripadī vā
sambhūya vā gṛhasvāmino yatheṣṭaṃ kārayeyuḥ aniṣṭaṃ vārayeyuḥ
tasyātikrame pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ pratilomadvāravātāyanabādhāyāṃ ca anyatra rājamārgarathyābhyaḥ
sāmānye veśmani sāhāyyamaprayacchataḥ sāmānyamuparundhato bhogaṃ ca gṛhe dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ

lg.l: vivṛtānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sāmānyo bhoga iṣyate

div.p: sāmantacatvāriṃśatkulyeṣu gṛhapratimukhe veśma śrāvayeyuḥ sāmantagrāmavṛddheṣu kṣetramārāmaṃ setubandhaṃ taṭākamādhāraṃ vā maryādāsu yathāsetubhogaṃ anenārgheṇa kaḥ kretā iti
spardhayā vā mūlyavardhane mūlyavṛddhiḥ saśulkā kośaṃ gacchet
pratikruṣṭātikrame vāstuni dviśato daṇḍaḥ anyatra caturviṃśatipaṇo daṇḍaḥ | iti vāstuvikrayaḥ
sīmavivādaṃ grāmayorubhayoḥ sāmantā pañcagrāmī daśagrāmī vā setubhiḥ sthāvaraiḥ kṛtrimairvā kuryāt
karṣakagopālakavṛddhāḥ pūrvabhuktikā vā bāhyāḥ setūnāmabhijñā bahava eko vā nirdiśya sīmasetūnviparītaveṣāḥ sīmānaṃ nayeyuḥ
tadeva nīte sīmāpahāriṇāṃ setucchidāṃ ca kuryāt
pranaṣṭasetubhogaṃ vā sīmānaṃ rājā yathopakāraṃ vibhajet | iti sīmavivādaḥ
teṣāṃ dvaidhībhāve yato bahavaḥ śucayo'numatā vā tato niyaccheyuḥ madhyaṃ vā gṛhṇīyuḥ
kāraṇādāne prayāsamājīvaṃ ca parisaṃkhyāya bandhaṃ dadyāt | iti kṣetravivādaḥ
taṭākasetubandhānāṃ navapravartane pāñcavarṣikaḥ parihāraḥ bhagnotsṛṣṭānāṃ cāturvarṣikaḥ samupārūḍhānāṃ traivarṣikaḥ sthalasya dvaivarṣikaḥ
karmodakamārgamucitaṃ rundhataḥ kurvato'nucitaṃ vā pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ setukūpapuṇyasthānacaityadevāyatanāni ca parabhūmau niveśayataḥ
pūrvānuvṛttaṃ dharmasetumādhānaṃ vikrayaṃ vā nayato nāyayato vā madhyamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ śrotṛṛṇāmuttamaḥ anyatra bhagnotsṛṣṭāt

kṣudrapaśumanuṣyapathaṃ rundhato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ mahāpaśupathaṃ caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ hastikṣetrapathaṃ catuṣpañcāśatpaṇaḥ setuvanapathaṃ ṣaṭśataḥ śmaśānagrāmapathaṃ dviśataḥ droṇamukhapathaṃ pañcaśataḥ sthānīyarāṣṭravivītapathaṃ sāhasraḥ
kṣetrikasyākṣipataḥ kṣetramupavāsasya vā tyajato bījakāle dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ anyatra doṣopanipātāviṣahyebhyaḥ
karadāḥ karadeṣvādhānaṃ vikrayaṃ vā kuryuḥ brahmadeyikā brahmadeyikeṣu
karadaṃ tu praviśataḥ sarvadravyeṣu prākāmyaṃ syāt anyatrāgārāt
vivītaṃ bhakṣayitvāpasṛtānāmuṣṭramahiṣāṇāṃ pādikaṃ rūpaṃ gṛhṇīyuḥ gavāśvakharāṇāṃ cārdhapādikaṃ kṣudrapaśūnāṃ ṣoḍaśabhāgikam
bhakṣayitvā niṣaṇṇānāmeta eva dviguṇā daṇḍāḥ parivasatāṃ caturguṇāḥ
sasyabhakṣaṇe sasyopaghātaṃ niṣpattitaḥ parisaṃkhyāya dviguṇaṃ dāpayet
vāṭabhede dviguṇaḥ veśmakhalavalayagatānāṃ ca dhānyānāṃ bhakṣaṇe
abhayavanamṛgāḥ parigṛhītā vā bhakṣayantaḥ svāmino nivedya yathāvadhyāstathā pratiṣeddhavyāḥ
prārthayamānā dṛṣṭāparādhā vā sarvopāyairniyantavyāḥ | iti kṣetrapathahiṃsā
karmākaraṇe karmavetanadviguṇam hiraṇyādāne pratyaṃśadviguṇam bhakṣyapeyādāne ca prahavaṇeṣu dviguṇamaṃśaṃ dadyāt
pracchannaśravaṇekṣaṇe ca sarvahite ca karmaṇi nigraheṇa dviguṇamaṃśaṃ dadyāt
taṃ cetsambhūya vā hanyuḥ pṛthageṣāmaparādhadviguṇo daṇḍaḥ
prahavaṇeṣu caiṣāṃ brāhmaṇā nākāmāḥ kuryuḥ aṃśaṃ ca labheran

lg.l: rājā deśahitān setūn kurvatāṃ pathi saṃkramān

div.p: sapādapaṇā dharmyā māsavṛddhiḥ paṇaśatasya pañcapaṇā vyāvahārikī daśapaṇā kāntāragāṇām viṃśatipaṇā sāmudrāṇām
tataḥ paraṃ kartuḥ kārayituśca pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ śrotṛṛṇāmekaikaṃ pratyardhadaṇḍaḥ
dhānyavṛddhiḥ sasyaniṣpattāv upārdhā paraṃ mūlyakṛtā vardheta
akṛtvā vṛddhiṃ sādhayato vardhayato vā mūlyaṃ vā vṛddhimāropya śrāvayato bandhacaturguṇo daṇḍaḥ
pretasya putrāḥ kusīdaṃ dadyuḥ dāyādā vā rikthaharāḥ sahagrāhiṇaḥ pratibhuvo vā
asaṃkhyātadeśakālaṃ tu putrāḥ pautrā dāyādā vā rikthaṃ haramāṇā dadyuḥ
nānarṇasamavāye tu naikaṃ dvau yugapadabhivadeyātāmanyatra pratiṣṭhamānāt
tatrāpi gṛhītānupūrvyā rājaśrotriyadravyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ pratipādayet
asmapratipattau tu sākṣiṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ prātyayikāḥ śucayo'numatā vā trayo'varārdhyāḥ
pakṣānumatau vā dvau ṛṇaṃ prati na tvevaikaḥ
rahasyavyavahāreṣvekā strī puruṣa upaśrotā upadraṣṭā vā sākṣī syād rājatāpasavarjam
svāmino bhṛtyānāmṛtvigācāryāḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ mātāpitarau putrāṇāṃ cānigraheṇa sākṣyaṃ kuryuḥ tesāmitare vā
parasparābhiyoge caiṣāmuttamāḥ paroktā daśabandhaṃ dadyuḥ avarāḥ pañcabandham | iti sākṣyadhikāraḥ
rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā mā taveṣṭāpūrtaphalaṃ kapālahastaḥ śatrukulaṃ bhikṣārthī gaccheḥ iti
śūdraṃ janmamaraṇāntare yadvaḥ puṇyaphalaṃ tad rājānaṃ gacched rājñaśca kilbiṣaṃ yuṣmānanyathāvāde daṇḍaścānubaddhaḥ paścādapi jñāyeta yathādṛṣṭaśrutamekamantrāḥ satyamupaharata iti
anupaharatāṃ saptarātrādūrdhvaṃ dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ tripakṣādūrdhvamabhiyogaṃ dadyuḥ
sākṣibhede yato bahavaḥ śucayo'numatā vā tato niyaccheyuḥ madhyaṃ vā gṛhṇīyuḥ
bāliśyādabhiyokturvā duhśrutaṃ durlikhitaṃ pretābhiniveśaṃ vā samīkṣya sākṣipratyayameva syāt
sākṣibāliṣyeṣveva pṛthaganuyoge deśakālakāryāṇāṃ pūrvamadhyamottamā daṇḍāḥ ityauśanasāḥ
kūṭasākṣiṇo yamarthamabhūtaṃ kuryurbhūtaṃ vā nāśayeyustaddaśaguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyuḥ iti mānavāḥ
bāliśyādvā visaṃvādayatāṃ citro ghātaḥ iti bārhaspatyāḥ

paracakrāṭavikābhyāṃ durgarāṣṭravilope vā pratirodhakairvā grāmasārthavrajavilope cakrayuktanāśe vā grāmamadhyāgnyudakābādhe jvālāvegoparuddhe vā nāvi nimagnāyāṃ muṣitāyāṃ vā svayamuparūḍho nopanidhimabhyāvahet
upanidhibhoktā deśakālānurūpaṃ bhogavetanaṃ dadyātdvādaśapaṇaṃ ca daṇḍam
upabhoganimittaṃ naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vābhyāvahet caturviṃśatipaṇaśca daṇḍaḥ anyathā vā niṣpatane
nādhiḥ sopakāraḥ sīdet na cāsya mūlyaṃ vardheta anyatra nisargāt
prayojakāsamnidhāne vā grāmavṛddheṣu sthāpayitvā niṣkrayamādhiṃ pratipadyeta
dhāraṇikāsamnidhāne vā vināśabhayādudgatārghaṃ dharmasthānujñāto vikrīṇīta ādhipālapratyayo vā
sārthenānvādhihasto vā pradiṣṭāṃ bhūmimaprāptaścorairbhagnotsṛṣṭo vā nānvādhimabhyāvahet
bhreṣopanipātābhyāṃ deśakāloparodhi dattaṃ naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā nābhyāvaheyuḥ
vaiyāvṛtyavikrayastu vaiyāvṛtyakarā yathādeśakālaṃ vikrīṇānāḥ paṇyaṃ yathājātaṃ mūlyamudayaṃ ca dadyuḥ
deśakālātipātane vā parihīṇaṃ sampradānakālikenārgheṇa mūlyamudayaṃ ca dadyuḥ
yathāsambhāṣitaṃ vā vikrīṇānā nodayamadhigaccheyuḥ mūlyameva dadyuḥ
arghapatane vā parihīṇaṃ yathāparihīṇaṃ mūlyamūnaṃ dadyuḥ
sāṃvyavahārikeṣu vā prātyayikeṣvarājavācyeṣu bhreṣopanipātābhyāṃ naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā mūlyamapi na dadyuḥ
deśakālāntaritānāṃ tu paṇyānāṃ kṣayavyayaviśuddhaṃ mūlyamudayaṃ ca dadyuḥ paṇyasamavāyānāṃ ca pratyaṃśam
karaṇahīnaṃ nikṣepamapavyayamānaṃ gūḍhabhittinyastān sākṣiṇo nikṣeptā rahasi praṇipātena prajñāpayet vanānte vā madyaprahavaṇaviśvāsena
rahasi vṛddho vyādhito vā vaidehakaḥ kaścitkṛtalakṣaṇaṃ dravyamasya haste nikṣipyāpagacchet
tasya pratideśena putro bhrātā vābhigamya nikṣepaṃ yāceta
dāne śuciḥ anyathā nikṣepaṃ steyadaṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt
pravrajyābhimukho vā śraddheyaḥ kaścitkṛtalakṣaṇaṃ dravyamasya haste nikṣipya pratiṣṭheta
dāne śuciḥ anyathā nikṣepaṃ steyadaṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt
bāliśajātīyo vā rātrau rājadāyikākṣaṇabhītaḥ sāramasya haste nikṣipyāpagacchet
dāne śuciḥ anyathā nikṣepaṃ steyadaṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt

lg.l: sve pare vā jane kāryaṃ deśakālāgravarṇataḥ

div.p: athavāryamādhāya kulabandhana āryāṇāmāpadi niṣkrayaṃ cādhigamya bālaṃ sāhāyyadātāraṃ vā pūrvaṃ niṣkrīṇīran
pretaviṇmūtrocchiṣṭagrāhaṇamāhitasya nagnasnāpanaṃ daṇḍapreṣaṇamatikramaṇaṃ ca strīṇāṃ mūlyanāśakaraṃ dhātrīparicārikārdhasītikopacārikāṇāṃ ca mokṣakaram
dhātrīmāhitikāṃ vākāmāṃ svavaśāṃ gacchataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ paravaśāṃ madhyamaḥ
kanyāmāhitikāṃ vā svayamanyena vā duṣayato mūlyanāśaḥ śulkaṃ taddvuguṇaśca daṇḍaḥ
ātmādhigataṃ svāmikarmāviruddhaṃ labheta pitryaṃ ca dāyam
āryaprāṇo dhvajāhṛtaḥ karmakālānurūpeṇa mūlyārdhena vā vimucyeta

gṛhejātadāyāgatalabdhakrītānāmanyatamaṃ dāsamūnāṣṭavarṣaṃ vibandhumakāmaṃ nīce karmaṇi videśe dāsīṃ vā sagarbhāmaprativihitagarbhabharmaṇyāṃ vikrayādhānaṃ nayataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ kretṛśrotṛṛṇāṃ ca
svāminaḥ svasyāṃ dāsyāṃ jātaṃ samātṛkamadāsaṃ vidyāt
gṛhyā cetkuṭumbārthacintanī mātā bhrātā bhaginī cāsyā adāsāḥ syuḥ
dāsaṃ dāsīṃ vā niṣkrīya punarvikrayādhānaṃ nayato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ anyatra svayaṃ vādibhyaḥ | iti dāsakalpaḥ
karṣakaḥ sasyānāṃ gopālakaḥ sarpiṣāṃ vaidehakaḥ paṇyānāmātmanā vyavahṛtānāṃ daśabhāgamasambhāṣitavetano labheta
kāruśilpikuśīlavacikitsakavāgjīvanaparicārakādirāśākārikavargastu yathānyastadvidhaḥ kuryād yathā vā kuśalāḥ kalpayeyustathā vetanaṃ labheta
gṛhītvā vetanaṃ karmākurvato bhṛtakasya dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ saṃrodhaścākaraṇāt
aśaktaḥ kutsite karmaṇi vyādhau vyasane vānuśayaṃ labheta pareṇa vā kārayitum
nānyastvayā kārayitavyo mayā vā nānyasya kartavyamityavarodhe bharturakārayato bhṛtakasyākurvato vā dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
sa cedalpamapi kārayitvā na kārayetkṛtamevāsya vidyāt
saṃghabhṛtāḥ sambhūyasamutthātāro vā yathāsambhāṣitaṃ vetanaṃ samaṃ vā vibhajeran
karṣaṇavaidehakā vā sasyapaṇyārambhaparyavasānāntare sannasya yathākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ pratyaṃśaṃ dadyuḥ
saṃsiddhe tūddhṛtapaṇye sannasya tadānīmeva pratyaṃśaṃ dadyuḥ
prakrānte tu karmaṇi svasthasyāpakrāmato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
coraṃ tvabhayapūrvaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyaṃśena grāhayeddadyātpratyaṃśamabhayaṃ ca
yājakāḥ svāpracāradravyavarjaṃ yathāsambhāṣitaṃ vetanaṃ samaṃ vā vibhajeran
agniṣṭomādiṣu ca kratuṣu dīkṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ tṛtīyamaṃśaṃ madhyamopasada ūrdhvamardhamaṃśaṃ sutye prātaḥsavanādūrdhvaṃ pādonamaṃśam
sanānāmādaśāhorātrāccheṣabhṛtāḥ karma kuryuḥ anye vā svapratyayāḥ
karmaṇyasamāpte tu yajamānaḥ sīdedṛtvijaḥ karma samāpayya dakṣiṇāṃ hareyuḥ
asamāpte tu karmaṇi yājyaṃ yājakaṃ vā tyajataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ
vikrīya paṇyamaprayacchato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ anyatra doṣopanipātāviṣahyebhyaḥ
krītvā paṇyamapratigṛhṇato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ anyatra doṣopanipātāviṣahyebhyaḥ
vivāhānāṃ tu trayāṇāṃ pūrveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ pāṇigrahaṇātsiddhamupāvartanaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca prakarmaṇaḥ
kanyādoṣamaupaśāyikamanākhyāya prayacchataḥ kanyāṃ ṣaṇṇavatirdaṇḍaḥ śulkastrīdhanapratidānaṃ ca
tāvatā hi kālena śakyaṃ śaucāśauce jñātum

lg.l: dātā pratigrahītā ca syātāṃ nopahatau yathā
dāne kraye vānuśayaṃ tathā kuryuḥ sabhāsadaḥ

div.p: dharmadānamasādhuṣu karmasu cāupaghātikeṣu vā arthadānamanupakāriṣvapakāriṣu vā kāmadānamanarheṣu ca
yathā ca dātā pratigrahītā ca nopahatau syātāṃ tathānuśayaṃ kuśalāḥ kalpayeyuḥ
prātibhāvyaṃ daṇḍaśulkaśeṣamākṣikaṃ saurikaṃ ca nākāmaḥ putro dāyādo vā rikthaharo dadyāt | iti dattasyānapākarma
sa cedācārakramaṃ darśayeta na vikretāraṃ tasya dravyasyātisargeṇa mucyeta
vikretā ceddṛśyeta mūlyaṃ steyadaṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt
pañcapaṇikaṃ dvipadarūpasya niṣkrayaṃ dadyāt catuṣpaṇikamekakhurasya dvipaṇikaṃ gomahiṣasya pādikaṃ kṣudrapaśūnām
paracakrāṭavīhṛtaṃ tu pratyānīya rājā yathāsvaṃ prayacchet
svayaṃ grāheṇāhṛtaṃ pratyānīya tanniṣkrayaṃ vā prayacchet
paraviṣayādvā vikrameṇānītaṃ yathāpradiṣṭaṃ rājñā bhuñjīta anyatrāryaprāṇebhyo devabrāhmaṇatapasvidravyebhyaśca | ityasvāmivikrayaḥ
yatsvaṃ dravyamanyairbhujyamānaṃ daśa varṣāṇyupekṣeta hīyetāsya anyatra bālavṛddhavyādhitavyasaniproṣitadeśatyāgarājyavibhramebhyaḥ
jñātayaḥ śrotriyāḥ pāṣaṇḍā vā rājñāmasaṃnidhau paravāstuṣu vivasanto na bhogena hareyuḥ upanidhimādhiṃ nidhiṃ nikṣepaṃ striyaṃ sīmānaṃ rājaśrotriyadravyāṇi ca
āśramiṇaḥ pāṣaṇḍā vā mahatyavakāśe parasparamabādhamānā vaseyuḥ
vivādapadeṣu caiṣāṃ yāvantaḥ paṇā daṇḍāstāvatī rātrīḥ kṣapaṇābhiṣekāgnikāryamahākacchavardhanāni rājñaścareyuḥ
ratnasāraphalgukupyānāṃ sāhase mūlyasamo daṇḍaḥ iti mānavāḥ
striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vābhiṣahya badhnato bandhayato bandhaṃ vā mokṣayataḥ pañcaśatāvaraḥ sahasrapara uttamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ | ityācāryāḥ
yaḥ sāhasaṃ pratipattā iti kārayati sa dviguṇaṃ dadyāt
yāvadd hiraṇyamupayokṣyate tāvaddāsyāmi iti sa caturguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt
yaḥ etāvadd hiraṇyaṃ dāsyāmi iti pramāṇamuddiśya kārayati sa yathoktaṃ hiraṇyaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt iti bārhaspatyāḥ
sa cetkopaṃ madaṃ mohaṃ vāpadiśed yathoktavaddaṇḍamenaṃ kuryāditi kauṭilyaḥ
śarīraprakṛtiśrutavṛttijanapadānāṃ śarīropavāde kāṇakhañjādibhiḥ satye tripaṇo daṇḍaḥ mithyopavāde ṣaṭpaṇo daṇḍaḥ
śobhanākṣimantaḥ iti kāṇakhañjādīnāṃ stutinindāyāṃ dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
kuṣṭhonmādaklaibyādibhiḥ kutsāyāṃ ca satyamithyāstutinindāsu dvādaśapaṇottarā daṇḍāstulyeṣu
viśiṣṭeṣu dviguṇāḥ hīneṣvardhadaṇḍāḥ parastrīṣu dviguṇāḥ pramādamadamohādibhirardhadaṇḍāḥ
kuṣṭhonmādayościkitsakāḥ saṃnikṛṣṭā pumāṃsaśca pramāṇaṃ klībabhāve striyo mūtrapheno'psu viṣṭhānimajjanaṃ ca
prakṛtyupavāde brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrāntāvasāyināmapareṇa pūrvasya tripaṇottarā daṇḍāḥ pūrveṇāparasya dvipaṇādharāḥ kubrāhmaṇādibhiśca kutsāyām
tena śrutopavādo vāgjīvanānāṃ kārukuśīlavānāṃ vṛttyupavādaḥ prājjūṇakagāndhārādīnāṃ ca janapadopavādā vyākhyātāḥ
yaḥ paraṃ evaṃ tvāṃ kariṣyāmi iti karaṇenābhibhartsayedakaraṇe yastasya karaṇe daṇḍastato'rdhadaṇḍaṃ dadyāt
aśaktaḥ kopaṃ madaṃ mohaṃ vāpadiśeddvādaśapaṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt
nābheradhaḥkāyaṃ hastapaṅkabhasmapāṃsubhiriti spṛśatastripaṇo daṇḍaḥ tairevāmedhyaiḥ pādaṣṭhīvikābhyāṃ ca ṣaṭpaṇaḥ chardimūtrapurīṣādibhirdvādaśapaṇaḥ
viśiṣṭeṣu dviguṇāḥ hīneṣvardhadaṇḍāḥ parastrīṣu dviguṇāḥ pramādamadamohādibhirardhadaṇḍāḥ
hastenāvagūrṇe tripaṇāvaro dvādaśapaṇaparo daṇḍaḥ pādena dviguṇaḥ duḥkhotpādanena dravyeṇa pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ prāṇābādhikena madhyamaḥ
mṛtakalpamaśoṇitaṃ ghnato hastapādapārañcikaṃ vā kurvataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ pāṇipādadantabhaṅge karṇanāsācchedane vraṇavidāraṇe cca anyatra duṣṭavraṇebhyaḥ
sakthigrīvābhañjane netrabhedane vā vākyaceṣṭābhojanoparodheṣu ca madhyamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ samutthānavyayaśca
kalahe pūrvāgato jayati akṣamamāṇo hi pradhāvati ityācāryāḥ
pūrvaṃ paścādvābhigatasya sākṣiṇaḥ pramāṇamasākṣike ghātaḥ kalahopaliṅganaṃ vā
