kalahe dravyamapaharato daśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ kṣudrakadravyahiṃsāyāṃ tacca tāvacca daṇḍaḥ sthūlakadravyahiṃsāyāṃ tacca dviguṇaśca daṇḍaḥ vastrābharaṇahiraṇyasuvarṇabhāṇḍahiṃsāyāṃ tacca pūrvaśca sāhasadaṇḍaḥ
parakuḍyamabhighātena kṣobhayatastripaṇo daṇḍaḥ chedanabhedane ṣaṭpaṇaḥ pratīkāraśca
duḥkhotpādanaṃ dravyamanyaveśmani prakṣipato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ prāṇābādhikaṃ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ
kṣudrapaśūnāṃ kāṣṭhādibhirduḥkhotpādane paṇo dviguṇo vā daṇḍaḥ śoṇitotpādane dviguṇaḥ
puropavanavanaspatīnāṃ puṣpaphalacchāyāvatāṃ prarohacchedane ṣaṭpaṇaḥ kṣudraśākhācchedane dvādaśapaṇaḥ pīnaśākhāccchedane caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ skandhavadhe pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ samucchittau madhyamaḥ

lg.l: ta eva dviguṇā daṇḍāḥ kāryā rājavaneṣu ca

div.p: dyūtābhiyoge jetuḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ parājitasya madhyamaḥ
bāliśajātīyo hyeṣa jetukāmaḥ parājayaṃ na kṣamate ityācāryāḥ
kākaṇyakṣāṇāmanyopadhāne dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ kūṭakarmaṇi pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍo jitapratyādānamupadhau steyadaṇḍaśca
tena samāhvayo vyākhyātaḥ anyatra vidyāśilpasamāhvayāt | iti

prakīrṇakaṃ tu yācitakāvakrītakāhitakanikṣepakāṇāṃ yathādeśakālamadāne yāmacchāyāsamupaveśasaṃsthitīnāṃ vā deśakālātipātane gulmataradeyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ sādhayataḥ prativeśānuveśayorupari nimantraṇe ca dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ

saṃdiṣṭamarthamaprayacchato bhrātṛbhāryāṃ hastena laṅghayato rūpājīvāmanyoparuddhāṃ gacchataḥ paravaktavyaṃ paṇyaṃ krīṇānasya samudraṃ gṛhamudbhindataḥ sāmantacatvāriṃśatkulyābādhāmācarataścāṣṭacatvāriṃśatpaṇo daṇḍaḥ

kulanīvīgrāhakasyāpavyayane vidhavāṃ chandavāsinīṃ prasahyādhicarataḥ caṇḍālasyāryāṃ spṛśataḥ pratyāsannamāpadyanabhidhāvato niṣkāraṇamabhidhāvanaṃ kurvataḥ śākyājīvakādīnvṛṣalapravrajitāndevapitṛkāryeṣu bhojayataḥ śatyo daṇḍaḥ
śapathavākyānuyogamaniṣṛṣṭaṃ kurvataḥ yuktakarma cāyuktasya kṣudrapaśuvṛṣāṇāṃ puṃstvopaghātinaḥ dāsyā garbhamauṣadhena pātayataśca pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ

pitāputrayordampatyorbhrātṛbhaginyormātulabhagineyayoḥ śiṣyācāryayorvā parasparamapatitaṃ tyajataḥ sārthābhiprayātaṃ grāmamadhye vā tyajataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ kāntāre madhyamaḥ tannimittaṃ bhreṣayata uttamaḥ sahaprasthāyiṣvanyeṣvardhadaṇḍāḥ
puruṣamabandhanīyaṃ badhnato bandhayato bandhaṃ vā mokṣayato bālamaprāptavyavahāraṃ badhnato bandhayato vā sahasraṃ daṇḍaḥ
devabrāhmaṇatapasvistrībālavṛddhavyādhitānāmanāthānāmanabhisaratāṃ dharmasthāḥ kāryāṇi kuryuḥ na ca deśakālabhogacchalenātihareyuḥ
arthyapratīkārāḥ kāruśāsitāraḥ saṃnikṣeptāraḥ svavittakāravaḥ śreṇīpramāṇā nikṣepaṃ gṛhṇīyuḥ
nirdiṣṭadeśakālakāryaṃ ca karma kuryuḥ anirdiṣṭadeśakālaṃ kāryāpadeśam
mānahīne hīnāvahīnaṃ vetanaṃ taddviguṇaśca daṇḍaḥ tulāhīne hīnacaturguṇo daṇḍaḥ sūtraparivartane mūlyadviguṇaḥ
anyatra nenijato vastropaghātaṃ ṣaṭpaṇaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ dadyuḥ
paravastravikrayāvakrayādhāneṣu ca dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ parivartane mūlyadviguṇo vastradānaṃ ca
mukulāvadātaṃ śilāpaṭṭaśuddhaṃ dhautasūtravarṇaṃ pramṛṣṭaśvetaṃ caikarātrottaraṃ dadyuḥ
pañcarātrikaṃ tanurāgaṃ ṣaḍrātrikaṃ nīlaṃ puṣpalākṣāmañjiṣṭhāraktaṃ guruparikarma yatnopacāryaṃ jātyaṃ vāsaḥ saptarātrikam
parārdhyānāṃ paṇo vetanaṃ madhyamānāmardhapaṇaḥ pratyavarāṇāṃ pādaḥ sthūlakānāṃ māṣakadvimāṣakaṃ dviguṇaṃ raktakānām
suvarṇakārāṇāmaśucihastād rūpyaṃ suvarṇamanākhyāya sarūpaṃ krīṇatāṃ dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ virūpaṃ caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ corahastādaṣṭacatvāriṃśatpaṇaḥ
varṇotkarṣamapasāraṇaṃ yogaṃ vā sādhayataḥ pañcaśato daṇḍaḥ
rūpadarśakasya sthitāṃ paṇayātrāmakopyāṃ kopayataḥ kopyāmakopayato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ
kūṭarūpaṃ kārayataḥ pratigṛhṇato niryāpayato vā sahasraṃ daṇḍaḥ kośe prakṣipato vadhaḥ
carakapāṃsudhāvakāḥ sāratribhāgaṃ dvau rājā ratnaṃ ca
khaniratnanidhinivedaneṣu ṣaṣṭhamaṃśaṃ nivettā labheta dvādaśamaṃśaṃ bhṛtakaḥ
paurvapauruṣikaṃ nidhiṃ jānapadaḥ śuciḥ svakaraṇena samagraṃ labheta
bhiṣajaḥ prāṇābādhikamanākhyāyopakramamāṇasya vipattau pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ karmāparādhena vipattau madhyamaḥ
saṃsthādhyakṣaḥ paṇyasaṃsthāyāṃ purāṇabhāṇḍānāṃ svakaraṇaviśuddhānāmādhānaṃ vikrayaṃ vā sthāpayet
tulāmānābhyāmatiriktābhyāṃ krītvā hīnābhyāṃ vikrīṇānasya ta eva dviguṇā daṇḍāḥ
kāṣṭhalohamaṇimayaṃ rajjucarmamṛṇmayaṃ sūtravalkaromamayaṃ vā jātyamityajātyaṃ vikrayādhānaṃ nayato mūlyāṣṭaguṇo daṇḍaḥ
sārabhāṇḍamityasārabhāṇḍaṃ tajjātamityatajjātaṃ rādhāyuktamityupadhiyuktaṃ samudgaparivartimaṃ vā vikrayādhānaṃ nayato hīnamūlyaṃ catuṣpañcāśatpaṇo daṇḍaḥ paṇamūlyaṃ dviguṇo dvipaṇamūlyaṃ dviśataḥ
kāruśilpināṃ karmaguṇāpakarṣamājīvaṃ vikrayakrayopaghātaṃ vā sambhūya samutthāpayatāṃ sahasraṃ daṇḍaḥ
vaidehakānāṃ vā sambhūya paṇyamavarundhatāmanargheṇa vikrīṇatāṃ vā sahasraṃ daṇḍaḥ
tulāmānāntaramarghavarṇāntaraṃ vā dharakasya māyakasya vā paṇamūlyādaṣṭabhāgaṃ hastadoṣeṇācarato dviśato daṇḍaḥ
anujñātakrayādupari caiṣāṃ svadeśīyānāṃ paṇyānāṃ pañcakaṃ śatamājīvaṃ sthāpayetparadeśīyānāṃ daśakam
tataḥ paramarghaṃ vardhayatāṃ kraye vikraye vā bhāvayatāṃ paṇaśate pañcapaṇāddviśato daṇḍaḥ

lg.l: deśakālāntaritānāṃ tu paṇyānāṃ prakṣepaṃ paṇyaniṣpattiṃ śulkaṃ vṛddhimavakrayam

div.p: daivānyaṣṭau mahābhayāni agnirudakaṃ vyādhirdurbhikṣaṃ mūṣikā vyālāḥ sarpā rakṣāṃsīti
grīṣme bahiradhiśrayaṇaṃ grāmāḥ kuryuḥ daśamūlīsaṃgraheṇādhiṣṭhitā vā
vyādhibhayamaupaniṣadikaiḥ pratīkāraiḥ pratikuryuḥ auṣadhaiścikitsakāḥ śāntiprāyaścittairvā siddhatāpasāḥ
tīrthābhiṣecanaṃ mahākacchavardhanaṃ gavāṃ śmaśānāvadohanaṃ kabandhadahanaṃ devarātriṃ ca kārayet
durbhikṣe rājā bījabhaktopagrahaṃ kṛtvānugrahaṃ kuryātdurgasetukarma vā bhaktānugraheṇa bhaktasaṃvibhāgaṃ vā deśanikṣepaṃ vā
mitrāṇi vā vyapāśrayeta karśanaṃ vamanaṃ vā kuryāt
niṣpannasasyamanyaviṣayaṃ vā sajanapado yāyātsamudrasarastaṭākāni vā saṃśrayeta
teṣāṃ grahaṇahiṃsāyāṃ dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ śunāmanigrahe cānyatrāraṇyacarebhyaḥ
rakṣobhaye rakṣoghnānyatharvavedavido māyāyogavido vā karmāṇi kuryuḥ
yaṃ cātra gūḍhājīvinaṃ śaṅketa taṃ sattriṇāpasarpayet
dharmasthaṃ viśvāsopagataṃ sattrī brūyāt asau me bandhurabhiyuktaḥ tasyāyamanarthaḥ pratikriyatāmayaṃ cārthaḥ pratigṛhyatāmiti
grāmakūṭamadhyakṣaṃ vā sattrī brūyāt asau jālmaḥ prabhūtadravyaḥ tasyāyamanarthaḥ tenainamāhārayasva iti
te cettathā kuryuḥ kūṭasākṣiṇa iti pravāsyeran
yaṃ vā mantrayogamūlakarmabhiḥ śmāśānikairvā saṃvadanakarakaṃ manyeta taṃ sattrī brūyāt amuṣya bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ vā kāmaye sā māṃ pratikāmayatāmayaṃ cārthaḥ pratigṛhyatāmiti
yaṃ vā rasasya kartāraṃ kretāraṃ vikretāraṃ bhaiṣajyāhāravyavahāriṇaṃ vā rasadaṃ manyeta taṃ sattrī brūyāt asau me śatruḥ tasyopaghātaḥ kriyatāmayaṃ cārthaḥ pratigṛhyatāmiti
sa cettathā kuryād rasada iti pravāsyeta

yaṃ vā nānālohakṣārāṇāmaṅgārabhasmāsaṃdaṃśamuṣṭikādhikaraṇībimbaṭaṅkamūṣāṇāmabhīkṣṇakretāraṃ maṣībhasmadhūmadigdhahastavastraliṅgaṃ karmāropakaraṇasaṃsargaṃ kūṭarūpakārakaṃ manyeta taṃ sattrī śiṣyatvena saṃvyavahāreṇa cānupraviśya prajñāpayet
teṣāṃ kṛtotsāhānāṃ mahāntaṃ saṃghamādāya rātrāvanyaṃ grāmamuddiśyānyaṃ grāmaṃ kṛtakastrīpuruṣaṃ gatvā brūyuḥ ihaiva vidyāprabhāvo dṛśyatāṃ kṛcchraḥ paragrāmo gantumiti
gṛhītān samāhartā paurajānapadānāṃ darśayet coragrahaṇīṃ vidyāmadhīte rājā tasyopadeśādime corā gṛhītāḥ bhūyaśca grahīṣyāmi vārayitavyo vaḥ svajanaḥ pāpācārah iti
yaṃ cātrāpasarpopadeśena śamyāpratodādīnāmapahartāraṃ jānīyāttameṣāṃ pratyādiśet eṣa rājñaḥ prabhāvaḥ iti
vigūhamānarūpaṃ liṅgenāliṅginaṃ liṅginaṃ vā bhinnācāraṃ pūrvakṛtāpadānaṃ svakarmabhirapadiṣṭaṃ
na cānivedya saṃsthādhyakṣasya purāṇabhāṇḍānāmādhānaṃ vikrayaṃ vā kuryuḥ
sa cetbrūyātdāyādyādavāptamamuṣmāl labdhaṃ krītaṃ kāritamādhipracchannamayamasya deśaḥ kālaścopasamprāpteḥ ayamasyārghaḥ pramāṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ mūlyaṃ ca iti tasyāgamasamādhau mucyeta
nāṣṭikaścettadeva pratisaṃdadhyāt yasyā pūrvo dīrghaśca paribhogaḥ śucirvā deśastasya dravyamiti vidyāt
catuṣpadadvipadānāmapi hi rūpaliṅgasāmānyaṃ bhavati kimaṅga punarekayonidravyakartṛprasūtānāṃ kupyābharaṇabhāṇḍānāmiti
sa cedbrūyāt yācitakamavakrītakamāhitakaṃ nikṣepamupanidhiṃ vaiyāvṛtyakarma vāmuṣya iti tasyāpasārapratisaṃdhānena mucyeta
naivamityapasāro vā brūyāt rūpābhigṛhītaḥ parasya dānakāraṇamātmanaḥ pratigrahakāraṇamupaliṅganaṃ vā dāyakadāpakanibandhakapratigrāhakopadraṣṭṛbhirupaśrotṛbhirvā pratisamānayet

karmābhigrahastu muṣitaveśmanaḥ praveśaniṣkasanamadvāreṇa dvārasya saṃdhinā bījena vā vedhamuttamāgārasya jālavātāyananīpravedhamārohaṇāvataraṇe ca kuḍyasya vedhamupakhananaṃ vā gūḍhadravyanikṣepaṇagrahaṇopāyamupadeśopalabhyamabhyantaracchedotkaraparimardopakaraṇamabhyantarakṛtaṃ vidyāt
abhyantarakṛte puruṣamāsannaṃ vyasaninaṃ krūrasahāyaṃ taskaropakaraṇasaṃsargaṃ striyaṃ vā daridrakulāmanyaprasaktāṃ vā
pāṃsupūrṇakeśanakhaṃ vilūnabhugnakeśanakhaṃ vā samyaksnātānuliptaṃ tailapramṛṣṭagātraṃ sadyodautahastapādaṃ vā
niṣkīrṇamūtrapurīṣaṃ vātapūrṇakoṣṭhatvakkaṃ śūnapādapāṇimānmīlitākṣaṃ savyañjanakaṇṭhaṃ pīṭananiruddhocchvāsahataṃ vidyāt
ato'nyatamena kāraṇena hataṃ hatvā vā daṇḍabhayādudbaddhanikṛttakaṇṭhaṃ vidyāt
hṛdayāduddhṛtyāgnau prakṣiptaṃ ciṭiciṭāyadindradhanurvarṇaṃ vā viṣayuktaṃ vidyātdagdhasya hṛdayamadagdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vā
tasya paricārakajanaṃ vāgdaṇḍapāruṣyātilabdhaṃ mārgeta duḥkhopahatamanyaprasaktaṃ vā strījanaṃ dāyavṛttistrījanābhimantāraṃ vā bandhum
sarveṣāṃ vā strīdāyādyadoṣaḥ karmaspardhā pratipakṣadveṣaḥ paṇyasaṃsthāsamavāyo vā vivādapadānāmanyatamadvā roṣasthānam
svayaṃ ādiṣṭapuruṣairvā corairarthanimittaṃ sādṛśyādanyavairibhirvā hatasya ghātamāsannebhyaḥ parīkṣeta
yenāhūtaḥ saha sthitaḥ prasthito hatabhūmimānīto vā tamanuyuñjīta
ye cāsya hatabhūmāvāsannacarāstānekaikaśaḥ pṛcchetkenāyamihānīto hato vā kaḥ saśastraḥ saṃgūhamāna udvigno vā yuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ iti

lg.l: vastraṃ veṣaṃ vibhūṣāṃ vā dṛṣṭvā tadvyavahāriṇaḥ
karma ca vyavahāraṃ ca tato mārgaṇamācaret

div.p: tataḥ pūrvasyāhnaḥ pracāraṃ rātrau nivāsaṃ ca (cā) grahaṇādityanuyuñjīta
acoraṃ cora ityabhivyāharataścorasamo daṇḍaḥ coraṃ pracchādayataśca
dṛśyate hyacoro'pi coramārge yadṛcchayā saṃnipāte coraveṣaśastrabhāṇḍasāmānyena gṛhyamāṇaścorabhāṇḍasyopavāsena vā yathāṇimāṇḍavyaḥ karmakleśabhayādacoraḥ coro'smi iti bruvāṇaḥ
mandāparādhaṃ bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ vyādhitaṃ mattamunmattaṃ kṣutpipāsādhvaklāntamatyāśitamāmakāśitaṃ durbalaṃ vā na karma kārayet
āptadoṣaṃ karma kārayet na tveva striyaṃ garbhiṇīṃ sūtikāṃ vā māsāvaraprajātām
tasyātikrama uttamo daṇḍaḥ kartuḥ kārayituśca karmaṇā vyāpādanena ca
vyāvahārikaṃ karmacatuṣkaṃ ṣaḍdaṇḍāḥ sapta kaśāḥ dvāv uparinibandhau udakanālikā ca

paraṃ pāpakarmaṇāṃ nava vetralatāḥ dvādaśa kaśāḥ dvāv ūruveṣṭau viṃśatirnaktamālalatāḥ dvātriṃśattalāḥ dvau vṛścikabandhau ullaṃbane ca dve sūcī hastasya yavāgūpītasya ekaparvadahanamaṅgulyāḥ snehapītasya pratāpanamekamahaḥ śiśirarātrau balbajāgraśayyā ca
tasyopakaraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ praharaṇaṃ pradharaṇamavadhāraṇaṃ ca kharapaṭṭādāgamayet
pūrvakṛtāpadānaṃ pratijñāyāpaharantamekadeśadṛṣṭadravyaṃ karmaṇā rūpeṇa vā gṛhītaṃ rājakośamavastṛṇantaṃ karmavadhyaṃ vā rājavacanātsamastaṃ vyastamabhyastaṃ vā karma kārayet
tasyābhiśastāṅko lalāṭe syādvyavahārapatanāya steyo śvā manuṣyavadhe kabandhaḥ gurutalpe bhagaṃ surāpāne madyadhvajaḥ
phalgudravyakarmāntebhyaḥ phalgu dravyamupaskaraṃ vā pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ

paṇyabhūmibhyo vā rājapaṇyaṃ māṣamūlyādūrdhvamāpādamūlyādityapaharato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍaḥ ādvipādamūlyāditi caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ ātripādamūlyāditi ṣaṭtriṃśatpaṇaḥ āpaṇamūlyādityaṣṭacatvāriṃśatpaṇaḥ ādvipaṇamūlyāditi pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ ācatuṣpaṇamūlyāditi madhyamaḥ āṣṭapaṇamūlyādityuttamaḥ ādaśapaṇamūlyāditi vadhaḥ

bāhyeṣu tu pracchannamahani kṣetrakhalaveśmāpaṇebhyaḥ kupyabhāṇḍamupaskaraṃ vā māṣamūlyādūrdhvamāpādamūlyādityapaharatastripaṇo daṇḍaḥ gomayapradehena vā pralipyāvaghoṣaṇamādvipādamūlyāditi ṣaṭpaṇaḥ gomayabhasmanā vā pralipyāvaghoṣaṇamātripādamūlyāditi navapaṇaḥ gomayabhasmanā vā pralipyāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śarāvamekhalayā vā āpaṇamūlyāditi dvādaśapaṇaḥ muṇḍanaṃ pravrājanaṃ vā ādvipaṇamūlyāditi caturviṃśatipaṇaḥ muṇḍasyeṣṭakāśakalena pravrājanaṃ vā ācatuṣpaṇamūlyāditi ṣaṭtriṃśatpaṇah āpañcapaṇamūlyādityaṣṭacatvāriṃśatpaṇaḥ ādaśapaṇamūlyāditi pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍah āviṃśatipaṇamūlyāditdviśatah ātriṃśatpaṇamūlyāditi pañcaśatah ācatvāriṃśatpaṇamūlyāditi sāhasrah āpañcāśatpaṇamūlyāditi vadhaḥ
prasahya divā rātrau vāntaryāmikamapaharato'rdhamūlyeṣu eta eva daṇḍāḥ
prasahya divā rātrau vā saśastrasyāpaharataścaturbhāgamūlyeṣu eta eva dviguṇā daṇḍāḥ
kuṭuṃbikādhyakṣamukhyasvāmināṃ kūṭaśāsanamudrākarmasu pūrvamadhyottamavadhā daṇḍāḥ yathāparādhaṃ vā
dharmasthaścedvivadamānaṃ puruṣaṃ tarjayati bhartsayatyapasārayatyabhigrasate vā pūrvamasmai sāhasadaṇḍaṃ kuryāt vākpāruṣye dviguṇam
pṛcchyaṃ na pṛcchati apṛcchyaṃ pṛcchati pṛṣṭvā vā visṛjati śikṣayati smārayati pūrvaṃ dadāti vā iti madhyamamasmai sāhasadaṇḍaṃ kuryāt

deyaṃ deśaṃ na pṛcchati adeyaṃ deśaṃ pṛcchati kāryamadeśenātivāhayati chalenātiharati kālaharaṇena śrāntamapavāhayati mārgāpannaṃ vākyamutkramayati matisāhāyyaṃ sākṣibhyo dadāti tāritānuśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ punarapi gṛhṇāti uttamamasmai sāhasadaṇḍaṃ kuryāt
lekhakaśceduktaṃ na likhati anuktaṃ likhati duruktamupalikhati sūktamullikhati arthotpattiṃ vā vikalpayati iti pūrvamasmai sāhasadaṇḍaṃ kuryād yathāparādhaṃ vā
dharmasthaḥ pradeṣṭā vā hairaṇyadaṇḍamadaṇḍye kṣipati kṣepadviguṇamasmai daṇḍaṃ kuryāt hīnātiriktāṣṭaguṇaṃ vā
śarīradaṇḍaṃ kṣipati śārīrameva daṇḍaṃ bhajeta niṣkrayadviguṇaṃ vā
yaṃ vā bhūtamarthaṃ nāśayati abhūtamarthaṃ karoti tadaṣṭaguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt
dharmasthīye cārake bandhanāgāre vā śayyāsanabhojanoccārasaṃcārarodhabandhaneṣu tripaṇottarā daṇḍāḥ kartuḥ kārayituśca
cārakādabhiyuktaṃ muñcato niṣpātayato vā madhyamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ abhiyogadānaṃ ca bandhanāgārātsarvasvaṃ vadhaśca

bandhanāgārādhyakṣasya saṃruddhakamanākhyāya cārayataścaturviṃśatipaṇo daṇḍaḥ karma kārayato dviguṇaḥ sthānānyatvaṃ gamayato'nnapānaṃ vā rundhataḥ ṣaṇṇavatirdaṇḍaḥ parikleśayata utkoṭayato vā madhyamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ ghnataḥ sāhasraḥ
parigṛhītāṃ dāsīmāhitikāṃ vā saṃruddhikāmadhicarataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ coraḍāmarikabhāryāṃ madhyamaḥ saṃruddhikāmāryāmuttamaḥ
cārakamabhittvā niṣpātayato madhyamaḥ bhittvā vadhaḥ bandhanāgārātsarvasvaṃ vadhaśca
dakṣiṇahastavadhaścatuḥśato vā daṇḍaḥ caturthe yathākāmī vadhaḥ
pañcaviṃśatipaṇāvareṣu kukkuṭanakulamārjāraśvasūkarasteyeṣu hiṃsāyāṃ vā catuṣpañcāśatpaṇo daṇḍaḥ nāsāgracchedanaṃ vā caṇḍālāraṇyacarāṇāmardhadaṇḍāḥ
pāśajālakūṭāvapāteṣu baddhānāṃ mṛgapaśupakṣivyālamatsyānāmādāne tacca tāvacca daṇḍaḥ
kāruśilpikuśīlavatapasvināṃ kṣudrakadravyāpahāre śatyo daṇḍaḥ sthūlakadravyāpahāre dviśataḥ kṛṣidravyāpahāre ca
durgamakṛtapraveśasya praviśataḥ prākāracchidrādvā nikṣepaṃ gṛhītvāpasarataḥ kāṇḍarāvadho dviśāto vā daṇḍaḥ
cakrayuktaṃ nāvaṃ kṣudrapaśuṃ vāpaharata ekapādavadhaḥ triśato vā daṇḍaḥ
stenapāradārikayoḥ sācivyakarmaṇi striyāḥ saṃgṛhītāyāśca karṇanāsācchedanam pañcaśato vā daṇḍaḥ puṃṣo dviguṇaḥ
mahāpaśumekaṃ dāsaṃ dāsīṃ vāpaharataḥ pretabhāṇḍaṃ vā vikrīṇānasya dvipādavadhaḥ ṣaṭchato vā daṇḍaḥ
varṇottamānāṃ gurūṇāṃ ca hastapādalaṅghane rājayānavāhanādyārohaṇe caikahastapādavadhaḥ saptaśato vā daṇḍaḥ
śūdrasya brāhmaṇavādino devadravyamavastṛṇato rājadviṣṭamādiśato dvinetrabhedinaśca yogāñjanenāndhatvamaṣṭaśato vā daṇḍaḥ
coraṃ pāradārikaṃ vā mokṣayato rājaśāsanamūnamatiriktaṃ vā likhataḥ kanyāṃ dāsīṃ vā sahiraṇyamaparahataḥ kūṭavyavahāriṇo vimāṃsavikrayiṇaśca vāmahastadvipādavadho navaśato vā daṇḍaḥ

lg.l: anubandhaṃ tadātvaṃ ca deśakālau samīkṣya ca

div.p: saptarātrasyāntarmṛte śuddhavadhaḥ pakṣasyāntaruttamaḥ māsasyāntaḥ pañcaśataḥ samutthānavyayaśca
prahāreṇa garbhaṃ pātayata uttamo daṇḍaḥ bhaiṣajyena madhyamaḥ parikleśena pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ
yaścaināndahedapanayedvā sa tameva daṇḍaṃ labheta sāhasamuttamaṃ vā
udakadhāraṇaṃ setuṃ bhindatastatraivāpsu nimajjanamanudakamuttamaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ bhagnotsṛṣṭakaṃ madhyamaḥ
viṣadāyakaṃ puruṣaṃ striyaṃ ca puruṣaghnīmapaḥ praveśayedagarbhiṇīṃ garbhiṇīṃ māsāvaraprajātām

lg.l: akliṣṭānāṃ tu pāpānāṃ dharmyaḥ śuddhavadhaḥ smṛtaḥ

div.p: savarṇāmaprāptaphalāṃ prakurvato hastavadhaḥ catuḥśato vā daṇḍaḥ
prāptaphalāṃ prakurvato madhyamāpradeśinīvadho dviśato vā daṇḍaḥ
paraśulkāvaruddhāyāṃ hastavadhaḥ catuḥśato vā daṇḍaḥ śulkadānaṃ ca
saptārtavaprajātāṃ varaṇādūrdhvamalabhamānaḥ prakṛtya prākāmī syāt na ca pituravahīnaṃ dadyāt
kanyāmanyāṃ darśayitvānyāṃ prayacchataḥ śatyo daṇḍastulyāyām hīnāyāṃ dviguṇaḥ
strīprakṛtā sakāmā samānā dvādaśapaṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyātprakartrī dviguṇam
akāmāyāḥ śatyo daṇḍa ātmarāgārthaṃ śulkadānaṃ ca
bahirgrāmasya prakṛtāyāṃ mithyābhiśaṃsane ca dviguṇo daṇḍaḥ
gaṇikāduhitaraṃ prakurvataścatuṣpañcāśatpaṇo daṇḍaḥ śulkaṃ māturbhogaḥ ṣoḍaśaguṇaḥ
dāsasya dāsyā vā duhitaramadāsīṃ prakurvataścaturviṃśatipaṇo daṇḍaḥ śulkābandhyadānaṃ ca
niṣkrayānurūpāṃ dāsīṃ prakurvato dvādaśapaṇo daṇḍo vastrābandhyadānaṃ ca
akṣamāyāṃ striyāḥ karṇanāsācchedanam vadhaṃ jāraśca prāpnuyāt
jāraṃ cora ityabhiharataḥ pañcaśato daṇḍaḥ hiraṇyena muñcatastadaṣṭaguṇaḥ
paracakrāṭavīhṛtāmoghapravyūḍhāmaraṇyeṣu durbhikṣe vā tyaktāṃ pretabhāvotsṛṣṭāṃ vā parastriyaṃ nistārayitvā yathāsaṃbhāṣitaṃ samupabhuñjīta

lg.l: na tu rājapratāpena pramuktāṃ svajanena vā
na cottamāṃ na cākāmāṃ pūrvāpatyavatīṃ na ca

div.p: brāhmaṇamapeyamabhakṣyaṃ vā grāsayata uttamo daṇḍaḥ kṣatriyaṃ madhyamaḥ vaiśyaṃ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ śūdraṃ catuṣpañcāśatpaṇo daṇḍaḥ
paragṛhābhigamane divā pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ rātrau madhyamaḥ
divā rātrau vā saśastrasya praviśata uttamo daṇḍaḥ
bhikṣukavaidehakau mattonmattau balādāpadi cātisaṃnikṛṣṭāḥ pravṛttapraveśāścādaṇḍyāḥ anyatra pratiṣedhāt
svaveśmano virātrādūrdhvaṃ parivāramārohataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ paraveśmano madhyamaḥ grāmārāmavāṭabhedinaśca
muṣitaṃ pravāsitaṃ caiṣāmanirgataṃ rātrau grāmasvāmī dadyāt
grāmāntareṣu vā muṣitaṃ pravāsitaṃ vivītādhyakṣo dadyāt
durbalaṃ veśma śakaṭamanuttabdhamūrdhastaṃbhaṃ śastramanapāśrayamapraticchannaṃ śvabhraṃ kūpaṃ kūṭāvapātaṃ vā kṛtvā hiṃsāyāṃ daṇḍapāruṣyaṃ vidyāt
vṛkṣacchedane daṃyaraśmiharaṇe catuṣpadānāmadāntasevane vāhane vā kāṣṭhaloṣṭapāṣāṇadaṇḍabāṇabāhuvikṣepaṇeṣu yāne hastinā ca smaghaṭṭane apehi iti prakośannadaṇḍyaḥ
hastinā roṣitena hato droṇānnaṃ madyakuṃbhaṃ mālyānulepanaṃ dantapramārjanaṃ ca paṭaṃ dadyāt
aśvamedhāvabhṛthasnānena tulyo hastinā vadha iti pādaprakṣālanam
śṛṅgiṇā daṃṣṭriṇā vā hiṃsyamānamamokṣayataḥ svāminaḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasadaṇḍaḥ pratikruṣṭasya dviguṇaḥ
devapaśumṛṣabhamukṣāṇaṃ gokumārīṃ vā vāhayataḥ pañcaśato daṇḍaḥ pravāsayata uttamaḥ
lomadohavāhanaprajananopakāriṇāṃ kṣudrapaśūnāmadāne tacca tāvacca daṇḍaḥ pravāsane ca anyatra devapitṛkāryebhyaḥ
chinnanasyaṃ bhagnayugaṃ tiryakpratimukhāgataṃ pratyāsaradvā cakrayuktaṃ yātā paśumanuṣyasaṃbādhe vā hiṃsāyāmadaṇḍyaḥ
bāle yātari yānasthaḥ svāmī daṇḍyaḥ asvāmini yānasthaḥ prāptavyavahāro vā yātā
kāmaṃ bhāryāyāmanicchantyāṃ kanyāyāṃ vā dārārthino bhartari bhāryāyā vā saṃvadanakaraṇam
mātāpitrorbhaginīṃ mātulānīmācāryāṇīṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ bhaginīṃ vādhicaratastriliṅgacchedanaṃ vadhaśca
brāhmaṇyāmaguptāyāṃ kṣatriyasyottamaḥ sarvasvaṃ vaiśyasya śūdraḥ kaṭāgninā dahyeta
śvapākīgamane kṛtakabandhāṅkaḥ paraviṣayaṃ gacchet śvapākatvaṃ vā śūdraḥ

lg.l: śāstā hi varuṇo rājñāṃ mithyā vyācaratāṃ nṛṣu

div.p: rājānamavagṛhyopajīvinaḥ śatrusādhāraṇā vā ye mukhyāsteṣu gūḍhapuruṣapraṇidhiḥ kṛtyapakṣopagraho vā siddhiḥ yathoktaṃ purastādupajāpo'pasarpo vā yathā pāragrāmike vakṣyāmaḥ
rājyopaghātinastu vallabhāḥ saṃhatā vā ye mukhyāḥ prakāśamaśakyāḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ dūṣyāḥ teṣu dharmarucirupāṃśudaṇḍaṃ prayuñjīta
śastreṇa rasena vā vikrāntaṃ tatraiva ghātayedbhrātṛghātako'yamiti
dūṣyaṃ mahāmātraṃ vā sattriprotsāhito bhrātā dāyaṃ yāceta
taṃ dūṣyagṛhapratidvāri rātrāv upaśayānamanyatra vā vasantaṃ tīkṣṇo hantā brūyād hato'yaṃ dāyakāmukaḥ iti
dūṣyasamīpasthā vā sattriṇo bhrātaraṃ dāyaṃ yācamānaṃ ghātena paribhartsayeyuḥ
dūṣyamahāmātrayorvā yaḥ putraḥ pituḥ pitā vā putrasya dārānadhicarati bhrātā vā bhrātuḥ tayoḥ kāpaṭikamukhaḥ kalahaḥ pūrveṇa vyākhyātaḥ
dūṣyamahāmātraputramātmasaṃbhāvitaṃ vā sattrī rājaputrastvaṃ śatrubhayādiha nyasto'si ityupajapet
pratipannaṃ rājā rahasi pūjayetprāptayauvarājyakālaṃ tvāṃ mahāmātrabhayānnābhiṣiñcāmi iti
bhikṣukī vā dūṣyabhāryāṃ sāṃvadanikībhirauṣadhībhiḥ saṃvāsya rasenātisaṃdadhyāt

dūṣyamahāmātramaṭavīṃ paragrāmaṃ vā hantuṃ kāntāravyavahite vā deśe rāṣṭrapālamantapālaṃ vā sthāpayituṃ nāgarasthānaṃ vā kupitamavagrāhituṃ sārthātivāhyaṃ pratyante vā sapratyādeyamādātuṃ phalgubalaṃ tīkṣṇayuktaṃ preṣayet
rātrau divā vā yuddhe pravṛtte tīkṣṇāḥ pratirodhakavyañjanā vā hanyuḥ abhiyoge hataḥ iti
tato dauvārikābhigṛhītāstīkṣṇāḥ dūṣyaprayuktāḥ sma iti brūyuḥ
teṣāṃ devīvyañjanā vā duḥstrī rātrāvāvāseṣu gṛhyeteti samānaṃ pūrveṇa
dūṣyamahāmātraṃ vā sūdo bhakṣakāro vā te śobhanaḥ iti stavena bhakṣyabhojyaṃ yāceta bahirvā kvacidadhvagataḥ pānīyam
abhicāraśīlaṃ vā siddhavyañjano godhākūrmakarkaṭakakūṭānāṃ lakṣaṇyānāmanyatamaprāśanena manorathānavāpsyasi iti grāhayet
pratipannaṃ karmaṇi rasena lohamusalairvā ghātayetkarmavyāpadā hataḥ iti
cikitsakavyañjano vā daurātmikamasādhyaṃ vā vyādhiṃ dūṣyasya sthāpayitvā bhaiṣajyāhārayogeṣu rasenātisaṃdadhyāt

yatra dūṣyaḥ pratiṣeddhavyastatra dūṣyameva phalgubalatīkṣṇayuktaṃ preṣayet gaccha amuṣmindurge rāṣṭre vā sainyamutthāpaya hiraṇyaṃ vā vallabhādvā hiraṇyamāhāraya vallabhakanyāṃ vā prasahyānaya durgasetuvaṇikpathaśūnyaniveśakhanidravyahastivanakarmaṇāmanyatamadvā kāraya rāṣṭrapālyamantapālyaṃ vāyaśca tvā pratiṣedhayenna vā te sāhāyyaṃ dadyātsa bandhavyaḥ syāt iti
tameteṣu kalahasthāneṣu karmapratighāteṣu vā vivadamānaṃ tīkṣṇāḥ śastraṃ pātayitvā pracchannaṃ hanyuḥ

purāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ kulānāṃ vā dūṣyāṇāṃ sīmākṣetrakhalaveśmamaryādāsu dravyopakaraṇasasyavāhanahiṃsāsu prekṣākṛtyotsaveṣu vā samutpanne kalahe tīkṣṇairutpādite vā tīkṣṇāḥ śastraṃ pātayitvā brūyuḥ evaṃ kriyante ye'munā kalahāyante iti
yeṣāṃ vā dūṣyāṇāṃ jātamūlāḥ kalahāsteṣāṃ kṣetrakhalaveśmānyādīpayitvā bandhusaṃbandhiṣu vāhaneṣu vā tīkṣṇāḥ śastraṃ pātayitvā tathaiva brūyuḥ amunā prayuktāḥ smaḥ iti
bhikṣukī vā dūṣyarāṣṭramukhyaṃ dūṣyarāṣṭramukhyasya bhāryā snuṣā duhitā vā kāmayate ityupajapet
pratipannasyābharaṇamādāya svāmine darśayet asau te mukhyo yauvanotsikto bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ vābhimanyate iti
dūṣyadaṇḍopanateṣu tu yuvarājaḥ senāpatirvā kiṃcidapakṛtyāpakrānto vikrameta
tato rājā dūṣyadaṇḍopanatāneva preṣayetphalgubalatīkṣṇayuktāniti samānāḥ sarva eva yogāḥ
teṣāṃ ca putreṣvanukṣiyatsu yo nirvikāraḥ sa pitṛdāyaṃ labheta

lg.l: svapakṣe parapakṣe vā tūṣṇīṃ daṇḍaṃ prayojayet

div.p: janapadaṃ mahāntamalpapramāṇaṃ vādevamātṛkaṃ prabhūtadhānyaṃ dhānyasyāṃśaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ vā yāceta yathāsāraṃ madhyamavaraṃ vā
caturthamaṃśaṃ dhānyānāṃ bījabhaktaśuddhaṃ ca hiraṇyena krīṇīyāt
tasyākaraṇe vā samāhartṛpuruṣā grīṣme karṣakāṇāmudvāpaṃ kārayeyuḥ
niṣpanne haritapakvādānaṃ vārayeyuḥ anyatra śākakaṭabhaṅgamuṣṭibhyāṃ devapitṛpūjādānārthaṃ gavārthaṃ vā
parasasyāpahāriṇaḥ pañcāśadguṇaḥ sītātyayaḥ svavargasya bāhyasya tu vadhaḥ
caturthamaṃśaṃ dhānyānāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vanyānāṃ tūlalākṣākṣaumavalkakārpāsaraumakauśeyakauṣadhagandhapuṣpaphalaśākapaṇyānāṃ kāṣṭhaveṇumāṃsavallūrāṇāṃ ca gṛhṇīyuḥ dantājinasyārdham
hiraṇyakaraṃ karmaṇyānāhārayeyuḥ na caiṣāṃ kaṃcidaparādhaṃ parihareyuḥ
sārato vā hiraṇyamāḍhyānyāceta yathopakāraṃ vā svavaśā vā yadupahareyuḥ
pāṣaṇḍasaṃghadravyamaśrotriyopabhogyaṃ devadravyaṃ vā kṛtyakarāḥ pretasya dagdhagṛhasya vā haste nyastamityupahareyuḥ
devatādhyakṣo durgarāṣṭradevatānāṃ yathāsvamekasthaṃ kośaṃ kuryāttathaiva copaharet
daivatacaityaṃ siddhapuṇyasthānamaupapādikaṃ vā rātrāv utthāpya yātrāsamājābhyāmājīvet
manuṣyakaraṃ vā vṛkṣe rakṣobhayaṃ prarūpayitvā siddhavyañjanāḥ paurajānapadānāṃ hiraṇyena pratikuryuḥ
suruṅgāyukte vā kūpe nāgamaniyataśiraskaṃ hiraṇyopahāreṇa darśayet
nāgapratimāyāmantaśchannāyāṃ caityacchidre valmīkacchidre vā sarpadarśanamāhāreṇa pratibaddhasaṃjñaṃ kṛtvā śraddadhānānāṃ darśayet
aśraddadhānānāmācamanaprokṣaṇeṣu rasamupacārya devatābhiśāpaṃ brūyāt abhityaktaṃ vā daṃśayitvā
sa yadā paṇyamūlye nikṣepaprayogairupacitaḥ syāttadainaṃ rātrau moṣayet
vaidehakavyañjano vā prakhyātavyavahāraḥ prahavaṇanimittaṃ yācitakamavakrītakaṃ vā rūpyasuvarṇabhāṇḍamanekaṃ gṛhṇīyāt
samāje vā sarvapaṇyasaṃdohena prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇamṛṇaṃ gṛhṇīyātpratibhāṇḍamūlyaṃ ca
dūṣyakulyānāṃ vā vivāde pratyutpanne rasadāḥ praṇihitā rasaṃ dadyuḥ
dūṣyamabhityakto vā śraddheyāpadeśaṃ paṇyaṃ hiraṇyanikṣepamṛṇaprayogaṃ dāyaṃ vā yāceta
dāsaśabdena vā dūṣyamālambeta bhāryāmasya snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ vā dāsīśabdena bhāryāśabdena vā
taṃ dūṣyagṛhapratidvāri rātrāv upaśayānamanyatra vā vasantaṃ tīkṣṇo hatvā brūyāt hato'yamarthakāmukaḥ iti
siddhavyañjano vā dūṣyaṃ jambhakavidyābhiḥ pralobhayitvā brūyāt akṣayahiraṇyaṃ rājadvārikaṃ strīhṛdayamarivyādhikaramāyuṣyaṃ putrīyaṃ vā karma jānāmi iti
ekarūpaṃ cātra hiraṇyaṃ pūrvanikhātaṃ pretāṅgaṃ pretaśiśurvā yatra nihitaḥ syāttato hiraṇyamasya darśayedatyalpamiti ca brūyāt
prabhūtahiraṇyahetoḥ punarupahāraḥ kartavya iti svayamevaitena hiraṇyena śvobhūte prabhūtamaupahārikaṃ krīṇīhi iti
mātṛvyañjanayā vā putro me tvayā hataḥ ityavakupitā syāt
saṃsiddhamevāsya rātriyāge vanayāge vanakrīḍāyāṃ vā pravṛttāyāṃ tīkṣṇā viśasyābhityaktamatinayeyuḥ
dūṣyasya vā bhṛtakavyañjano vetanahiraṇye kūṭarūpaṃ prakṣipya prarūpayet
karmakaravyañjano vā gṛhe karma kurvāṇaḥ stenakūṭarūpakārakopakaraṇamupanidadhyāt cikitsakavyañjano vā garamagadāpadeśena
pratyāsanno vā dūṣyasya sattrī praṇihitamabhiṣekabhāṇḍamamitraśāsanaṃ ca kāpaṭikamukhenācakṣīta kāraṇaṃ ca brūyāt
durgajanapadaśaktyā bhṛtyakarma samudayapādena sthāpayetkāryasādhanasahena vā bhṛtyalābhena
ācāryā vidyāvantaśca pūjāvetanāni yathārhaṃ labheranpañcaśatāvaraṃ sahasraparam
daśapaṇiko yojane dūto madhyamaḥ daśottare dviguṇavetana āyojanaśatāditi
alpakośaḥ kupyapaśukṣetrāṇi dadyāt alpaṃ ca hiraṇyam
śūnyaṃ vā niveśayitumabhyutthito hiraṇyameva dadyāt na grāmaṃ grāmasaṃjātavyavahārasthāpanārtham
etena bhṛtānāmabhṛtānāṃ ca vidyākarmabhyāṃ bhaktavetanaviśeṣaṃ ca kuryāt
pattyaśvarathadvipāḥ sūryodaye bahiḥ saṃdhidivasavarjaṃ śilpayogyāḥ kuryuḥ
teṣu rājā nityayuktaḥ syāt abhīkṣṇaṃ caiṣāṃ śilpadarśanaṃ kuryāt
tato vaidehakavyañjanāḥ sarvapaṇyānyāyudhīyebhyo yātrākāle dviguṇapratyādeyāni dadyuḥ
yaṃ vā manyeta yathāhamāśrayepsurevamasau vinayepsurābhigāmikaguṇayuktaḥ iti dravyaprakṛtihīnamapyenamāśrayeta na tvevānātmasaṃpannam
anātmavā hi nītiśāstradveṣādanarthyasaṃyogādvā prāpyāpi mahadaiśvaryaṃ na bhavati
matikarmasu pṛṣṭhastadātve cāyatyāṃ ca dharmārthasaṃyuktaṃ samarthaṃ pravīṇavadapariṣadbhīruḥ kathayet

īpsitaḥ paṇeta dharmārthānuyogamaviśiṣṭeṣu balavatsaṃyukteṣu daṇḍadhāraṇaṃ matsaṃyoge tadātve ca daṇḍadhāraṇamiti na kuryāḥ pakṣaṃ vṛttiṃ guhyaṃ ca me nopahanyāḥ saṃjñayā ca tvāṃ kāmakrodhadaṇḍaneṣu vārayeyamiti
ādiṣṭaḥ pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmāvanujñātaḥ praviśet upaviśecca pārśvataḥ saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭaḥ parāsanam
vigṛhya kathanamasabhyamapratyakṣamaśraddheyamanṛtaṃ ca vākyamuccairanarmaṇi hāsaṃ vātaṣṭhīvane ca śabdavatī na kuryāt

mithaḥ kathanamanyena janavāde dvandvakathanam rājño veṣamuddhatakuhakānāṃ ca ratnātiśayaprakāśābhyarthanamekākṣyoṣṭhanirbhogaṃ bhrukuṭīkarma vākyāvakṣepaṇaṃ ca bruvati balavatsaṃyuktavirodhaṃ strībhiḥ strīdarśibhiḥ sāmantadūtairdveṣyapakṣāvakṣiptānarthyaiśca pratisaṃsargamekārthacaryāṃ saṃghātaṃ ca varjayet

lg.l: tūṣṇīṃ vā prativākye syādveṣyādīṃśca na varṇayet
apriyā api dakṣāḥ syustadbhāvād ye bahiṣkṛtāḥ
parātsaṃkrāmayedghoraṃ na ca ghoraṃ pare vadet
ātmarakṣā hi satataṃ pūrvaṃ kāryā vijānatā
ekadeśaṃ dahedagniḥ śarīraṃ vā paraṃ gataḥ

div.p: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśyamātyayikamupekṣitavyaṃ vā kāryaṃ idamevamiti viśeṣayecca

darśane prasīdati vākyaṃ pratigṛhṇāti āsanaṃ dadāti vivikto darśayate śaṅkāsthāne nātiśaṅkate kathāyāṃ ramate parijñāpyeṣvavekṣate pathyamuktaṃ sahate smayamāno niyuṅkte hastena spṛśati ślāghye nopahasati parokṣaṃ guṇaṃ bravīti bhakṣyeṣu smarati saha vihāraṃ yāti vyasane'bhyupapadyate tadbhaktīnpūjayati guhyamācaṣṭe mānaṃ vardhayati arthaṃ karoti anarthaṃ pratihanti iti tuṣṭajñānam

saṃdarśane kopaḥ vākyasyāśravaṇapratiṣedhau āsanacakṣuṣoradānam varṇasvarabhedaḥ ekākṣibhrukuṭyoṣṭhanirbhogaḥ svedaśvāsasmitānāmasthānotpattiḥ paramantraṇamakasmādvrajanam vardhanamanyasya bhūmigātravilekhanamanyasyopatodanam vidyāvarṇadeśakutsā samadoṣanindā pratidoṣanindā pratilomastavaḥ sukṛtānavekṣaṇam duṣkṛtānukīrtanam pṛṣṭhāvadhānamatityāgaḥ mithyābhibhāṣaṇam rājadarśināṃ ca tadvṛttānyatvam

ayamuccaiḥ siñcati iti kātyāyanaḥ pravavrāja krauñco'pasavyamiti kaṇiṅko bhāradvājaḥ tṛṇamiti dīrghaścārāyaṇaḥ śītā śāṭī iti ghoṭamukhaḥ hastī pratyaukṣīt iti kiñjalkaḥ rathāśvaṃ prāśaṃsīt iti piśunaḥ pratiravaṇe śunaḥ piśunaputraḥ

lg.l: tato bhartari jīve vā mṛte vā punarāvrajet

div.p: prāgeva maraṇābādhabhayād rājñaḥ priyahitopagraheṇa māsadvimāsāntaraṃ darśanaṃ sthāpayeddeśapīḍāpahamamitrāpahamāyuṣyaṃ putrīyaṃ vā karma rājā sādhayati ityapadeśena
apakāriṣu ca heḍaṃ prasādaṃ vā prakṛtikāntaṃ darśayetprasādamevopakāriṣu
yaśca mukhyaḥ pakṣavāndurgāṭavīstho vā vaiguṇyaṃ bhajeta tamupagrāhayet
yadi vā kaścinmukhyaḥ sāmantādīnāmanyatamaḥ kopaṃ bhajeta taṃ ehi rājānaṃ tvā kariṣyāmi ityāvāhayitvā ghātayet
yuvarāje vā krameṇa rājyabhāramāropya rājavyasanaṃ khyāpayet
pramriyamāṇe vā rājanyamātyaḥ kulyakumāramukhyānparasparaṃ mukhyeṣu vā vikramayet
kulyakumāramukhyānupāṃśudaṇḍena vā sādhayitvā svayaṃ rājyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt
rājyakāraṇādd hi pitā putrānputrāśca pitaramabhidruhyanti kimaṅga punaramātyaprakṛtirhyekapragraho rājyasya
svayamārūḍhā hi strī tyajyamānābhiśapati iti lokapravādaḥ

lg.l: durlabhaḥ sa punastasya kālaḥ karma cikīrṣataḥ

div.p: saṃpannābhāve'vyasaninaṃ kumāraṃ rājakanyāṃ garbhiṇīṃ devīṃ vā puras kṛtya mahāmātrān saṃnipātya brūyāt ayaṃ vo nikṣepaḥ pitaramasyāvekṣadhvaṃ sattvābhijanamātmanaśca dhvajamātro'yaṃ bhavanta eva svāminaḥ kathaṃ vā kriyatāmiti
tathā bruvāṇaṃ yogapuruṣā brūyuḥ ko'nyo bhavatpurogādasmād rājñaścāturvarṇyamarhati pālayitumiti
tathā ityamātyaḥ kumāraṃ rājakanyāṃ garbhiṇīṃ devīṃ vādhikurvīta bandhusaṃbandhināṃ mitrāmitradūtānāṃ ca darśayet
bhaktavetanaviśeṣamamātyānāmāyudhīyānāṃ ca kārayetbhūyaścāyaṃ vṛddhaḥ kariṣyati iti brūyāt
mahākulīno daivabuddhisattvasampanno vṛddhadarśī dhārmikaḥ satyavāgavisaṃvādakaḥ kṛtajñaḥ sthūlalakṣo mahotsāho'dīrghasūtraḥ śakyasāmanto dṛḍhabuddhirakṣudrapariṣatko vinayakāma ityābhigāmikā guṇāḥ

vāgmī pragalbhaḥ smṛtimatibalavānudagraḥ svavagrahaḥ kṛtaśilpo'vyasano daṇḍanāyyupakārāpakārayordṛṣṭapratīkārī hrīmānāpatprakṛtyorviniyoktā dīrghadūradarśī deśakālapuruṣakārakāryapradhānaḥ saṃdhivikramatyāgasamyamapaṇaparacchidravibhāgī saṃvṛto'dīnābhihāsyajihmabhrukuṭīkṣaṇaḥ kāmakrodhalobhastambhacāpalopatāpapaiśunyahīnaḥ śaklaḥ smitodagrābhibhāṣī vṛddhopadeśācāra ityātmasampat

madhye cānte ca sthānavānātmadhāraṇaḥ paradhāraṇaścāpadi svārakṣaḥ svājīvaḥ śatrudveṣī śakyasāmantaḥ paṅkapāṣāṇoṣaraviṣamakaṇṭakaśreṇīvyālamṛgāṭavīhīnaḥ kāntaḥ sītākhanidravyahastivanavān gavyaḥ pauruṣeyo guptagocaraḥ paśumānadevamātṛko vāristhalapathābhyāmupetaḥ sāracitrabahupaṇyo daṇḍakarasahaḥ karmaśīlakarṣako'bāliśasvāmyavaravarṇaprāyo bhaktaśucimanuṣya iti janapadasampat
dharmādhigataḥ pūrvaiḥ svayaṃ vā hemarūpyaprāyaścitrasthūlaratnahiraṇyo dīrghāmapyāpadamanāyatiṃ saheteti kośasampat

pitṛpaitāmaho nityo vaśyastuṣṭabhṛtaputradāraḥ pravāseṣvavisaṃvāditaḥ sarvatrāpratihato duḥkhasaho bahuyuddhaḥ sarvayuddhapraharaṇavidyāviśāradaḥ sahavṛddhikṣayikatvādadvaidhyaḥ kṣatraprāya iti daṇḍasampat
arājabījī lubdhaḥ kṣudrapariṣatko viraktaprakṛtiranyāyavṛttirayukto vyasanī nirutsāho daivapramāṇo yatkiṃcanakāryagatirananubandhaḥ klībo nityāpakārī cetyamitrasampat
evaṃ bhūto hi śatruḥ sukhaḥ samucchettuṃ bhavati

lg.l: hanyate vā prakṛtibhiryāti vā dviṣatāṃ vaśam
nayajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jayatyeva na hīyate

div.p: arisampadyuktaḥ sāmantaḥ śatruḥ vyasanī yātavyaḥ anapāśrayo durbalāśrayo vocchedanīyaḥ viparyaye pīḍanīyaḥ karśanīyo vā
tasmānmitramarimitraṃ mitramitramarimitramitraṃ cānantaryeṇa bhūmīnāṃ prasajyante purastātpaścātpārṣṇigrāha ākrandaḥ pārṣṇigrāhāsāra ākrandāsāraḥ
bhūmyanantaraḥ prakṛtimitraḥ tulyābhijanaḥ sahajaḥ viruddho virodhayitā vā kṛtrimaḥ
bhūmyekāntaraṃ prakṛtimitraṃ mātāpitṛsambaddhaṃ sahajam dhanajīvitahetorāśritaṃ kṛtrimam
arivijigīṣumadhyānāṃ bahiḥ prakṛtibhyo balavattaraḥ saṃhatāsaṃhatānāmarivijigīṣumadhyamānāmanugrahasamartho nigrahe cāsaṃhatānāmudāsīnaḥ
śaktistrividhā jñānabalaṃ mantraśaktiḥ kośadaṇḍabalaṃ prabhuśaktiḥ vikramabalamutsāhaśaktiḥ
evaṃ siddhistrividhaiva mantraśaktisādhyā mantrasiddhiḥ prabhuśaktisādhyā prabhusiddhiḥ utsāhaśaktisādhyā utsāhasiddhiḥ
tābhirabhyuccito jyāyānbhavati apacito hīnaḥ tulyaśaktiḥ samaḥ
tasmācchaktiṃ siddhiṃ ca ghaṭetātmanyāveśayituṃ sādhāraṇo vā dravyaprakṛtiṣvānantaryeṇa śaucavaśena vā

yadi vā paśyet amitro me śaktiyukto vāgdaṇḍapāruṣyārthadūṣaṇaiḥ prakṛtīrupahaniṣyati siddhiyukto vā mṛgayādyūtamadyastrībhiḥ pramādaṃ gamiṣyati sa viraktaprakṛtirupakṣīṇaḥ pramatto vā sādhyo me bhaviṣyati vigrahābhiyukto vā sarvasaṃdohenaikastho'durgastho vā sthāsyati sa saṃhatasainyo mitradurgaviyuktaḥ sādhyo me bhaviṣyati balavānvā rājā parataḥ śatrumucchettukāmaḥ tamucchidya māmucchindyāditi balavatā prārthitasya me vipannakarmārambhasya vā sāhāyyaṃ dāsyati madhyamalipsāyāṃ ca ityevaṃ ādiṣu kāraṇeṣvamitrasyāpi śaktiṃ siddhiṃ cecchet
na māṃ paro nāhaṃ paramupahantuṃ śaktaḥ ityāsīta
teṣāṃ yasminvā guṇe sthitaḥ paśyet ihasthaḥ śakṣyāmi durgasetukarmavaṇikpathaśūnyaniveśakhanidravyahastivanakarmāṇyātmanaḥ pravartayitum parasya caitāni karmāṇyupahantumiti tamātiṣṭhet
āśutarā me vṛddhirbhūyastarā vṛddhyudayatarā vā bhaviṣyati viparītā parasya iti jñātvā paravṛddhimupekṣeta
yasminvā guṇe sthitaḥ svakarmaṇāmupaghātaṃ paśyennetarasya tasminna tiṣṭhet
ciratareṇālpataraṃ vṛddhyudayataraṃ vā kṣeṣye viparītaṃ paraḥ iti jñātvā kṣayamupekṣeta
yasminvā guṇe sthitaḥ svakarmavṛddhiṃ kṣayaṃ vā nābhipaśyedetatsthānam
hrasvataraṃ vṛddhyudayataraṃ vā sthāsyāmi viparītaṃ paraḥ iti jñātvā sthānamupekṣeta

yadi vā paśyetsandhau sthito mahāphalaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ parakarmāṇyupahaniṣyāmi mahāphalāni vā svakarmāṇyupabhokṣye parakarmāṇi vā saṃdhiviśvāsena vā yogopaniṣatpraṇidhibhiḥ parakarmāṇyupahaniṣyāmi sukhaṃ vā sānugrahaparihārasaukaryaṃ phalalābhabhūyastvena svakarmaṇāṃ parakarmayogāvahaṃ janamāsrāvayiṣyāmi
balinātimātreṇa vā saṃhitaḥ paraḥ svakarmopaghātaṃ prāpsyati yena vā vigṛhīto mayāsaṃdhatte tenāsya vigrahaṃ dīrghaṃ kariṣyāmi mayā vā saṃhitasya maddveṣiṇo janapadaṃ pīḍayiṣyati
paropahato vāsya janapado māmāgamiṣyati tataḥ karmasu vṛddhiṃ prāpsyāmi vipannakarmārambho vā viṣamasthaḥ paraḥ karmasu na me vikrameta
parataḥ pravṛttakarmārambho vā tābhyāṃ saṃhitaḥ karmasu vṛddhiṃ prāpsyāmi śatrupratibaddhaṃ vā śatruṇā saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalaṃ bhetsyāmi
bhinnamavāpsyāmi daṇḍānugraheṇa vā śatrumupagṛhya maṇḍalalipsāyāṃ vidveṣaṃ grāhayiṣyāmi vidviṣṭaṃ tenaiva ghātayiṣyāmi iti saṃdhinā vṛddhimātiṣṭhet
yadi vā paśyet āyudhīyaprāyaḥ śreṇīprāyo vā me janapadaḥ śailavananadīdurgaikadvārārakṣo vā śakṣyati parābhiyogaṃ pratihantum viṣayānte durgamaviṣahyamapāśrito vā śakṣyāmi parakarmāṇyupahantuṃ
vyasanapīḍopahatotsāho vā paraḥ samprāptakarmopaghātakālaḥ vigṛhītasyānyato vā śakṣyāmi janapadamapavāhayitumiti vigrahe sthito vṛddhimātiṣṭhet
yadi vā manyeta na me śaktaḥ paraḥ karmāṇyupahantuṃ nāhaṃ tasya karmopaghātī vā vyasanamasya śvavarāhayoriva kalahe vā svakarmānuṣṭhānaparo vā vardhiṣye ityāsanena vṛddhimātiṣṭhet
yadi vā manyeta yānasādhyaḥ karmopaghātaḥ śatroḥ prativihitasvakarmārakṣaścāsmi iti yānena vṛddhimātiṣṭhet
yadi vā manyeta nāsmi śaktaḥ parakarmāṇyupahantuṃ svakarmopaghātaṃ vā trātumiti balavantamāśritaḥ svakarmānuṣṭhānena kṣayātsthānaṃ sthānādvṛddhiṃ cākāṅkṣeta
yadi vā manyeta saṃdhinaikataḥ svakarmāṇi pravartayiṣyāmi vigraheṇaikataḥ parakarmāṇyupahaniṣyāmi iti dvaidhībhāvena vṛddhimātiṣṭhet
dvaidhībhūto hi svakarmapradhāna ātmana evopakaroti saṃśritastu parasyopakaroti nātmanaḥ
yadā cāsya prāṇaharaṃ vyādhimantaḥkopaṃ śatruvṛddhiṃ mitravyasanamupasthitaṃ vā tannimittāmātmanaśca vṛddhiṃ paśyettadā sambhāvyavyādhidharmakāryāpadeśenāpayāyāt
balīyasorvā madhyagatastrāṇasamarthamāśrayeta yasya vāntardhiḥ syāt ubhau vā
dvābhyāmucchinno vā madhyamodāsīnayostatpakṣīyāṇāṃ vā rājñāṃ nyāyavṛttimāśrayeta
tulyānāṃ vā yasya prakṛtayaḥ sukhyeyurenam yatrastho vā śaknuyādātmānamuddhartum yatra vā pūrvapuruṣocitā gatirāsannaḥ sambandho vā mitrāṇi bhūyāṃsyatiśaktimanti vā bhaveyuḥ

lg.l: priyo yasya bhaved yo vā priyo'sya katarastayoḥ
priyo yasya sa taṃ gacchedityāśrayagatiḥ parā

div.p: saṃhitaścetparaprakṛtayo lubdhakṣīṇāpacaritāḥ pratyādānabhayādvā nopagacchanti iti paśyedd hīno'pi vigṛhṇīyāt
vigṛhītaścetparaprakṛtayo lubdhakṣīṇāpacaritā vigrahodvignā vā māṃ nopagacchanti iti paśyejjyāyānapi saṃdhīyeta vigrahodvegaṃ vā śamayet
vyasanayaugapadye'pi guruvyasano'smi laghuvyasanaḥ paraḥ sukhena pratikṛtya vyasanamātmano'bhiyuñjyāditi paśyejjyāyānapi saṃdhīyeta

lg.l: parikrayo bhavetsaṃdhiḥ sa eva ca yathāsukham
svakāryāṇāṃ vaśenaite deśe kāle ca bhāṣitāḥ

div.p: yadā vā paśyetsvadaṇḍairmitrāṭavīdaṇḍairvā samaṃ jyāyāṃsaṃ vā karśayitumutsahe iti tadā kṛtabāhyābhyantarakṛtyo vigṛhyāsīta
yadā vā paśyet utsāhayuktā me prakṛtayaḥ saṃhatā vivṛddhāḥ svakarmāṇyavyāhatāścariṣyanti parasya vā karmāṇyupahaniṣyanti iti tadā vigṛhyāsīta

yadā vā paśyetparasyāpacaritāḥ kṣīṇā lubdhāḥ svacakrastenāṭavīvyathitā vā prakṛtayaḥ svayamupajāpena vā māmeṣyanti sampannā me vārttā vipannā parasya tasya prakṛtayo durbhikṣopahatā māmeṣyanti vipannā me vārttā sampannā parasya
taṃ me prakṛtayo na gamiṣyanti vigṛhya cāsya dhānyapaśuhiraṇyānyāhariṣyāmi svapaṇyopaghātīni vā parapaṇyāni nivartayiṣyāmi
paravaṇikpathādvā saravanti māmeṣyanti vigṛhīte netaram dūṣyāmitrāṭavīnigrahaṃ vā vigṛhīto na kariṣyati taireva vā vigrahaṃ prāpsyati
mitraṃ me mitrabhāvyabhiprayāto bahvalpakālaṃ tanukṣayavyayamarthaṃ prāpsyati guṇavatīmādeyāṃ vā bhūmim
sarvasaṃdohena vā māmanādṛtya prayātukāmaḥ kathaṃ na yāyāditi paravṛddhipratighātārthaṃ pratāpārthaṃ ca vigṛhyāsīta
karśanamātramasya kuryādavyasaninaḥ paravṛddhyā tu vṛddhaḥ samucchedanam

yadā vā paśyet vyasanī paraḥ prakṛtivyasanaṃ vāsya śeeṣaprakṛtibhirapratikāryaṃ svacakrapīḍitā viraktā vāsya prakṛtayaḥ karśitā nirutsāhāḥ parasparādvā bhinnāḥ śakyā lobhayitumagnyudakavyādhimarakadurbhikṣanimittaṃ kṣīṇayugyapuruṣanicayarakṣāvidhānaḥ paraḥ iti tadā vigṛhya yāyāt
yadā vā paśyetmitramākrandaśca me śūravṛddhānuraktaprakṛtiḥ viparītaprakṛtiḥ paraḥ pārṣṇigrāhaścāsāraśca śakṣyāmi mitreṇāsāramākrandena pārṣṇigrāhaṃ vā vigṛhya yātumiti tadā vigṛhya yāyāt
yadā vā phalamekahāryamalpakālaṃ paśyettadā pārṣṇigrāhāsārābhyāṃ vigṛhya yāyāt
yadā vā paśyet na śakyamekena yātumavaśyaṃ ca yātavyamiti tadā samahīnajyāyobhiḥ sāmavāyikaiḥ sambhūya yāyādekatra nirdiṣṭenāṃśena anekatrānirdiṣṭenāṃśena
sambhūyābhigamanena vā nirviśyeta dhruve lābhe nirdiṣṭenāṃśena adhruve lābhāṃśena

lg.l: vilopo vā yathālābhaṃ prakṣepasama eva vā

div.p: amitrasiddhau hi yātavyaḥ sāhāyyaṃ dadyānnāmitro yātavyasiddhau
guruvyasanaṃ yātavyaṃ laghuvyasanamamitraṃ veti guruvyasanaṃ saukaryato yāyādityācāryāḥ
anabhiyuktastu laghuvyasanaḥ sukhena vyasanaṃ pratikṛtyāmitro yātavyamabhisaretpārṣṇiṃ vā gṛhṇīyāt
yātavyayaugapadye guruvyasanaṃ nyāyavṛttiṃ laghuvyasanamanyāyavṛttiṃ viraktaprakṛtiṃ veti viraktaprakṛtiṃ yāyāt
guruvyasanaṃ nyāyavṛttimabhiyuktaṃ prakṛtayo'nugṛhṇanti laghuvyasanamanyāyavṛttimupekṣante viraktā balavantamapyucchindanti
kṣīṇalubdhaprakṛtimapacaritaprakṛtiṃ veti kṣīṇalubdhaprakṛtiṃ yāyātkṣīṇalubdhā hi prakṛtayaḥ sukhenopajāpaṃ pīḍāṃ vopagacchanti nāpacaritāḥ pradhānāvagrahasādhyāḥ ityācāryāḥ
kṣīṇalubdhā hi prakṛtayo bhartari snigdhā bhartṛhite tiṣṭhanti upajāpaṃ vā visaṃvādayanti anurāge sārvaguṇyamiti
balavantamanyāyavṛttiṃ durbalaṃ vā nyāyavṛttimiti balavantamanyāyavṛttiṃ yāyāt
balavantamanyāyavṛttimabhiyuktaṃ prakṛtayo nānugṛhṇanti niṣpātayanti amitraṃ vāsya bhajante
durbalaṃ tu nyāyavṛttimabhiyuktaṃ prakṛtayaḥ parigṛhṇanti anuniṣpatanti vā

lg.l: akāryāṇāṃ ca karaṇaiḥ kāryāṇāṃ ca praṇāśanaiḥ
kṣīṇāḥ prakṛtayo lobhaṃ lubdhā yānti virāgatām
viraktā yāntyamitraṃ vā bhartāraṃ ghnanti vā svayam

div.p: tasmātprakṛtīnāṃ kṣayalobhavirāgakāraṇāni notpādayet utpannāni vā sadyaḥ pratikurvīta
kṣīṇā lubdhā viraktā vā prakṛtaya iti
kṣīṇāḥ pīḍanocchedanabhayātsadyaḥ saṃdhiṃ yuddhaṃ niṣpatanaṃ vā rocayante
tāsāṃ hiraṇyadhānyakṣayaḥ sarvopaghātī kṛcchrapratīkāraśca yugyapuruṣakṣayo hiraṇyadhānyasādhyaḥ
lobha aikadeśiko mukhyāyattaḥ parārtheṣu śakyaḥ pratihantumādātuṃ vā
śaktimān hi pārṣṇigrahaṇe yātrāsāhāyyadāne vā śaktaḥ śuciḥ siddhau cāsiddhau ca yathāsthitakārīti
teṣāṃ jyāyasaikena dvābhyāṃ samābhyāṃ vā sambhūya yātavyamiti dvābhyāṃ samābhyāṃ śreyaḥ
tau hi sukhau bhedayitum duṣṭaścaiko dvābhyāṃ niyantuṃ bhedopagrahaṃ copagantumiti
samenaikena dvābhyāṃ hīnābhyāṃ veti dvābhyāṃ hīnābhyāṃ śreyaḥ
tau hi dvikāryasādhakau vaśyau ca bhavataḥ

lg.l: anaṃśo vā tato'syāṅke prahṛtya dviguṇaṃ haret

div.p: sāmantaṃ saṃhitaprayāṇe yojayettvamito yāhi ahamito yāsyāmi samāno lābhaḥ iti
tvametaṃ deśaṃ yāhi ahamimaṃ deśaṃ yāsyāmi iti paripaṇitadeśaḥ
tvametāvantaṃ kālaṃ ceṣṭasva ahametāvantaṃ kālaṃ ceṣṭiṣye iti paripaṇitakālaḥ
tvametāvatkāryaṃ sādhaya ahamidaṃ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyāmi iti paripaṇitārthaḥ

yadi vā manyeta śailavananadīdurgamaṭavīvyavahitaṃ chinnadhānyapuruṣavīvadhāsāramayavasendhanodakamavijñātaṃ prakṛṣṭamanyabhāvadeśīyaṃ vā sainyavyāyāmānāmalabdhabhaumaṃ vā deśaṃ paro yāsyati viparītamahamityetasminviśeṣe paripaṇitadeśaṃ saṃdhimupeyāt

yadi vā manyeta pravarṣoṣṇaśītamativyādhiprāyamupakṣīṇāhāropabhogaṃ sainyavyāyāmānāṃ cāuparodhikaṃ kāryasādhanānāmūnamatiriktaṃ vā kālaṃ paraśceṣṭiṣyate viparītamahamityetasminviśeṣe paripaṇitakālaṃ saṃdhimupeyāt

yadi vā manyeta pratyādeyaṃ prakṛtikopakaṃ dīrghakālaṃ mahākṣayavyayamalpamanarthānubandhamakalyamadharmyaṃ madhyamodāsīnaviruddhaṃ mitropaghātakaṃ vā kāryaṃ paraḥ sādhayiṣyati viparītamahamityetasminviśeṣe paripaṇitārthaṃ saṃdhimupeyāt
tasminprāgevārabhya pratiṣṭhāpya ca svakarmāṇi parakarmasu vikrameta
vyasanatvarāvamānālasyayuktamajñaṃ vā śatrumatisaṃdhātukāmo deśakālakāryāṇāmanavasthāpanātsaṃhitau svaḥ iti saṃdhiviśvāsena paracchidramāsādya praharedityaparipaṇitaḥ
apūrvasya saṃdheḥ sānubandhaiḥ sāmādibhiḥ paryeṣaṇaṃ samahīnajyāyasāṃ ca yathābalamavasthāpanamakṛtacikīrṣā
kṛtasya priyahitābhyāmubhayataḥ paripālanaṃ yathāsambhāṣitasya ca nibandhanasyānuvartanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ ca kathaṃ parasmānna bhidyeta iti kṛtaśleṣaṇam
tasyāṃ gatāgataścaturvidhaḥ kāraṇādgatāgato viparītaḥ kāraṇādgato'kāraṇādāgato viparītaśceti
svāmino doṣeṇa gato guṇenāgataḥ parasya guṇena gato doṣeṇāgata iti kāraṇādgatāgataḥ saṃdheyaḥ
svadoṣeṇa gatāgato guṇamubhayoḥ parityajya akāraṇādgatāgataḥ calabuddhirasaṃdheyaḥ

svāmino doṣeṇa gataḥ parasmātsvadoṣeṇāgata iti kāraṇādgato'kāraṇādāgataḥ tarkayitavyaḥ paraprayuktaḥ svena vā doṣeṇāpakartukāmaḥ parasyocchettāramamitraṃ me jñātvā pratighātabhayādāgataḥ paraṃ vā māmucchettukāmaṃ parityajyānṛśaṃsyādāgataḥ iti

svadoṣeṇa gataḥ paradoṣeṇāgata ityakāraṇādgataḥ kāraṇādāgataḥ tarkayitavyaḥ chidraṃ me pūrayiṣyati ucito'yamasya vāsaḥ paratrāsya jano na ramate mitrairme saṃhitaḥ śatrubhirvigṛhītaḥ lubdhakrūrādāvignaḥ śatrusaṃhitādvā parasmāt iti
kṛtapraṇāśaḥ śaktihānirvidyāpaṇyatvamāśānirvedo deśalaulyamaviśvāso balavadvigraho vā parityāgasthānamityācāryāḥ
ihāpakārī tyājyaḥ parāpakārī saṃdheyaḥ ubhayāpakārī tarkayitavya iti samānam
asaṃdheyena tvavaśyaṃ saṃdhātavye yataḥ prabhāvastataḥ pratividadhyāt

lg.l: paṇyaṃ kuryādasiddhaṃ vā siddhaṃ vā tena saṃvṛtam
prakāśayuddhaṃ nirdiṣṭe deśe kāle ca vikramaḥ

div.p: sāmantaṃ sāmantena sambhūya yāyāt yadi vā manyeta pārṣṇiṃ me na grahīṣyati pārṣṇigrāhaṃ vārayiṣyati yātavyaṃ nābhisariṣyati baladvaiguṇyaṃ me bhaviṣyati vīvadhāsārau me pravartayiṣyati parasya vārayiṣyati bahvābādhe me pathi kaṇṭakānmardayiṣyati durgāṭavyapasāreṣu daṇḍena cariṣyati yātavyamaviṣahye doṣe saṃdhau vā sthāpayiṣyati labdhalābhāṃśo vā śatrūnanyānme viśvāsayiṣyati iti
dvaidhībhūto vā kośena daṇḍaṃ daṇḍena kośaṃ sāmantānāmanyatamāl lipseta
teṣāṃ jyāyaso'dhikenāṃśena samātsamena hīnādd hīneneti samasaṃdhiḥ
vyasaninamapāyasthāne saktamanarthinaṃ vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīno balasamena lābhena paṇeta
evaṃ bhūto vā hīnaśaktipratāpapūraṇārthaṃ sambhāvyārthābhisārī mūlapārṣṇitrāṇārthaṃ vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīno balasamādviśiṣṭena lābhena paṇeta
jātavyasanaprakṛtirandhramupasthitānarthaṃ vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīno durgamitrapratiṣṭabdho vā hrasvamadhvānaṃ yātukāmaḥ śatrumayuddhamekāntasiddhiṃ vā lābhamādātukāmo balasamādd hīnena lābhena paṇeta

arandhravyasano vā jyāyāndurārabdhakarmāṇaṃ bhūyaḥ kṣayavyayābhyāṃ yoktukāmo dūṣyadaṇḍaṃ pravāsayitukāmo dūṣyadaṇḍamāvāhayitukāmo vā pīḍanīyamucchedanīyaṃ vā hīnena vyathayitukāmaḥ saṃdhipradhāno vā kalyāṇabuddhirhīnaṃ lābhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt
parānīkasya pratyanīkaṃ mitrāṭavīnāṃ vā śatrorvibhūmīnāṃ deśikaṃ mūlapārṣṇitrāṇārthaṃ vā samo balasamena lābhena paṇeta
jātavyasanaprakṛtirandhramanekaviruddhamanyato labhamāno vā samo balasamādd hīnena lābhena paṇeta
evaṃ bhūto vā samaḥ sāmantāyattakāryaḥ kartavyabalo vā balasamādviśiṣṭena lābhena paṇeta
jātavyasanaprakṛtirandhramabhihantukāmaḥ svārabdhamekāntasiddhiṃ vāsya karmopahantukāmo mūle yātrāyāṃ vā prahartukāmo yātavyādbhūyo labhamāno vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīnaṃ samaṃ vā bhūyo yāceta

bhūyo vā yācitaḥ svabalarakṣārthaṃ durdharṣamanyadurgamāsāramaṭavīṃ vā paradaṇḍena marditukāmaḥ prakṛṣṭe'dhvani kāle vā paradaṇḍaṃ kṣayavyayābhyāṃ yoktukāmaḥ paradaṇḍena vā vivṛddhastamevocchettukāmaḥ paradaṇḍamādātukāmo vā bhūyo dadyāt
jyāyānvā hīnaṃ yātavyāpadeśena haste kartukāmaḥ paramucchidya vā tamevocchettukāmaḥ tyāgaṃ vā kṛtvā pratyādātukāmo balasamādviśiṣṭena lābhena paṇeta
jātavyasanaprakṛtirandhro vā jyāyān hīnaṃ balasamena lābhena paṇeta
evaṃ bhūtaṃ hīnaṃ jyāyānbalasamādd hīnena lābhena paṇeta

lg.l: tato vitarkyobhayato yataḥ śreyaś tato vrajet

div.p: yātavyo'bhiyāsyamānaḥ saṃdhikāraṇamādātukāmo vihantukāmo vā sāmavāyikānāmanyatamaṃ lābhadvaiguṇyena paṇeta

durārabdhakarmāṇaṃ bhūyaḥ kṣayavyayābhyāṃ yoktukāmaḥ svārabdhāṃ vā yātrāsiddhiṃ vighātayitukāmo mūle yātrāyāṃ vā prahartukāmo yātavyasaṃhitaḥ punaryācitukāmaḥ pratyutpannārthakṛcchrastasminnaviśvasto vā tadātve lābhamalpamicchet āyatyāṃ prabhūtam
dūṣyāmitrābhyāṃ mūlahareṇa vā jyāyasā vigṛhītaṃ trātukāmastathāvidhamupakāraṃ kārayitukāmaḥ sambandhāvekṣī vā tadātve cāyatyāṃ ca lābhaṃ na pratigṛhṇīyāt
kṛtasaṃdhiratikramitukāmaḥ parasya prakṛtikarśanaṃ mitrāmitrasaṃdhiviśleṣaṇaṃ vā kartukāmaḥ parābhiyogācchaṅkamāno lābhamaprāptamadhikaṃ vā yāceta
śakyārambhī viṣahyaṃ karmārabhate kalyārambhī nirdoṣam bhavyārambhī kalyāṇodayam
ta ete kṛtārthāḥ sukhena prabhūtaṃ copakurvanti
tayorekapuruṣānugrahe yo mitraṃ mitrataraṃ vānugṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
madhyamaṃ tvanugṛhṇatoryo madhyamaṃ mitraṃ mitrataraṃ vānugṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
madhyamodāsīnayorbalāṃśadāne yaḥ śūraṃ kṛtāstraṃ duḥkhasahamanuraktaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ dadāti so'tisaṃdhīyate
yatra tu daṇḍaḥ prahitastaṃ vā cārthamanyāṃśca sādhayati tatra maulabhṛtaśreṇīmitrāṭavībalānāmanyatamamupalabdhadeśakālaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt amitrāṭavībalaṃ vā vyavahitadeśakālam
yaṃ tu manyeta kṛtārtho me daṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīyādamitrāṭavyabhūmyanṛtuṣu vā vāsayedaphalaṃ vā kuryāditi daṇḍavyāsaṅgāpadeśena nainamanugṛhṇīyāt

lg.l: same hi lābhe saṃdhiḥ syādviṣame vikramo mataḥ

div.p: yo vā lābhaḥ siddhaḥ śeṣayoranyataraṃ sādhayati
tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca mitraṃ labhāvahe ityevaṃ ādidh samasaṃdhiḥ
samasaṃdhau tu yaḥ sampannaṃ mitraṃ mitrakṛcchre vā mitramavāpnoti so'tisaṃdhatte
mitrakṛcchre'pi nityamavaśyamanityaṃ vaśyaṃ veti nityamavaśyaṃ śreyaḥ tadd hi anupakurvadapi nāpakaroti ityācāryāḥ
vaśyayorapi mahābhogamanityamalpabhogaṃ vā nityamiti | mahābhogamanityaṃ śreyaḥ mahābhogamanityamalpakālena mahadupakurvanmahānti vyayasthānāni pratikaroti ityācāryāḥ
gurusamutthaṃ mahanmitraṃ laghusamutthamalpaṃ veti gurusamutthaṃ mahanmitraṃ pratāpakaraṃ bhavati yadā cottiṣṭhate tadā kāryaṃ sādhayati ityācāryāḥ
lagusamutthamalpaṃ mitraṃ kāryakālaṃ nātipātayati daurbalyācca yatheṣṭabhogyaṃ bhavati netaratprakṛṣṭabhaumam
vikṣiptasainyamavaśyasainyaṃ veti vikṣiptaṃ sainyaṃ śakyaṃ pratisaṃhartuṃ vaśyatvādityācāryāḥ
avaśyaṃ hi śakyaṃ sāmādibhirvaśyaṃ kartuṃ netaratkāryavyāsaktaṃ pratisaṃhartum
puruṣabhogaṃ hiraṇyabhogaṃ vā mitramiti puruṣabhogaṃ mitraṃ śreyaḥ pruṣabhogaṃ mitraṃ pratāpakaraṃ bhavati yadā cottiṣṭhate tadā kāryaṃ sādhayati ityācāryāḥ
daṇḍaśca hiraṇyenānye ca kāmāḥ prāpyanta iti
tulye puruṣabhoge vikramaḥ kleśasahatvamanurāgaḥ sarvabalalābho vā mitrakulādviśeṣaḥ
tulye hiraṇyabhoge prārthitārthatā prābhūtyamalpaprayasatā sātatyaṃ ca viśeṣaḥ

lg.l: ṛte yadarthaṃ praṇayād rakṣyate yacca rakṣati
ādātṛ vā dātrapi vā jīvatyariṣu hiṃsayā
priyaṃ parasya vā rakṣyaṃ pūjyaṃ sambaddhameva vā

div.p: kṣipramalpo lābhaścirānmahāniti vā kṣipramalpo lābhaḥ kāryadeśakālasaṃvādakaḥ śreyānityācāryāḥ
cirādavinipātī bījasadharmā mahāml lābhaḥ śreyānviparyaye pūrvaḥ

lg.l: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhruve lābhe lābhāṃśe ca guṇodayam

div.p: tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhāvahe iti bhūmisaṃdhiḥ
tulye sampannālābhe yo balavantamākramya bhūmimavāpnoti so'tisaṃdhatte
bhūmilābhaṃ śatrukarśanaṃ pratāpaṃ ca hi prāpnoti
durbala eva ca bhūmilābhaḥ tatsāmantaśca mitramamitrabhāvaṃ gacchati
tulye balīyastve yaḥ sthitaśatrumutpāṭya bhūmimavāpnoti so'tisaṃdhatte
sampannā nityāmitrā mandaguṇā vā bhūmiranityāmitreti sampannā nityāmitrā śreyasī bhūmiḥ sampannā hi kośadaṇḍau sampādayati tau cāmitrapratighātakau ityācāryāḥ
nityaśca śatrurupakṛte cāpakṛte ca śatrureva bhavati anityastu śatrurupakārādanapakārādvā śāmyati
yasyā hi bhūmerbahudurgāścoragaṇairmlecchāṭavībhirvā nityāvirahitāḥ pratyantāḥ sā nityāmitrā viparyaye tvanityāmitrā
alpā pratyāsannā mahatī vyavahitā vā bhūmiriti alpā pratyāsannā śreyasī
sukhā hi prāptuṃ pālayitumabhisārayituṃ ca bhavati
vyavahitayorapi daṇḍadhāraṇātmadhāraṇā vā bhūmiriti ātmadhāraṇā śreyasī
ucchedanīyo hyanapāśrayo durbalāpāśrayo vābhiyuktaḥ kośadaṇḍāvādāyāpasartukāmaḥ prakṛtibhistyajyate na pīḍanīyo durgamitrapratiṣṭabdhaḥ
nadīdurgaṃ tu dviguṇakleśakaramudakaṃ ca pātavyaṃ vṛttikaraṃ cāmitrasya
pārvataṃ tu svārakṣaṃ duruparodhi kṛcchrārohaṇam bhagne caikasminna sarvavadhaḥ śilāvṛkṣapramokṣaśca mahāpakāriṇām
khanakā hi khātena śastreṇa cobhayathā yudhyante śastreṇaivākāśayodhinaḥ
tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca śūnyaṃ niveśayāvahe ityanavasitasaṃdhiḥ
tayoryaḥ pratyupasthitārtho yathoktaguṇāṃ bhūmiṃ niveśayati so'tisaṃdhatte
tatrāpi sthalamaudakaṃ veti mahataḥ sthalādalpamaudakaṃ śreyaḥ sātatyādavasthitatvācca phalānām
dravyahastivanabhogayordravyavanabhogaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ yoniḥ prabhūtanidhānakṣamaśca viparīto hastivanabhogaḥ ityācāryāḥ
śakyaṃ dravyavanamanekamanekasyāṃ bhūmau vāpayituṃ na hastivanam
bhinnamanuṣyā śreṇīmanuṣyā vā bhūmiriti bhinnamanuṣyā śreyasī
bhinnamanuṣyā bhogyā bhavati anupajāpyā cānyeṣāmanāpatsahā tu
tasyāṃ cāturvarṇyaniveśe sarvabhogasahatvādavaravarṇaprāyā śreyasī bāhulyāddhruvatvācca kṛṣyāḥ karṣakavatī kṛṣyāścānyeṣāṃ cārambhāṇāṃ prayojakatvāt gorakṣakavatī paṇyanicayarṇānugrahādāḍhyavaṇigvatī
durgāpāśrayā puruṣāpāśrayā vā bhūmiriti puruṣāpāśrayā śreyasī
mahākṣayavyayaniveśāṃ tu bhūmimavāptukāmaḥ pūrvameva kretāraṃ paṇeta durbalamarājabījinaṃ nirutsāhamapakṣamanyāyavṛttiṃ vyasaninaṃ daivapramāṇaṃ yatkiṃcanakāriṇaṃ vā
mahākṣayavyayaniveśāyāṃ hi bhūmau durbalo rājabījī niviṣṭaḥ sagandhābhiḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha kṣayavyayenāvasīdati
guṇavatīmādeyāṃ vā bhūmiṃ balavatā krayeṇa yācitaḥ saṃdhimavasthāpya dadyāt
samena vā yācitaḥ kāraṇamavekṣya dadyātpratyādeyā me bhūmirvaśyā vā anayā pratibaddhaḥ paro me vaśyo bhaviṣyatibhūmivikrayādvā mitrahiraṇyalābhaḥ kāryasāmarthyakaro me bhaviṣyati iti

lg.l: evaṃ mitraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca sajanāmajanāṃ ca gām

div.p: tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca durgaṃ kārayāvahe iti karmasaṃdhiḥ
dravyavanayorapi yo mahatsāravaddravyāṭavīkaṃ viṣayānte nadīmātṛkaṃ dravyavanaṃ chedayati so'tisaṃdhatte
hastivanayorapi yo bahuśūramṛgaṃ durbalaprativeśaṃ anantāvakleśi viṣayānte hastivanaṃ badhnāti so'tisaṃdhatte
tatrāpi bahukuṇṭhālpaśūrayoḥ alpaśūraṃ śreyaḥ śūreṣu hi yuddhamalpāḥ śūrā bahūnaśūrānbhañjanti te bhagnāḥ svasainyāvaghātino bhavanti ityācāryāḥ
kuṇṭhā bahavaḥ śreyāṃsaḥ skandhaviniyogādanekaṃ karma kurvāṇāḥ sveṣāmapāśrayo yuddhe pareṣāṃ durdharṣā vibhīṣaṇāśca
bahuṣu hi kuṇṭheṣu vinayakarmaṇā śakyaṃ śauryamādhātuṃ na tvevālpeṣu śūreṣu bahutvamiti
khanyorapi yaḥ prabhūtasārāmadurgamārgāmalpavyayārambhāṃ khaniṃ khānayati so'tisaṃdhatte
tatrāpi mahāsāramalpamalpasāraṃ vā prabhūtamiti mahāsāramalpaṃ śreyaḥ vajramaṇimuktāpravālahemarūpyadhāturhi prabhūtamalpasāramatyargheṇa grasate ityācāryāḥ
cirādalpo mahāsārasya kretā vidyate prabhūtaḥ sātatyādalpasārasya
vāripathe tu kūlasamyānapathayoḥ kūlapathaḥ paṇyapattanabāhulyācchreyānnadīpatho vā sātatyādviṣahyābādhatvācca
dakṣiṇāpathe'pi bahukhaniḥ sārapaṇyaḥ prasiddhagatiralpavyayavyāyāmo vā vaṇikpathaḥ śreyānprabhūtaviṣayo vā phalgupuṇyaḥ
tulye karmapathe sthānaṃ jñeyaṃ svaṃ vijigīṣuṇā
saṃhatyārivijigīṣvoramitrayoḥ parābhiyoginoḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇatoryaḥ śaktisampannasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
śaktisāmye yo vipulārambhasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
ārambhasāmye yaḥ sarvasaṃdohena prayātasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
śūnyamūlo hyasya sukaro bhavati naikadeśabalaprayātaḥ kṛtapārṣṇipratividhānaḥ
balopādānasāmye yaścalāmitraṃ prayātasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
calāmitraṃ prayāto hi sukhenāvāptasiddhiḥ pārṣṇigrāhamucchindyāt na sthitāmitraṃ prayātaḥ
asau hi durgapratihataḥ pārṣṇigrāhe ca pratinivṛttaḥ sthitenāmitreṇāvagṛhyate
śatrusāmye yo dhārmikābhiyoginaḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
dhārmikābhiyogī hi sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca dveṣyo bhavati adhārmikābhiyogī sampriyaḥ
mitramamitraṃ cābhiyuñjānayoryo mitrābhiyoginaḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so'tisaṃdhatte
tayoralabdhalābhāpagamane yasyāmitro mahato lābhādviyuktaḥ kṣayavyayādhiko vā sa pārṣṇigrāho'tisaṃdhatte
labdhalābhāpagamane yasyāmitro lābhena śaktyā hīnaḥ sa pārṣṇigrāho'tisaṃdhatte yasya vā yātavyaḥ śatrorvigrahāpakārasamarthaḥ syāt
pārṣṇigrāhayorapi yaḥ śakyārambhabalopādānādhikaḥ sthitaśatruḥ pārśvasthāyī vā so'tisaṃdhatte
pārśvasthāyī hi yātavyābhisāro mūlābādhakaśca bhavati mūlābādhaka eva paścātsthāyī

lg.l: sāmantaḥ pṛṣṭhato vargaḥ prativeśau ca pārśvayoḥ

div.p: madhyamaṃ tvarivijigīṣvorlipsamānayormadhyamasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇatorlabdhalābhāpagamane yo madhyamaṃ mitrādviyojayatyamitraṃ ca mitramāpnoti so'tisaṃdhatte
jitvāpi hi kṣiṇadaṇḍakośaḥ parājito bhavati ityācāryāḥ
tulye kṣayavyaye yaḥ purastāddūṣyabalaṃ ghātayitvā nihśalyaḥ paścādvaśyabalo yudhyeta so'tisaṃdhatte
dvayorapi purastāddūṣyabalaghātinoryo bahulataraṃ śaktimattaramatyantadūṣyaṃ ca ghātayetso'tisaṃdhatte

lg.l: pārṣṇigrāho'bhiyoktā vā yātavyo vā yadā bhavet
kṛtsne ca maṇḍale nityaṃ dūtān gūḍhāṃśca vāsayet
mitrabhūtaḥ sapatnānāṃ hatvā hatvā ca saṃvṛtaḥ

div.p: bhedaṃ vā brūyāt anapakāro yathāhametaiḥ sambhūyābhiyuktastathā tvāmapyete saṃhitabalāḥ svasthā vyasane vābhiyokṣyante balaṃ hi cittaṃ vikaroti tadeṣāṃ vighātaya iti
bhinneṣu pradhānamupagṛhya hīneṣu vikramayet hīnānanugrāhya vā pradhāne yathā vā śreyo'bhimanyeta tathā
athobhayavetanāḥ phalabhūyastvaṃ darśayantaḥ sāmavāyikānatisaṃhitāḥ stha ityudddūṣayeyuḥ
athobhayavetanā bhūyo bhedameṣāṃ kuryuḥ evaṃ tad yadasmābhirdarśitamiti

pradhānābhāve sāmavāyikānāmutsāhayitāraṃ sthirakarmāṇamanuraktaprakṛktiṃ lobhādbhayādvā saṃghātamupāgataṃ vijigīṣorbhītaṃ rājyapratisambaddhaṃ mitraṃ calāmitraṃ vā pūrvānuttarābhāve sādhayet utsāhayitāramātmanisargeṇa sthirakarmāṇaṃ sāntvapraṇipātena anuraktaprakṛtiṃ kanyādānayāpanābhyām lubdhamaṃśadvaiguṇyena bhītamebhyaḥ kośadaṇḍānugraheṇa svato bhītaṃ viśvāsya pratibhūpradānena rājyapratisambaddhamekībhāvopagamanena mitramubhayataḥ priyahitābhyāmupakāratyāgena vā calāmitramavadhṛtamanapakāropakārābhyām
yo vā yathāyogaṃ bhajeta taṃ tathā sādhayetsāmadānabhedadaṇḍairvā yathāpatsu vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
vyasanopaghātatvarito vā kośadaṇḍābhyāṃ deśe kāle kārye vāvadhṛtaṃ saṃdhimupeyāt
pakṣe hīno bandhumitrapakṣaṃ kurvīta durgamaviṣahyaṃ vā
durgamitrapratiṣṭabdho hi sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca pūjyo bhavati
vaṇikpathena hi daṇḍagūḍhapuruṣātinayanaṃ śastrāvaraṇayānavāhanakrayaśca kriyate praveśo nirṇayanaṃ ca
khaniḥ saṃgrāmopakaraṇānāṃ yoniḥ dravyavanaṃ durgakarmaṇāṃ yānarathayośca hastivanaṃ hastināṃ gavāśvakharoṣṭrāṇāṃ ca vrajaḥ
utsāhahīnaḥ śreṇīpravīrapuruṣāṇāṃ coragaṇāṭavikamlecchajātīnāṃ parāpakāriṇāṃ gūḍhapuruṣāṇāṃ ca yathālābbhamupacayaṃ kurvīta

lg.l: evaṃ pakṣeṇa mantreṇa dravyeṇa ca balena ca

div.p: durbalo rājā balavatābhiyuktastadviśiṣṭabalamāśrayeta yamitaro mantraśaktyā nātisaṃdadhyāt
viśiṣṭabalābhāve samabalaistulyabalasaṃghairvā balavataḥ sambhūya tiṣṭhed yānna mantraprabhāvaśaktibhyāmatisaṃdadhyāt
samabalābhāve hīnabalaiḥ śucibhirutsāhibhiḥ pratyanīkabhūtairbalavataḥ sambhūya tiṣṭhed yānna mantraprabhāvotsāhaśaktibhiratisaṃdadhyāt
sahāyābhāve durgamāśrayeta yatrāmitraḥ prabhūtasainyo'pi bhaktayavasendhanodakoparodhaṃ na kuryātsvayaṃ ca kṣayavyayābhyāṃ yujyeta
tadebhiḥ kārṇairāśrayeta pārṣṇigrāhamāsāraṃ madhyamamudāsīnaṃ vā pratipādayiṣyāmi sāmantāṭavikatatkulīnāparuddhānāmanyatamenāsya rājyaṃ hārayiṣyāmi ghātayiṣyāmi vā
kṛtyapakṣopagraheṇa vāsya durge rāṣṭre skandhāvāre vā kopaṃ samutthāpayiṣyāmi śastrāgnirasapraṇidhānairaupaniṣadikairvā yatheṣṭamāsannaṃ haniṣyāmi
svayaṃ adhiṣṭhitena vā yogapraṇidhānena kṣayavyayamenamupaneṣyāmi kṣayavyayapravāsopatapte vāsya mitravarge sainye vā krameṇopajāpaṃ prāpsyāmi

vīvadhāsāraprasāravadhena vāsya skandhāvārāvagrahaṃ kariṣyāmi daṇḍopanayena vāsya randhramutthāpya sarvasaṃdohena prahariṣyāmi pratihatotsāhena vā yatheṣṭaṃ saṃdhimavāpsyāmi mayi pratibaddhasya vā sarvataḥ kopāḥ samutthāsyanti

nirāsāraṃ vāsya mūlaṃ mitrāṭavīdaṇḍairuddhātayiṣyāmi mahato vā deśasya yogakṣemamihasthaḥ pālayiṣyāmi svavikṣiptaṃ mitravikṣiptaṃ vā me sainyamihasthasyaikasthamaviṣahyaṃ bhaviṣyati nimnakhātarātriyuddhaviśāradaṃ vā me sainyaṃ pathyābādhamuktamāsanne karma kariṣyati
viruddhadeśakālamihāgato vā svayameva kṣayavyayābhyāṃ na bhaviṣyati mahākṣayavyayābhigamyo'yaṃ deśo durgāṭavyapasārabāhulyāt
pareṣāṃ vyādhiprāyaḥ sainyavyāyāmānāmalabdhabhaumaśca tamāpadgataḥ pravekṣyati praviṣṭo vā na nirgamiṣyati iti
tena vā preṣitamarthamānābhyāṃ satkṛtya brūyāt idaṃ rājñaḥ paṇyāgāramidaṃ devīkumārāṇām devīkumāravacanāt idaṃ rājyamahaṃ ca tvadarpaṇaḥ iti
ucitāṃ vā mitrādbhūmiṃ dīyamānāṃ na pratigṛhṇīyāt
evamutsāhavato daṇḍopakāriṇaḥ sthāpayetsvaprabhāvavataḥ kośopakāriṇaḥ prajñāvato bhūmyupakāriṇaḥ
teṣāṃ paṇyapattanagrāmakhanisaṃjātena ratnasāraphalgukupyena dravyahastivanavrajasamutthena yānavāhanena vā yadbahuśa upakaroti taccitrabhogam
pārṣṇigrāhaścāṭavikaḥ śatrumukhyaḥ śatrurvā bhūmidānasādhyaḥ kaścidāsādyeta nirguṇayā bhūmyainamupagrāhayet apratisambaddhayā durgasthaṃ nirupajīvyayāṭavikaṃ
pratyādeyayā tatkulīnaṃ śatroḥ apacchinnayā śatroraparuddhaṃ nityāmitrayā śreṇībalam balavatsāmantayā saṃhatabalamubhābhyāṃ yuddhe pratilomam
alabdhavyāyāmayotsāhinaṃ śūyayāripakṣīyaṃ karśitayāpavāhitaṃ mahākṣayavyayaniveśayā gatapratyāgatamanapāśrayayā pratyapasṛtam pareṇānadhivāsyayā svayameva bhartāramupagrāhayet
svayaṃ āgatānāṃ yatheṣṭadarśanaṃ pratividhānaṃ ca kuryāt
yastūpanatān hatvā baddhvā vā bhūmidravyaputradārānabhimanyeta tasyodvignaṃ maṇḍalamabhāvāyottiṣṭhate
satyaṃ śapatho vā calaḥ saṃdhiḥ pratibhūḥ pratigraho vā sthāvaraḥ ityācāryāḥ
satyaṃ śapatho vā paratreha ca sthāvaraḥ saṃdhiḥ ihārtha eva pratibhūḥ pratigraho vā balāpekṣaḥ
saṃhitāḥ smaḥ iti satyasaṃdhāḥ pūrve rājānaḥ satyena saṃdadhire
tasyātikrame śapathena agnyudakasītāprākāraloṣṭahastiskandhāśvapṛṣṭarathopasthaśastraratnabījagandharasasuvarṇahiraṇyānyālebhire hanyuretāni tyajeyuścainaṃ yaḥ śapathamatikrāmet iti
śapathātikrame mahatāṃ tapasvināṃ mukhyānāṃ vā prātibhāvyabandhaḥ pratibhūḥ
tasminyo dūṣyāmātyaṃ dūṣyāpatyaṃ vā dadāti so'tisaṃdhatte
putrayorapi yo jātyaṃ prājñaṃ śūraṃ kṛtāstramekaputraṃ vā dadāti so'tisaṃdhīyate
jātyādajātyo hi luptadāyādasaṃtānatvādādhātuṃ śreyānprājñādaprājño mantraśaktilopāt śūrādaśūra utsāhaśaktilopātkṛtāstrādakṛtāstraḥ prahartavyasampallopāt ekaputrādanekaputro nirapekṣatvāt
prājñaśūrayoḥ prājñamaśūraṃ matikarmaṇāṃ yogo'nuvartate śūramaprājñaṃ vikramādhikāraḥ
bahvekaputrayorbahuputra ekaṃ dattvā śeṣapratiṣṭabdhaḥ saṃdhimatikrāmati netaraḥ
kumārāsannāḥ sattriṇaḥ kāruśilpivyañjanāḥ karmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ suruṅgayā rātrāv upakhānayitvā kumāramapahareyuḥ
paricārakacchadmanā vā kiṃcidarūpavelāyāmādāya nirgacchetsuruṅgāmukhena vā niśopahāreṇa
daivatopahāraśrāddhaprahavaṇanimittamārakṣiṣu madanayogayuktamannapānaṃ rasaṃ vā prayujyāpagacchet ārakṣakaprotsāhanena vā
nāgarakakuśīlavacikitsakāpūpikavyañjanā vā rātrau samṛddhagṛhāṇyādīpayeyuḥ ārakṣiṇāṃ vā
muṇḍajaṭilānāṃ pravāsanānyanupraviṣṭo vā rātrau tadvyañjanaḥ pratiṣṭheta virūpavyādhikaraṇāraṇyacaracchadmanāmanyatamena vā
gṛhīto vā sāmādibhiranupātamatisaṃdadhyāt rasaviddhena vā pathyadanena
vāruṇayogāgnidāheṣu vā śarīramanyadādhāya śatrumabhiyuñjīta putro me tvayā hataḥ iti
madhyamasyātmā tṛtīyā pañcamī ca prakṛtī prakṛtayaḥ
madyamaścedvijigīṣormitraṃ mitrabhāvi lipseta mitrasyātmanaśca mitrāṇyutthāpya madhyamācca mitrāṇi bhedayitvā mitraṃ trāyeta
maṇḍalaṃ vā protsāhayet atipravṛddho'yaṃ madhyamaḥ sarveṣāṃ no vināśāyābhyutthitaḥ sambhūyāsya yātrāṃ vihanāma iti

na cedanugṛhṇīyātkośadaṇḍābhyāṃ mitramanugṛhya ye madhyamadveṣiṇo rājānaḥ parasparānugṛhītā vā bahavastiṣṭheyuḥ ekasiddhau vā bahavaḥ sidhyeyuḥ parasparādvā śaṅkitā nottiṣṭheranteṣāṃ pradhānamekamāsannaṃ vā sāmadānābhyāṃ labheta
deśakālātipattau vā saṃdhāya madhyamena mitrasya sācivyaṃ kuryātdūṣyeṣu vā karmasaṃdhim
karśanīyaṃ vāsya mitraṃ madhyamo lipseta pratistambhayedenaṃ ahaṃ tvā trāyeya iti ā karśanāt
ucchedanīyaṃ vāsya mitraṃ madhyamo lipseta karśitamenaṃ trāyeta madhyamavṛddhibhayāt
karśanīyocchedanīyayoścenmitrāṇi madhyamasya sācivyakarāṇi syuḥ puruṣāntareṇa saṃdhīyeta
evaṃ svārthaśca kṛto bhavati madhyamasya priyaṃ ca
upekṣeta vā maṇḍalamasya kupyatu svapakṣavadhāt iti
udāsīnaṃ vā madhyamo lipseta asmai sāhāyyaṃ dadyādudāsīnādbhidyatāmiti
udāsīnaścenmadhyamaṃ lipseta yataḥ śatrumatisaṃdadhyānmitrasyopakāraṃ kuryādudāsīnaṃ vā daṇḍopakāriṇaṃ labheta tataḥ pariṇameta

satyapyamitrabhāve tasyānātmavānnityāpakārī śatruḥ śatrusaṃhitaḥ pārṣṇigrāho vā vyasanī yātavyo vyasane vā neturabhiyoktā ityaribhāvinaḥ ekārthābhiprayātaḥ pṛthagarthābhiprayātaḥ sambhūyayātrikaḥ saṃhitaprayāṇikaḥ svārthābhiprayātaḥ sāmutthāyikaḥ kośadaṇḍayoranyatarasya kretā vikretā vā dvaidhībhāvika iti mitrabhāvinaḥ
sāmanto balavataḥ pratighāto'ntardhiḥ prativeśo vā balavataḥ pārṣṇigrāho vā svayamupanataḥ pratāpopanato vā daṇḍopanata iti bhṛtyabhāvinaḥ sāmantāḥ

lg.l: vṛddhiṃ kṣayaṃ ca sthānaṃ ca karśanocchedanaṃ tathā

div.p: vyasanayaugapadye saukaryato yātavyaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ veti vyasanacintā
guṇaprātilomyamabhāvaḥ pradoṣaḥ prasaṅgaḥ pīḍā vā vyasanam
mantro mantraphalāvāptiḥ karmānuṣṭhānamāyavyayakarma daṇḍapraṇayanamamitrāṭavīpratiṣedho rājyarakṣaṇaṃ vyasanapratīkāraḥ kumārarakṣaṇamabhiṣekaśca kumārāṇāmāyattamamātyeṣu
vaiguṇye ca prāṇābādhaḥ prāṇāntikacaratvād rājñaḥ iti
svāmī ca sampannaḥ svasampadbhiḥ prakṛtīḥ sampādayati
sa yacchīlastacchīlāḥ prakṛtayo bhavanti utthāne pramāde ca tadāyattatvāt
kośo daṇḍaḥ kupyaṃ viṣṭirvāhanaṃ nicayāśca janapadāduttiṣṭhante
amātyamūlāḥ sarvārambhāḥ janapadasya karmasiddhayaḥ svataḥ parataśca yogakṣemasādhanaṃ vyasanapratīkāraḥ śūnyaniveśopacayau daṇḍakarānugrahaśceti
durge hi kośadaṇḍotpattirāpadi sthānaṃ ca janapadasya
śaktimattarāśca paurā jānapadebhyo nityāścāpadi sahāyā rājñaḥ
śauryaṃ sthairyaṃ dākṣyaṃ bāhulyaṃ ca jānapadeṣu
karṣakaprāye tu durgavyasanamāyudhīyaprāye tu janapade janapadavyasanamiti
kośamūlo hi durgasaṃskāro durgarakṣaṇaṃ janapadamitrāmitranigraho deśāntaritānāmutsāhanaṃ daṇḍabalavyavahāraśca
kośamādāya ca vyasane śakyamapayātuṃ na durgamiti
durgārpaṇaḥ kośo daṇḍastūṣṇīṃ yuddhaṃ svapakṣanigraho daṇḍabalavyavahāra āsārapratigrahaḥ paracakrāṭavīpratiṣedhaśca
kośābhāve ca śakyaḥ kupyena bhūmyā parabhūmisvayaṃ grāheṇa vā daṇḍaḥ piṇḍayitum daṇḍavatā ca kośaḥ
kośābhāve daṇḍaḥ paraṃ gacchati svāminaṃ vā hanti
lambhapālano hi daṇḍaḥ kośasya kośaḥ kośasya daṇḍasya ca bhavati
mitramabhṛtaṃ vyavahitaṃ ca karma karoti pārṣṇigrāhamāsāramamitramāṭavikaṃ ca pratikaroti kośadaṇḍabhūmibhiścopakaroti vyasanāvasthāyogamiti
daṇḍavato mitraṃ mitrabhāve tiṣṭhati amitro vā mitrabhāve
śīghrābhiyāne tvamitrāṭavikānabhyantarakope ca na mitraṃ vidyate

lg.l: dvayostu vyasane tulye viśeṣo guṇataḥ kṣayāt

div.p: dvairājyavairājyayordvairājyamanyonyapakṣadveṣānurāgābhyāṃ parasparasaṃgharṣeṇa vā vinaśyati vairājyaṃ tu prakṛticittagrahaṇāpekṣi yathāsthitamanyairbhujyate ityācāryāḥ
vairājyaṃ tu jīvataḥ parasyācchidya naitanmama iti manyamānaḥ karśayati apavāhayati paṇyaṃ vā karoti viraktaṃ vā parityajyāpagacchatīti
andhaścalitaśāstro vā rājeti aśāstracakṣurandho yatkiṃcanakārī dṛḍhābhiniveśī parapraṇeyo vā rājyamanyāyenopahanti calitaśāstrastu yatra śāstrāccalitamatirbhavati śakyānunayo bhavati ityācāryāḥ
andho rājā śakyate sahāyasampadā yatra tatra vā paryavasthāpayitum
vyādhito navo vā rājeti vyādhito rājā rājyopaghātamamātyamūlaṃ prāṇābādhaṃ vā rājyamūlamavāpnoti navastu rājā svadharmānugrahaparihāradānamānakarmabhiḥ prakṛtirañjanopakāraiścarati ityācāryāḥ
navastu rājā balāvarjitaṃ mamedaṃ rājyamiti yatheṣṭamanavagrahaścarati
durbalo'bhijāto balavānanabhijāto rājeti durbalasyābhijātasyopajāpaṃ daurbalyāpekṣāḥ prakṛtayaḥ kṛcchreṇopagacchanti balavataścānabhijātasya balāpekṣāḥ sukhena ityācāryāḥ
prāyaśaśca kopavaśā rājānaḥ prakṛtikopairhatāḥ śrūyante kāmavaśāḥ kṣayanimittamarivyādhibhiriti
nityaśca kāmena sambandhaḥ kṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalopabhogārthaḥ iti
paribhūtaḥ svaiḥ paraiścāvagṛhyate dveṣyaḥ samucchidyata iti
duruktaśalyaṃ hṛdi nikhātaṃ tejaḥsaṃdīpanamindriyopatāpi ca iti
kāmajastu mṛgayā dyūtaṃ striyaḥ pānamiti caturvargaḥ
mṛgayāyāṃ tu vyāyāmaḥ śleṣmapittamedaḥsvedanāśaścale sthite ca kāye lakṣaparicayaḥ kopabhayasthāneṣu ca mṛgāṇāṃ cittajñānamanityayānaṃ ceti
sātatyena hi niśi pradīpe mātari ca mṛtāyāṃ dīvyatyeva kitavaḥ
śakyā ca strī rājahiteniyoktumupāṃśudaṇḍena vyādhinā vā vyāvartayitumavasrāvayituṃ vā iti
adarśanaṃ kāryanirvedaḥ kālātipātanādanartho dharmalopaśca tantradaurbalyaṃ pānānubandhaśceti
pāne tu śabdādīnāmindriyārthānāmupabhogaḥ prītidānaṃ parijanapūjanaṃ karmaśramavadhaśca iti
strīvyasane bhavatyapatyotpattirātmarakṣaṇaṃ cāntardāreṣu viparyayo vā bāhyeṣu agamyeṣu sarvocchittiḥ
pānasampatsaṃjñānāśo'nunmattasyonmattatvamapretasya pretatvaṃ kaupīnadarśanaṃ śrutaprajñāprāṇavittamitrahāniḥ sadbhirviyogo'narthyasamyogastantrīgītanaipuṇyeṣu cārthaghneṣu prasaṅga iti
ekeṣāṃ paṇanimitto jayaḥ parājayo vā prāṇiṣu niścetaneṣu vā pakṣadvaidhena prakṛtikopaṃ karoti
viśeṣataśca saṃghānāṃ saṃghadharmiṇāṃ ca rājakulānāṃ dyūtanimitto bhedastannimitto vināśa ityasatpragrahaḥ pāpiṣṭhatamo vyasanānāṃ tantradaurbalyāditi
vyādhidurbhikṣayorvyādhiḥ pretavyādhitopasṛṣṭaparicārakavyāyāmoparodhena karmāṇyupahanti durbhikṣaṃ punarakarmopaghāti hiraṇyapaśukaradāyi ca ityācāryāḥ
ekadeśapīḍano vyādhiḥ śakyapratīkāraśca sarvadeśapīḍanaṃ durbhikṣaṃ prāṇināmajīvanāyeti
kṣudrakamukhyakṣayayoḥ kṣudrakakṣayaḥ karmaṇāmayogakṣemaṃ karoti mukhyakṣayaḥ karmānuṣṭhānoparodhadharmā ityācāryāḥ
śakyaḥ kṣudrakakṣayaḥ pratisaṃdhātuṃ bāhulyātkṣudrakāṇāṃ na mukhyakṣayaḥ
sahasreṣu hi mukhyo bhavatyeko na vā sattvaprajñādhikyāttadāśrayatvātkṣudrakāṇāmiti
svacakraparacakrayoḥ svacakramatimātrābhyāṃ daṇḍakarābhyāṃ pīḍayatyaśakyaṃ ca vārayitum paracakraṃ tu śakyaṃ praiyoddhumupasāreṇa saṃdhinā vā mokṣayitumityācāryāḥ
svacakrapīḍanaṃ prakṛtipuruṣamukhyopagrahavighātābhyāṃ śakyate vārayitumekadeśaṃ vā pīḍayati sarvadeśapīḍanaṃ tu paracakraṃ vilopaghātadāhavidhvaṃsanāpavāhanaiḥ pīḍayatīti
prakṛtirājavivādayoḥ prakṛitivivādaḥ prakṛtīnāṃ bhedakaḥ parābhiyogānāvahati rājavivādastu prakṛtīnāṃ dviguṇabhaktavetanaparihārakaro bhavati ityācāryāḥ
śakyaḥ prakṛtivivādaḥ prakṛtimukhyopagraheṇa kalahasthānāpanayanena vā vārayitum
deśarājavihārayordeśavihārastraikālyena karmaphalopaghātaṃ karoti rājavihārastu kāruśilpikuśīlavavāgjīvanarūpājīvāvaidehakopakāraṃ karoti ityācāryāḥ
deśavihāraḥ karmaśramamavadhārthamalpaṃ bhakṣayati bhakṣayitvā ca bhūyaḥ karmasu yogaṃ gacchati rājavihārastu svayaṃ vallabhaiśca svayaṃ grāhapraṇayapaṇyāgārakāryopagrahaiḥ pīḍayatīti
subhagākumārayoḥ kumāraḥ svayaṃ vallabhaiśca svayaṃ grāhapraṇayapaṇyāgārakāryopagrahaiḥ pīḍayati subhagā vilāsopabhogena ityācāryāḥ
śakyaḥ kumāro mantripurohitābhyāṃ vārayituṃ na subhagā bāliśyādanarthyajanasamyogācceti
śreṇīmukhyayoḥ śreṇī bāhulyādanavagrahā steyasāhasābhyāṃ pīḍayati mukhyaḥ kāryānugrahavighātābhyāmityācāryāḥ
samnidhātṛsamāhartroḥ samnidhātā kṛtavidūṣaṇātyayābhyāṃ pīḍayati samāhartā karaṇādhiṣṭhitaḥ pradiṣṭaphalopabhogī bhavati ityācāryāḥ
samnidhātā kṛtāvasthamanyaiḥ kośapraveśyaṃ pratigṛhṇāti samāhartā tu pūrvamarthamātmanaḥ kṛtvā paścād rājārthaṃ karoti praṇāśayati vā parasvādāne ca svapratyayaścaratīti
antapālavaidehakayorantapālaścoraprasargadeyātyādānābhyāṃ vaṇikpathaṃ pīḍayati vaidehakāstu paṇyapratipaṇyānugrahaiḥ prasādhayanti ityācāryāḥ
antapālaḥ paṇyasampātānugraheṇa vartayati vaidehakāstu sambhūya paṇyānāmutkarṣāpakarṣaṃ kurvāṇāḥ paṇe paṇaśataṃ kumbhe kumbhaśatamityājīvanti
abhijātoparuddhā bhūmiḥ paśuvrajoparuddhā veti abhijātoparuddhā bhūmiḥ mahāphalāpyāyudhīyopakāriṇī na kṣamā mokṣayituṃ vyasanābādhabhayātpaśuvrajoparuddhā tu kṛṣiyogyā kṣamā mokṣayitum
abhijātoparuddhā bhūmiratyantamahopakārāpi kṣamā mokṣayituṃ vyasanābādhabhayātpaśuvrajoparuddhā tu kośavāhanopakāriṇī na kṣamā mokṣayitumanyatra sasyavāpoparodhāditi

pratirodhakāṭavikayoḥ pratirodhakā rātrisattracarāḥ śarīrākramiṇo nityāḥ śatasahasrāhapāriṇaḥ pradhānakopakāśca vyavahitāḥ pratyantarāraṇyacarāścāṭavikāḥ prakāśā dṛsyāścaranti ekadeśaghātakāśca ityācāryāḥ
pratirodhakāḥ pramattasyāparahanti alpāḥ kuṇṭhāḥ sukhā jñātuṃ grahītuṃ ca svadeśasthāḥ prabhūtā vikrāntāścāṭavikāḥ prakāśayodino'pahartāro hantāraśca deśānāṃ rājasadharmāṇa iti
mṛgahastivanayoḥ mṛgāḥ prabhūtāḥ prabhūtamāṃsacarmopakāriṇo mandagrāsāvakleśinaḥ suniyamyāśca
iti pīḍanāni ābhyantaro mukhyastambho bāhyo'mitrāṭavīstambhaḥ | iti stambhavargah
tābhyāṃ pīḍanairyathoktaiśca pīḍitaḥ sakto mukhyeṣu parihāropahataḥ prakīrṇo mithyāsaṃhṛtaḥ sāmantāṭavīhṛta iti kośasaṅgavargaḥ
pariśrāntaparikṣīṇayoḥ pariśrāntaṃ snānabhojanasvapnalabdhaviśrāmaṃ yudhyeta na parikṣīṇamanyatrāhave kṣīṇayugyapuruṣam
pratihatahatāgravegayoḥ pratihatamagrapātabhagnaṃ pravīrapuruṣasaṃhataṃ yudhyeta na hatāgravegamagrapātahatavīram
kalatragarbhyantaḥśalyayoḥ kalatragarbhi unmucya kalatraṃ yudhyeta nāntaḥśalyamantaramitram
kupitamūlabhinnagarbhayoḥ kupitamūlaṃ praśamitakopaṃ sāmādibhiryudhyeta na bhinnagarbhamanyonyasmādbhinnam
uparuddhaparikṣiptayoruparuddhamanyato niṣkramyoparoddhāraṃ pratiyudhyeta na parikṣiptaṃ sarvataḥ pratiruddham
chinnadhānyapuruṣavīvadhayoḥ chinnadhānyamanyato dhānyamānīya jaṅgamasthāvarāhāraṃ vā yudhyeta na chinnapuruṣavīvadhamanabhisāram
svavikṣiptamitravikṣiptayoḥ svavikṣiptaṃ svabhūmau vikṣiptaṃ sainyamāpadi śakyamāvāhayituṃ na mitravikṣiptaṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśakālatvāt
śūnyamūlāsvāmisaṃhatayoḥ śūnyamūlaṃ kṛtapaurajānapadārakṣaṃ sarvasaṃdohena yudhyeta nāsvāmisaṃhataṃ rājasenāpatihīnam

lg.l: kṛcchreṇa sādhyate mitraṃ siddhaṃ cāśu virajyati
mānitaṃ vā na sadṛśaṃ śaktito vā nivāritam
dūṣyairvā bhedituṃ mitraṃ sādhyaṃ siddhaṃ ca tiṣṭhati

div.p: svayaṃ hi rājā śūro balavānarogaḥ kṛtāstro daṇḍadvitīyo'pi śaktaḥ prabhāvavantaṃ rājānaṃ jetum
nirutsāhastu prabhāvavān rājā vikramābhipanno naśyati ityācāryāḥ
prabhāvavānutsāhavantaṃ rājānaṃ prabhāvenātisaṃdhatte tadviśiṣṭamanyaṃ rājānamāvāhya bhṛtvā krītvā pravīrapuruṣān
utsāhavataśca prabhāvavanto jitvā krītvā ca striyo bālāḥ paṅgavo'ndhāśca pṛthivīṃ jigyuriti
prajñāśāstracakṣurhi rājālpenāpi prayatnena mantramādhātuṃ śaktaḥ parānutsāhaprabhāvavataśca sāmādibhiryogopaniṣadbhyāṃ cātisaṃdhātum
tatrāraṇyo grāmyaḥ parvata audako bhaumaḥ samo viṣama iti viśeṣāḥ
yatrātmanaḥ sainyavyāyāmānāṃ bhūmiḥ abhūmiḥ parasya sa uttamo deśaḥ viparīto'dhamaḥ sādhāraṇo madhyamaḥ
tasya rātrirahaḥ pakṣo māsa ṛturayanaṃ saṃvatsaro yugamiti viśeṣāḥ
yatrātmanaḥ sainyavyāyāmānāmṛtuḥ anṛtuḥ parasya sa uttamaḥ kālaḥ viparīto'dhamaḥ sādhāraṇo madhyamaḥ
śaktimān hi nimnasthalavato deśasya śītoṣṇavarṣavataśca kālasya śaktaḥ pratīkāre bhavati
sthalagato hi śvā nakraṃ vikarṣati nimnagato nakraḥ śvānamiti
divā kākaḥ kauśikaṃ hanti rātrau kauśikaḥ kākamiti

tairabhyuccitastṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ vā daṇḍasyāṃśaṃ mūle pārṣṇyāṃ pratyantāṭavīṣu ca rakṣā vidhāya kāryasādhanasahaṃ kośadaṇḍaṃ cādāya kṣīṇapurāṇabhaktamagṛhītanavabhaktamasaṃskṛtadurgamamitraṃ vārṣikaṃ cāsya sasyaṃ haimanaṃ ca muṣṭimupahantuṃ mārgaśīrṣīṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt
haimānaṃ cāsya sasyaṃ vāsantikaṃ ca muṣṭimupahantuṃ caitrīṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt
kṣīṇakṛṇakāṣṭhodakamasaṃskṛtadurgamamitraṃ vāsantikaṃ cāsya sasyaṃ vārṣikīṃ ca muṣṭimupahantuṃ jyeṣṭhāmūlīyāṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt
tuṣāradurdinamagādhanimnaprāyaṃ gahanatṛṇavṛkṣaṃ vā deśaṃ grīṣme yāyāt
mārgaśīrṣīṃ taiṣīṃ cāntareṇa dīrghakālāṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt caitrīṃ vaiśākhīṃ cāntareṇa madhyamakālāṃ jyeṣṭhāmūlīyāmāṣāḍhīṃ cāntareṇa hrasvakālāmupoṣiṣyanvyasane caturthīm
yadā vā prayātaḥ karśayitumucchetuṃ vā śaknuyādamitraṃ tadā yāyāt
tasmātprabhūtodake deśe varṣati ca hastibalaprāyo yāyāt

mūlarakṣaṇādatiriktaṃ maulabalamatyāvāpayuktā vā maulā mūle vikurvīranbahulānuraktamaulabalaḥ sārabalo vā pratiyoddhā vyāyāmena yoddhavyam prakṛṣṭe'dhvani kāle vā kṣayavyayasahatvānmaulānām bahulānuraktasampāte ca yātavyasyopajāpabhayādanyasainyānāṃ bhṛtādīnāmaviśvāse balakṣaye vā sarvasainyānāṃ iti maulabalakālaḥ

prabhūtaṃ me bhṛtabalamalpaṃ ca maulabalamṇ parasyālpaṃ viraktaṃ vā maulabalam phalguprāyamasāraṃ vā bhṛtasainyamṇ mantreṇa yoddhavyamalpavyāyāmenaṇ hrasvo deśaḥ kālo vā tanukṣayavyayahṇ alpāvāpaṃ śāntopajāpaṃ viśvastaṃ vā me sainyamṇ parasyālpaḥ prasāro hantavyahṇ iti bhṛtabalakālaḥ
prabhūtaṃ me śreṇībalaṃ śakyaṃ mūle yātrāyāṃ cādhātumṇ hrasvaḥ pravāsaḥ śreṇībalaprāyaḥ pratiyoddhā mantravyāyāmābhyāṃ pratiyoddhukāmaḥ daṇḍabalavyavahāraḥ iti śreṇībalakālaḥ

prabhūtaṃ me mitrabalaṃ śakyaṃ mūle yātrāyāṃ cādhātumṇ alpaḥ pravāso mantrayuddhācca bhūyo vyāyāmayuddhamṇ mitrabalena vā pūrvamaṭavīṃ nagarasthānamāsāraṃ vā yodhayitvā paścātsvabalena yoddhayiṣyāmiṇ mitrasādhāraṇaṃ vā me kāryamṇ mitrāyattā vā me kāryasiddhihṇ āsannamanugrāhyaṃ vā me mitramṇ atyāvāpaṃ vāsya sādayiṣyāmi iti mitrabalakālaḥ

prabhūtaṃ me śatrubalaṃ śatrubalena yodhayiṣyāmi nagarasthānamaṭavīṃ vā tatra me śvavarāhayoḥ kalahe caṇḍālasyevānyatarasiddhirbhaviṣyatiṇ āsārāṇāmaṭavīnāṃ vā kaṇṭakamardanametatkariṣyāmiṇ atyupacitaṃ vā kopabhayānnityamāsannamaribalaṃ vāsayedanyatrābhyantarakopaśaṅkāyāḥ śatruyuddhāvarayuddhakālaśca ityamitrabalakālaḥ
mārgādeśikam parabhūmiyogyamariyuddhapratilomamaṭavībalaprāyaḥ śatrurvā bilvaṃ bilvena hanyatāmṇ alpaḥ prasāro hantavyaḥ ityaṭavībalakālaḥ

sainyamanekamanekasthamuktamanuktaṃ vā vilopārthaṃ yaduttiṣṭhati tadautsāhikaṃ abhaktavetanaṃ vilopaviṣṭipratāpakaraṃ bhedyaṃ pareṣāmabhedyaṃ tulyadeśajātiśilpaprāyaṃ saṃhataṃ mahat | iti balopādānakālāh
amitrasya vā balakāle pratyutpanne śatrubalamavagṛhṇīyāt anyatra vā preṣayet aphalaṃ vā kuryāt vikṣiptaṃ vā vāsayetkāle vātikrānte visṛjet
nityānantaraṃ kṣiprotthāyi vaśyaṃ va bhṛtabalaṃ śreṇībalācchreyaḥ
praharaṇavidyāvinītaṃ tu kṣatriyabalaṃ śreyaḥ bahulasāraṃ vā vaiśyaśūdrabalamiti
tasmādevaṃ balaḥ paraḥ tasyaitatpratibalamiti balasamuddānaṃ kuryāt
tadevāśvānāṃ pratibalam varmiṇo vā hastino'śvā vā varmiṇaḥ
kavacino rathā āvaraṇinaḥ pattayaśca caturaṅgabalasya pratibalam
alpaḥ paścātkopo mahānpurastāllābha iti alpaḥ paścātkopo garīyān
alpaṃ paścātkopaṃ prayātassya dūṣyāmitrāṭavikā hi sarvataḥ samedhayanti prakṛtikopo vā
labdhamapi ca mahāntaṃ purastāllāhamevaṃ bhūte bhṛtyamitrakṣayavyayā grasante
tasmātsahasraikīyaḥ purastāllābhasyāyogaḥ śataikīyo vā paścātkopa iti na yāyāt
purastāllābhe senāpatiṃ kumāraṃ vā daṇḍacāriṇaṃ kurvīta
abhyantarāvagrahaṃ kṛtvā śūnyapālamanekabalavargamanekamukhyaṃ ca sthāpayitvā yāyāt na vā yāyāt
mahāparādhe'pi purohite samrodhanamavasrāvaṇaṃ vā siddhiḥ yuvarāje samrodhanaṃ nigraho vā guṇavatyanyasmin sati putre
putraṃ bhrātaramanyaṃ vā kulyaṃ rājagrāhiṇamutsāhena sādhayet utsāhābbhāve gṛhītānuvartanasaṃdhikarmabhyāmarisaṃdhānabhayāt
tadviśiṣṭaṃ svayaṃ grāhaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā preṣayetsāmantāṭavikānvā tairvigṛhītamatisaṃdadhyāt
amitrādvā sattrī bhedayedenaṃ ayaṃ tvā yogapuruṣaṃ manyamāno bhartaryeva vikramayiṣyati avāptārtho daṇḍacāriṇamamitrāṭavikeṣu kṛcchre vā prayāse yokṣyati viputradāramante vā vāsayiṣyati
pratihatavikramaṃ tvāṃ bhartary paṇyaṃ kariṣyati tvayā vā saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā bhartārameva prasādayiṣyati
apratipannasya saṃśrayaṃ bhedayedasau te yogapuruṣaḥ praṇihitaḥ iti
yaḥ kopaṃ kartuṃ śamayituṃ vā śaktastatropajāpaḥ kāryaḥ
yaḥ satyasaṃdhaḥ śaktaḥ karmaṇi phalāvāptau cānugrahītuṃ vinipāte ca trātuṃ tatra pratijāpaḥ kāryaḥ tarkayitavyaśca kalyāṇabuddhirutāho śaṭha iti

śaṭho hi bāhyo'bhyantaramevamupajapati bhartāraṃ cedd hatvā māṃ pratipādayiṣyati śatruvadho bhūmilābhaśca me dvividho lābho bhaviṣyati atha vā śatrurenamāhaniṣyatīti hatabandhupakṣastulyadoṣadaṇḍenodvignaśca me bhūyānakṛtyapakṣo bhaviṣyati tadvidhe vānyasminnapi śaṅkito bhaviṣyati anyamanyaṃ cāsya mukhyamabhityaktaśāsanena ghātayiṣyāmi iti

abhyantaro vā śaṭho bāhyamevamupajapati kośamasya hariṣyāmi daṇḍaṃ vāsya haniṣyāmi duṣṭaṃ vā bhartāramanena ghātayiṣyāmi pratipannaṃ bāhyamamitrāṭavikeṣu vikramayiṣyāmi cakramasya sajyatām vairamasya prasajyatām tataḥ svādhīno me bhaviṣyati tato bhartārameva prasādayiṣyāmi svayaṃ vā rājyaṃ grahīṣyāmiṇ baddhvā vā bāhyabhūmiṃ bhartṛbhūmiṃ cobhayamavāpsyāmi viruddhaṃ vāvāhayitvā bāhyaṃ viśvastaṃ ghātayiṣyāmi śūnyaṃ vāsya mūlaṃ hariṣyāmi iti
kalyāṇabuddhinā saṃdadhīta śaṭhaṃ tathā iti pratigṛhyātisaṃdadhyāt iti

lg.l: evamupalabhya pare parebhyaḥ sve svebhyaḥ sve parebhyaḥ svataḥ pare

div.p: ādeyaḥ pratyādeyaḥ prasādakaḥ prakopako hrasvakālastanukṣayo'lpavyayo mahānvṛddhyudayaḥ kalyo dharmyaḥ purogaśceti lābhasampat

yadi vā paśyetpratyādeyamādāya kośadaṇḍanicayarakṣāvidhānānyavasrāvayiṣyāmi khanidravyahastivanasetubandhavaṇikpathānuddhṛtasārān kariṣyāmi prakṛtīrasya karśayiṣyāmi apavāhayiṣyāmi āyogenārādhayiṣyāmi vā tāḥ paraṃ pratiyogena kopayiṣyati pratipakṣe vāsya paṇyamenaṃ kariṣyāmi mitramaparuddhaṃ vāsya pratipādayiṣyāmi mitrasya svasya vā deśasya pīḍāmatrasthastaskarebhyaḥ parebhyaśca pratikariṣyāmi mitramāśrayaṃ vāsya vaiguṇyaṃ grāhayiṣyāmi tadamitraviraktaṃ tatkulīnaṃ pratipatsyate satkṛtya vāsmai bhūmiṃ dāsyāmi iti saṃhitasamutthitaṃ mitraṃ me cirāya bhaviṣyati iti pratyādeyamapi lābhamādadīta
adhārmikāddhārmikasya lābho labhyamānaḥ sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca prasādako bhavati
mantriṇāmupadeśāl lābho'labhyamānaḥ kopako bhavati ayamasmābhiḥ kṣayavyayau grāhitaḥ iti
dūṣyamantriṇāmanādarāl lābho labhyamānaḥ kopako bhavati siddhārtho'yamasmānvināśayiṣyati iti
tulye lābhe deśakālau śaktyupāyau priyāpriyau javājavau sāmīpyaviprakarṣau tadātvānubandhau sāratvasātatye bāhulyabāhuguṇye ca vimṛśya bahuguṇayuktaṃ lābhamādadīta

lābhavighnāḥ kāmaḥ kopaḥ sādhvasaṃ kāruṇyaṃ hrīranāryabhāvo mānaḥ sānukrośatā paralokāpekṣā dhārmikatvamatyāgitvaṃ dainyamasūyā hastagatāvamāno daurātmyamaviśvāso bhayamapratīkāraḥ śītoṣṇavarṣāṇāmākṣamyaṃ maṅgalatithinakṣatreṣṭitvamiti

lg.l: artho hyarthasya nakṣatraṃ kiṃ kariṣyanti tārakāḥ

div.p: yatra bāhyā abhyantarānupajapanti abhyantarā vā bāhyāntatrobhayayoge pratijapataḥ siddhirviśeṣavatī
sattriṇo mitravyañjanā vā bāhyānāṃ cārameṣāṃ brūyuḥ ayaṃ vo rājā dūṣyavyañjanairatisaṃdhātukāmaḥ budhyadhvamiti
dūṣyeṣu vā dūṣyavyañjanāḥ praṇihitā dūṣyānbāhyairbhedayeyuḥ bāhyānvā dūṣyaiḥ
yatra bāhyā bāhyānupajapanti abhyantarānabhyantarā vā tatraikāntayoga upajapituḥ siddhirviśeṣavatī
sattriṇo mitravyañjanā vā brūyuḥ ayaṃ vo rājā svayamādātukāmaḥ vigṛhītāḥ sthānena rājñā budhyadhvamiti
mitravyañjano vā brūyādetān cittajñānārthamupadhāsyati vo rājā tadasyākhyātavyamiti
parasparādvā bhedayedenānasau cāsau ca vo rājanyevamupajapati iti bhedaḥ

lg.l: utthitāṃ balavadbhyo vā gurvīṃ laghvīṃ viparyaye

div.p: kṣipto vā taṃ cārthaṃ na kuryāt anyaṃ cānarthamutpādayet
śatruśuddhāyāṃ yataḥ śatruḥ pradhānaḥ kāryo vā tataḥ sāmādibhiḥ siddhiṃ lipseta
dhārmikaṃ jātikulaśrutavṛttastavena sambandhena pūrveṣāṃ traikālyopakārānapakārābhyāṃ vā sāntvayet
nivṛttotsāhaṃ vigrahaśrāntaṃ pratihatopāyaṃ kṣayavyayābhyāṃ pravāsena copataptaṃ śaucenānyaṃ lipsamānamanyasmādvā śaṅkamānaṃ maitrīpradhānaṃ vā kalyāṇabuddhiṃ sāmnā sādhayet
lubdhaṃ kṣīṇaṃ vā tapasvimukhyāvasthāpanāpūrvaṃ dānena sādhayet
tatpañcavidhaṃ deyavisargo gṛhītānuvartanamāttapratidānaṃ svadravyadānamapūrvaṃ parasveṣu svayaṃ grāhadānaṃ ca
bhīruṃ vā pratighātena kṛtasaṃdhireṣa tvayi karmakariṣyati mitramasya nisṛṣṭaṃ saṃdhau vā nābhyantaraḥ iti
yasya vā svadeśādanyadeśādvā paṇyāni paṇyāgāratayāgaccheyuḥ tāni asya yātavyāl labdhāni iti sattriṇaścārayeyuḥ
bahulībhūte śāsanamabhityaktena preṣayet etatte paṇyaṃ paṇyāgāraṃ vā mayā te preṣitaṃ sāmavāyikeṣu vikramasva apagaccha vā tataḥ paṇaśeṣamavāpsyasi iti
te ced yathoktaṃ kuryurna cainān grāhayet
utsāhaśaktimato vā preṣayet amuṣya rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa yathāsthito naḥ saṃdhiḥ iti
itareṣu maitrīṃ bruvāṇāḥ tvameteṣāṃ ghātayitavyaḥ ityupajapeyuḥ
yasya vā pravīrapuruṣo hastī hayo vā mriyeta gūḍhapuruṣairhanyeta hriyeta vā sattriṇaḥ parasparopahataṃ brūyuḥ
tataḥ śāsanamabhiśastasya preṣayetbhūyaḥ kuru tataḥ paṇaśeeṣamavāpsyasi iti
tīkṣṇamutsāhinaṃ vyasaninaṃ sthitaśatruṃ vā gūḍhapuruṣāḥ śastrāgnirasādibhiḥ sādhayeyuḥ saukaryato vā teṣāmanyatamaḥ
ta enaṃ saṃdhau parahiṃsāyāṃ vā yojayeyuḥ
tamitareṣāmubhayavetanāḥ saṃkrāmayeyuḥ ayaṃ vo rājā duṣṭaḥ iti
